description.hltext_display: 붉은보석, 변화의 바람 시즌2 `광학사` 등장!
IFC’s Local Currency Loans are Protecting African Clients against Foreign Exchange Risk
description.content:
The FINANCIAL -- IFC, a member of the World Bank Group, is providing local currency loans to African clients to protect them against currency fluctuations and foreign exchange risk, while helping develop local financial markets.
"This past month, IFC disbursed local currency loans that will help a microfinance institution support small businesses in Ghana, finance a new wheat mill’s operations in Rwanda, and support a student loan program in Namibia. IFC also has just committed $4 million equivalent in Kenyan shillings to Braeburn Schools, an education provider in Kenya," IFC said.
“In addition to enabling clients to borrow in their local currencies and manage risks better, IFC also helps develop long-term local currency markets to benefit investors and hedgers, and works closely with regulators to share best practices on financial derivatives,” said Shanker Krishnan, IFC Deputy Treasurer, who heads IFC’s derivatives group that creates local currency solutions for clients. “IFC has extended the maturity of cross-currency hedges in many markets, including Nigeria and Zambia.”
IFC extended its first local currency loan in Africa more than 10 years ago. Initially, these loans were in South African rand. Between 1997 and 2007, IFC made 24 loans totaling over 1.4 billion rand ($200 million equivalent). In 2007, IFC began to move into other markets in the region and has since used cross-currency swaps to finance local currency projects in other African currencies, including Ghanaian cedi, Moroccan dirham, Nigerian naira, Rwandan franc, Tanzanian shilling, Tunisian dinar, and Zambian kwacha.

event_or_fact.property: ?In addition to enabling clients to borrow in their local currencies and manage risks better, IFC also helps develop long-term local currency markets to benefit investors and hedgers, and works closely with regulators to share best practices on financial

description.hltext_display: Without Pullen, Kelly, K-State falls to UNLV
description.content:
Nick Russell's 12 points led the Wildcats (9-3).
Pullen, who had made 82 consecutive starts for Kansas State, was suspended by the NCAA for three games just before the game.
In a statement, the school said Pullen and senior forward Curtis Kelly were being punished for receiving impermissible benefits in connection with the purchase of clothing at a local department store.
It said the length of Kelly's suspension had not been determined by the NCAA's student-athlete reinstatement staff.
Pullen and Kelly are the two top scorers for Kansas State. Pullen also will miss games against Missouri-Kansas City and North Florida. "These young men have worked hard to represent themselves and Kansas State in a positive manner," coach Frank Martin said in a statement. "Having said that, they made a mistake in judgment and have to pay a price for that." In other games:
* At Tennessee, Maurice Jones scored 15 points and Southern California handed No. 19 Tennessee its third straight loss, 65-64. It was the first road win in seven attempts for the Trojans (7-5) , dating back to a Feb. 18 win at Washington last season.
The Vols (7-3) were led by Tobias Harris' 14 points.
* At Ohio State, David Lighty scored 29 points and the No. 2 Buckeyes (11-0) beat UNC Asheville, 96-49.
* At Purdue, JaJuan Johnson had 24 points and 13 rebounds to help the No. 14 Boilermakers (11-1) beat Indiana-Purdue-Fort Wayne, 77-52.
* At BYU, Jimmer Fredette scored 28 points and the No. 23 Cougars (11-1) held off Weber State, 72-66.
* At Texas A&M, David Loubeau scored 16 points and the No. 25 Aggies (11-1) routed Wagner, 86-51.
* At New York, Justin Brownlee scored a career-high 21 points and St. John's (7-3) beat previously undefeated Northwestern (8-1), 85-69, to win the Holiday Festival at Madison Square Garden.
* At Penn State, Murphy Burnatowski scored 20 points as Maine (6-5) beat the Nittany Lions, 74-64. Penn State (7-4) got 22 points from Talor Battle.
* At Las Vegas, Kawhi Leonard had 23 points and No. 7 San Diego State (13-0) defeated San Francisco, 62-56, in the Holiday Hoops Classic . . . Miami (8-3) beat Oral Roberts, 69-56 . . . Rice (6-4), topped Stetson, 66-63.
* At Miami (Ohio), Dion Dixon scored a career-high 23 points, and Cincinnati (11-0) won, 64-48.
In women's games:
* At NASSAU, Bahamas, Odyssey Sims scored 25 points to help No. 2 Baylor (12-1) beat No. 23 Syracuse, 77-43, in the Sunsplash Shootout.
* At Duke, Jasmine Thomas scored 16 points and the No. 3 Blue Devils (12-0) defeated No. 4 Xavier, 46-45. The Musketeers (10-1) were led by 22 points and 15 rebounds from Amber Harris.
Noteworthy
* Mississippi State sophomore forward Renardo Sidney was suspended indefinitely for "conduct detrimental to the team," school spokesman Gregg Ellis said. Ellis confirmed that the suspension is related to an incident during Monday's practice, but he declined to provide further details. Sidney has played in only one game this season because of an NCAA suspension involving improper benefits.
* Redshirt sophomore guard Quincy Roberts will leave the St. John's program and transfer for the spring semester.

description.hltext_display: ปชป.ยืมมือ กมธ.กฎหมายฯ บี้ภูมิใจห้อย แฉมีเช็คจ่ายคนใกล้ชิดรมต.
description.content:
ส.ส.ปชป. ยืมมือคณะกรรมาธิการการกฎหมายฯ เล่นงานผู้ช่วย รมว.พาณิชย์ ค่ายภูมิใจห้อย “ประชา” รับลูกตรวจสอบ แฉมีหลักฐานเช็คมูลค่านับร้อยล้านจ่ายให้คนใกล้ชิด รมต.
วันนี้(22 ธ.ค.) นายไพโรจน์ อิสระเสรีพงษ์ ส.ส.กทม.พรรคเพื่อไทย ในฐานะโฆษกคณะกรรมาธิการ (กมธ.) การกฎหมาย การยุติธรรมและสิทธิมนุษยชน สภาผู้แทนราษฎร ได้ยื่นหนังสือขอให้นายประชา ประสพดี ส.ส.สมุทรปราการ พรรคเพื่อไทย ในฐานะประธานคณะกรรมาธิการการกฎหมายฯ สอบสวนหาที่มาของแคชเชียร์เช็คธนาคารกรุงไทย จำกัด (มหาชน) สาขาอุบลราชธานี จำนวน 25,000,000,000 บาท ซึ่งเป็นการสั่งซื้อแคชเชียร์เช็คจากนายวีระศักดิ์ จินารัตน์ อดีตผู้ช่วย รมว.พาณิชย์ ของนางพรทิวา นาคาศัย รมว.พาณิชย์ เลขาธิการพรรคภูมิใจไทย และข้อมูลของเงินที่ใช้เพื่อนำมาออกแคชเชียร์เช็คฉบับดังกล่าวว่ามีส่วนพัวพันการประมูลข้าวฉาว ใช้ชื่อตัวเองค้ำประกันแบงก์การันตีให้พ่อค้าจริงหรือไม่
นายไพโรจน์ระบุว่า หากเป็นการนำเงินกองทุนให้กู้ยืมเพื่อการศึกษาวิทยาลัยโปลีเทคนิคภาคตะวันออกเฉียงเหนือ มาใช้เพื่อเป็นเงินค้ำประกันประมูลข้าวให้เอกชนจริง ถือว่าเป็นความเสียหายต่อกระทรวงศึกษาธิการอย่างมาก และอยากให้มีการตรวจสอบสต๊อกข้าวว่ามีอยู่จำนวนเท่าใดกันแน่
ด้าน นายประชากล่าวว่า เรื่องนี้เกี่ยวข้องกับความซื่อสัตย์และภาพลักษณ์ของรัฐบาล และคนเป็นผู้ช่วย รมว.พาณิชย์ หากเป็นเรื่องจริงควรนำเข้ากรมสอบสวนคดีพิเศษ (ดีเอสไอ) ดำเนินการ ทั้งนี้เป็นเรื่องน่ายินดีที่ ครม.ได้มีมติให้บุคคลดังกล่าวพ้นสภาพชั่วคราว แต่ตนทราบว่ายังมีขบวนการโกงกินเกี่ยวกับข้าวอีกเป็นจำนวนมาก ในสัปดาห์หน้าจึงจะเชิญผู้เกี่ยวข้องมาชี้แจงอีกครั้ง รวมทั้งคณะกรรมาธิการยังมีหลักฐานการสั่งจ่ายเช็คมูลค่านับร้อยล้านบาทให้คนใกล้ชิดของรัฐมนตรีอีกด้วย
นายประชากล่าวด้วยว่า คณะกรรมาธิการฯ ยังมีมติเดินทางไปเยี่ยมผู้ที่ถูกจับกุมในคดีโทษทางการเมือง เริ่มจากแกนนำ นปช.ที่ถูกจับกุมตัวอยู่ในเรือนจำคลองเปรม โดยคณะจะเดินทางไปสอบถามสารทุกข์สุกดิบ ในวันที่ 29 ธ.ค.นี้เวลา 15.00 น. ทั้งนี้ มองว่าหลังรัฐบาลยกเลิกการประกาศใช้ พ.ร.ก.ฉุกเฉินก็ทำให้สถานการณ์ผ่อนคลายลง น่าจะเป็นนิมิตหมายที่ดีที่จะทำให้ผู้ถูกคุมขังที่ไม่เกี่ยวข้องอะไรด้วยได้รับการปล่อยตัวง่ายขึ้น

description.hltext_display: South Korea Begins New Naval Drills
description.author: MARK McDONALD
description.content:
SEOUL, South Korea Despite previous warnings of retaliation from North Korea, the South Korean military continued to defy the North on Wednesday by launching a three-day naval drill in the Sea of Japan and scheduling an exercise by the army and air force about 30 miles from the North-South demilitarized zone.
South Koreans sang hymns on Tuesday after decorating a tower with Christmas lights near the border with North Korea.
The naval exercise, scheduled to last three days, was expected to take place about 60 miles south of the maritime border in waters off the east coast of the Korean Peninsula. An official at the Defense Ministry said there would be no shelling during the drill.
A one-day artillery exercise also was planned for Thursday, the defense official said, with the field of fire near Pocheon, about 25 miles northeast of Seoul. He denied news reports in Seoul that called it the largest live-fire drill ever to be held near the demilitarized zone, or DMZ. Instead, the official characterized the drill as ordinary. The new sets of drills follow a South Korean artillery exercise on Monday that dramatically raised tensions on the peninsula and led to a frenzy of diplomatic activity across the region and at the United Nations Security Council.
China and Russia urged South Korea to cancel the drill, but Seoul pressed ahead, holding a 94-minute exercise on Yeonpyeong, the island off the North Korean coast that was shelled by the North on Nov. 23. Two South Korean marines and two civilians were killed in the shelling.
North Korea claims Yeonpyeong and its surrounding waters, disputes the maritime border known as the Northern Limit Line and threatened brutal consequences beyond imagination if the drill on Monday went forward. Afterward, the Norths official news agency said it was not worth reacting to the exercise. The defense official in Seoul said Wednesday there had still been no discernible military reaction from the North.
The official also said there have been no unusual movements by North Korean troops since the lighting of a 30-meter-high Christmas tree atop Aegibong, a South Korean peak that overlooks a North Korean village along the DMZ.
A church choir from Seoul wearing red scarves and Santa Claus hats and guarded by a contingent of South Korean marines sang Christmas carols at the tree-lighting ceremony on Tuesday night. The tree a metal tower strung with lights and topped by a glowing cross had not been lighted since 2003, when the South agreed to shut it down, while also suspending loudspeaker broadcasts and a propaganda leaflet campaign using large helium balloons. North Korea considered those measures to be hostile cross-border provocations.
The North has warned that its artillery will fire across the border to destroy the loudspeakers if they resume broadcasting.
Some South Korean media reported recently that the Defense Ministry has restarted some leaflet drops and broadcasts, but a defense official declined to confirm that.
The South did expand its system of loudspeakers along DMZ earlier this year and has prepared other measures, including large digital message boards, as part of a possible new propaganda war.
A continuing leaflet campaign by South Korean civilians using balloons has angered the North Korean government. The balloons, which also carry DVDs and dollar bills, include leaflets that ridicule the North Korean leader, Kim Jong-il, and call for people in the North to rise up against his regime.
There have been no loudspeaker blasts since 2004, although South Korea made a show of putting some new speakers in place in May, after the sinking of a South Korean naval vessel, the Cheonan, in March. Forty-six sailors were killed. The North has denied any involvement.

description.hltext_display: Alexandra Rylee pulls clear in Brandywine
description.content:
Alyssa Spakowski/EQUI-PHOTO
Alexandra Rylee, ridden by Frankie Pennington, improves her career record to 3 for 4 by taking the Brandywine Stakes.
The 2-year-old filly Alexandra Rylee made amends for her lone career, when she finished fourth as the 3-5 favorite five weeks ago, by cruising to a 4 1/2-length score in Tuesday’s $75,000 Brandywine Stakes at Parx Racing.
Ridden by Frankie Pennington for trainer Butch Reid, Alexandra Rylee ($6.20) dueled up front with Doing Great through fractions of 22.51 and 45.35 seconds in the six-furlong overnight stakes. Alexandra Rylee put away her rival entering the stretch and drew clear to easily outfinish Coax Liberty, the 3-5 favorite.
Coax Liberty, the third-place finisher in the Grade 2 Adirondack at Saratoga in August, was 3 1/2 lengths in front of Doing Great in the field of four 2-year-old fillies.
In winning for the third time in four starts, Alexandra Rylee, a Pennsylvania-bred daughter of Afleet Alex owned by Cash is King LLC, covered the distance in 1:09.72.
She was making her first start since finishing a distant fourth as the odds-on choice in a first-level allowance on Nov. 12. She won her career debut at Saratoga in August, then followed up by taking a first-level allowance restricted to Pa.-breds at Parx on Oct. 18.

description.hltext_display: Suspension should stand
description.content:
Well, I see the Ontario Minor Hockey Association caved to public criticism and reinstated suspended Peterborough midget hockey coach Greg Walsh (who pulled his team off the ice after a racial slur from an opposing player was directed at one of his players). I might be in the minority, but I think he should have been suspended.
I’m not at all condoning racist slurs, but the rule coach Walsh violated is very clear, and it is there for a reason — a coach can’t just pull his team off the ice willy-nilly whenever he wants.
This isn’t a case of the coach having to protect his players from some imminent physical danger. He made a decision to violate a rule, the consequences of which he was well aware, to make a political statement.
In hockey, it is the role of the officials to assess penalties/ejections and call games when necessary. It is a very slippery slope when you allow coaches, however noble their intentions may be, to start usurping that role.

description.hltext_display: Ensworth boys rally to win
description.content:
The Ensworth boys scored the first 10 points of the fourth quarter Tuesday to beat Brentwood 61-52 and advance to the championship game of the Ensworth Holiday Shootout.
Ensworth (7-1) will play Livingston Academy, an 81-77 winner over CPA in overtime, at 8 tonight for the championship.
The Tigers led 27-20 at the half, but Brentwood's James Cox scored the first eight points of the third quarter to spark an 11-0 run by the Bruins (10-3).
The Bruins led by their largest margin at 41-35 after a Cox jumper with 2:05 left in the third quarter. Then Ensworth started taking control.
David Dingess' putback at the third-quarter buzzer cut the Brentwood lead to
"That was huge for us," said Dingess, who led Ensworth with 17 points. "We went on a good run there."
Jack Montague led Brentwood with 15 points. Cox finished with 14.
Brentwood Coach Dennis King said he did find some encouragement from the way his team started the third quarter.
"We'd had four consecutive unbelievably bad third quarters in the last few games," King said.
"We were concentrating and tried to get out early and we did. They played good defense and kept putting in fresh guys, and it just got to us."
Livingston Acad. 81, CPA 77 (OT): Mason Ramsey scored 25 points as Livingston Academy (7-6) won in overtime in the other semifinal.
Craig Bradshaw scored 25 points for CPA (9-3).
GIRLS
Livingston Acad. 45, Ensworth 35: Tori Stocking made four 3-pointers in the final five minutes of the half and finished with 16 points for Livingston Academy
(13-1).
The Lady Wildcats will play Clarksville tonight at 6:30 in the title game.
The Lady Tigers (7-3) started the game on an 8-0 run.
"It's about runs," Stocking said. "We had to make runs. They packed it inside and we were able to kick it out and find open shooters."
Justice Swett scored 12 points to lead Ensworth.
Clarksville 58, CPA 45: Jessy Ward scored 19 points to lead Clarksville (11-2). Meredith Roman scored 18 points for CPA (9-3).

We'd had four consecutive unbelievably bad third quarters in the last few games; We were concentrating and tried to get out early and we did. They played good defense and kept putting in fresh guys, and it just got to us.
That was huge for us; We went on a good run there.

description.hltext_display: Nobody sledges like Warne
description.content:
England's Kevin Pietersen on Wednesday said Australia's current team could not out-sledge Test greats Shane Warne and Glenn McGrath, dismissing a sharp rise in verbal clashes during the Ashes series.
Pietersen said he had faced some "pretty big verbal contests" during England's last tour of Australia, when the legendary bowlers were still playing, but had seen nothing unusual in this year's Tests.
Both teams have acknowledged raised temperatures during the home team's series-levelling win in Perth, with England's James Anderson and Matthew Prior in the thick of it along with Australia's Mitchell Johnson and Peter Siddle.
"There's not really any big chirpers or big sledgers, it's just England versus Australia. It's an Ashes series," said the South African-born batsman.
"Blokes get a bit of red mist occasionally. You're allowed to do that on both teams. You're playing for a little urn. It's historic. It's huge. But there's nothing that's been overboard."
Australia had not won a Test since July until they wrapped up the big 267-run win on Sunday in a performance marked by a return to their traditional aggression. The series is poised 1-1 going into Sunday's penultimate Test.
Australia were ordered to tone down their sledging after the notorious 2008 Sydney Test against India, when alleged racial remarks prompted an angry public backlash against a team dubbed the "Unloveables".
But Australian Cricketers' Association chief executive Paul Marsh said the softer approach had hindered the side, which was toppled from the top Test ranking last year and has since fallen as low as fifth.
"I think there's no doubt the team's performance has been affected," Marsh told the Sydney Morning Herald.
"Hard aggressive cricket is in the Australian team's DNA and unfortunately the players started second-guessing their natural instincts in the heat of battle for fear of reprisal from CA (Cricket Australia) or a public backlash from the vocal minority."
Cricket Australia spokesperson Peter Young admitted that the team went through a "period of introspection" after the 2008 backlash.
"But the public has consistently told us since then, through three years of research, that they are totally comfortable with on-field aggression as long as it is hard but fair cricket," he told the Herald.
"What the public saw in Perth, from my understanding of the public mood, was completely acceptable."
Meanwhile Pietersen was also confident that England spearhead Anderson would be fit for the hotly anticipated Boxing Day Test despite a side strain.
Cricket Australia says 91 000 people could pack the cavernous Melbourne Cricket Ground for day one on Sunday, outstripping the 90 800 who flocked there in 1961 for the fifth Test against the West Indies.

description.hltext_display: 长沙首条LED路灯街道亮灯 节能新样板
description.content:
住在楚沩西路边的居民章礼堂说，新装了LED路灯后，门前“亮如白昼”，感觉安全多了，而且晚上在马路边还可以看报纸呢。
近日宁乡县城玉潭镇楚沩西路、新康路LED路灯照明样板路正式“亮灯”，不少人惊喜地发现，这里的路灯光线比其他马路上的路灯更亮，灯光更柔和。这是长沙第一条安装LED路灯的街道，也是省内首条LED路灯样板街，全长3公里多的马路上共安装400盏LED路灯，预计1年可节约电费50多万元。
由宁乡县玉潭镇投资进行的楚沩西路、新康路亮化工程，原计划投资300多万元安装普通高压钠灯路灯。我市节能照明龙头企业长沙恒锐照明电器有限公司获悉此信息后，主动向投资方介绍可在不增加投资的情况下，将楚沩西路、新康路改造成为LED路灯节能照明样板路。
“恒锐照明”董事长黎跃军介绍，LED光源是第四代光源，LED灯具有省电、照度大、使用寿命长等特点。一盏普通高压钠灯路灯每小时耗1度电，而改用LED路灯后，每小时可节电70%。
住在楚沩西路边的居民章礼堂说，新装了LED路灯后，门前“亮如白昼”，感觉安全多了，而且晚上在马路边还可以看报纸呢。

description.hltext_display: พท.บุกทำเนียบฯ จี้รัฐแจงงบแก้หนี้นอกระบบ - ศอฉ.
description.content:
“เด็จพี่” บุกทำเนียบฯ จี้รัฐแจงงบแก้หนี้นอกระบบ ปูดเช็กแล้วรัฐปั่นตัวเลขเคลียร์หนี้ พร้อมสั่งแจงงบ ศอฉ. แต่เชื่อรัฐกลับลำจะแจงเหตุกลัวคะแนนนิยมตก
วันนี้ (22 ธ.ค.) ที่ทำเนียบรัฐบาล ได้เดินทางมายื่นหนังสือถึงนายอภิสิทธิ์ เวชชาชีวะ นายกรัฐมนตรี เพื่อขอทราบข้อมูลและข้อเท็จจริงในการใช้งประมาณในการดำเนินงานของรัฐบาล 2 กรณี มีฝ่ายเจ้าหน้าที่กองรับเรื่องราวร้องทุกข์มารับเรื่อง จากนั้นโฆษกพรรคเพื่อไทยได้กล่าวว่า 1.เรื่องการแก้หนี้นอกระบบ โดยตัวเลขอยู่ที่ 4 แสนถึง 5 แสนคน และแก้ไปแล้วโดยใช้งบประมาณ 41,000 กว่าล้านบาท แต่ปรากฏว่าผู้ที่เป็นหนี้นอกระบบและได้ร้องเรียนมาที่พรรคเพื่อไทย เมื่อตรวจสอบแล้วพบว่ายังไม่ได้มีการแก้หนี้ รวมทั้งมีเจ้าหน้าที่ให้ข้อมูลมาว่าน่าจะมีการตั้งตัวเลข
โฆษกพรรคเพื่อไทยกล่าวว่า พรรคก็ได้ตรวจสอบและไปดูผลของสำนักงานปลัดกระทรวงการคลัง พบว่าตัวเลขในวันที่ 7 พ.ค.53 พบว่าตัวเลขแค่ 42,000 กว่าคนจาก 6 ธนาคาร ซึ่งตัวเลขที่รัฐบาลรีบนำไปปั่นตัวเลข น่าจะมีความผิดปกติ และประชาชนก็มองว่าในตัวเลขนี้ มีเจ้าหนี้ที่เป็นเจ้าหนี้นอกระบบเกือบ 3,000 ราย ซึ่งตัวเลขเวลาที่ไปเคลียร์เรื่องหนี้ก็มีปัญหาอีกว่าเป็นกลุ่มคนของฝั่งรัฐบาลบ้างผู้มีอิทธิพลบ้าง และการโยนหนี้ไปยังธนาคาร ซึ่งธนาคารก็ไปจ่ายเงินให้กับลูกหนี้นอกระบบโดยตรงจึงเกิดปัญหา จึงมองว่าน่าจะส่อทุจริต ดังนั้นนายกรัฐมนตรีในฐานะผู้นำฝ่ายบริหารจะต้องเอาข้อมูลที่แท้จริงมาเปิดเผย
นายพร้อมพงศ์กล่าวว่า 2.เรื่องการใช้งบประมาณของศูนย์อำนายการแก้ไขสถานการณ์ฉุกเฉิน (ศอฉ.) เมื่อมีการประกาศ พ.ร.ก.บริหารราชการในสถานการณ์ฉุกเฉินไปเมื่อวันที่ 21 ธ.ค.ที่ผ่านมา ดังนั้น เมื่อยกเลิกก็ต้องมีการชี้แจงเพราะตามปกติเมื่อมีการใช้งบหน่วยงานราชการซึ่งเป็นเงินภาษีของประชาชน
“ได้มีประชาชนร้องเรียนมายังพรรคและประกอบกับผู้สื่อข่าว ได้ไปสอบถาม พล.อ.ประยุทธ์ จันทร์โอชา ผู้บัญชาการทหารบก (ผบ.ทบ.) ท่านก็รู้สึกเบรกแตกว่าไม่ชี้แจงเรื่องนี้ ใช้งบถูกต้องว่าเป็นงบค่าเบี้ยเลี้ยง แล้วท่านนายกรัฐมนตรีก็ออกข่าวว่าไม่ต้องชี้แจง คณะรัฐมนตรีก็อนุมัติว่าไม่ต้องชี้แจงแล้ว ก็โบ้ยกันไปโบ้ยกันมา อีกคนหนึ่ง คือ ผบ.ทบ.เบรกแตกชนดะฟาดหัวฟาดหางกับสื่อมวลชนคนที่ถาม ทั้งที่จริงแล้วเมื่อเป็นเบี้ยเลี้ยงหรือเบี้ยน้ำมันก็ต้องชี้แจง เพราะเป็นเงินภาษีของประชาชน แต่นายกฯ ก็ยังบอกว่าไม่ต้องชี้แจง แล้วล่าสุดผมได้ข่าวว่ามีการกลับลำกระทันหัน ถ้าเป็นเรื่องก็คว่ำแล้ว เพราะรองนายกฯ สุเทพบอกว่าจะชี้แจง นี่คือผลของการที่จะลดเบี้ยเลื้ยงก็ดีซึ่งเป็นการแสดงอาการว่าน่าจะผิดปกติ เรื่องนี้พอมีการกลับลำผมก็อยากจะให้ตัวเลขตรงไปตรงมา พรรคได้ข้อมูลมาส่วนหนึ่งจากข้าราชการและก็จะตรวจสอบ ถ้าไม่ถูกต้องก็คงจะมีการอภิปรายไม่ไว้วางใจ เพราะการกลับลำครั้งนี้มีนัยยะทางการเมือง เพราะล่าสุดผมรู้ข้อมูลว่าไปประชุมกันว่าถ้าไม่มีการชี้แจงไม่ได้ เพราะโพลออกมาว่ารัฐบาลสอบตก ยกชั้นทั้งตัวผู้นำและ ครม.ถ้าไม่ชี้แจงอีกคะแนนนิยมจะตกกันใหญ่” โฆษกพรรคเพื่อไทยกล่าว

description.hltext_display: Иудаика в Одессе
Madame porte la culotte - la critique (de George Cukor)
description.content:
Acheter ce DVD
Réalisateur - George Cukor
Avec - Katharine Hepburn - Spencer Tracy - Judy Holliday ...Plus
Genre - Comédie
Nationalité - Américain
Date de sortie 1949
Éditeur - Warner Home Video
A la télé ce soir
Durée : 1h41mn
Titre original : Adam’s rib
L'avis des internautes
Un amour de comédie, alliant intelligence du propos et finesse d’exécution. De la dentelle.
L’argument : Un magistrat marié à une avocate se retrouve face à face avec sa femme lors d’une affaire criminelle qui met en jeu les rapports entre hommes et femmes dans la société. Ce procès finit par influencer dangereusement leur vie de couple.
Notre avis : George Cukor est un cinéaste sur le déclin depuis quelques années lorsqu’on lui propose le scénario de Madame porte la culotte (1949), magnifiquement écrit par le duo Ruth Gordon/Garson Kanin. Cette histoire de guerre des sexes entre un mari et sa femme féministe était parfaite pour un cinéaste aussi raffiné que Cukor. Loin de tomber dans la grossièreté ou la facilité, les scénaristes ont exploité au maximum de ses possibilités une intrigue improbable mais ô combien savoureuse. Ainsi, procédant par glissements progressifs, ils montrent comment la vie d’un couple peut être influencée par des événements extérieurs : le procès finit par diviser un ménage qui apparaît de prime abord comme très solide, mais les chamailleries nocturnes se répercutent également dans la cour d’assises où les deux époux règlent leurs comptes pour le plus grand plaisir du spectateur.
Finalement, en véritable roublard, le metteur en scène renverse sa proposition de départ et, par un savant jeu de miroirs, entraîne le couple de juristes sur la voie des amants criminels. Mais bien sûr, comme dans toute bonne comédie, tout rentrera dans l’ordre, même si les auteurs ont eu le temps de glisser un message profondément féministe, militant très nettement pour l’émancipation de la femme et pour l’égalité des droits entre les sexes. Cukor s’amuse d’ailleurs à brouiller les cartes en faisant de nombreuses allusions à une certaine confusion sexuelle : l’ami Kip (interprété par David Wayne) a une attitude pour le moins ambiguë et annonce qu’il se verrait bien devenir une femme, Katharine Hepburn, quant à elle, porte plus d’une fois des vêtements très masculins et le travestissement est un autre thème qui transparaît lors de la longue séquence de procès.
Cette comédie, souvent drôle et qui s’autorise quelques scènes délirantes, reste aujourd’hui un régal notamment grâce à la performance du duo d’anthologie formé par Spencer Tracy et Katharine Hepburn. La magie opère dès qu’ils sont à l’écran, faisant oublier le classicisme d’une mise en scène épurée et très théâtrale. Du beau travail, ciselé par un des orfèvres de la comédie américaine.
BIENTÔT A L'AFFICHE
LES REALISATEURS
George Cukor

description.hltext_display: [종목 포커스] 텔레필드, 100% 무상증자로 상한가
description.content: 텔� �필드가 100% 무상증자 소식에 상한가로 직행했다.텔� �필드는 22일 14.86%(425원) 오른 3285원에 장을 마감하며 이틀 연속 상승세를 이어갔다. 이 회사는 같은 � "기존 주식 1주당 � 주 1주씩을 배� �하는 무상증자를 실시한다"� 공시했다. 무상증자 후 액면가 500원짜리 주식이 기존 347만주에서 2배로 늘어나게 된다.주주 입장에서 무상증자는 비용을 지불하지 않� 자� 이 가지� 있는 주식만큼을 공짜로 받는 것이어서 배당과 비슷한 효과를 가진다. 주식 수가 두 배 늘어나는 만큼 권리락이 발생해 주가는 � �반으로 낮아지지만 대부분의 경우 무상증자 과� �에서 주가가 올라 결과� �으로는 호재로 작용한다.[� �범주 기자]▶ [화보] "굴욕부터 NG까지"…2010 � �드카펫에서 생긴 일▶ 코스피, 연중 최� 치 행진 후 `숨� 르기`▶ `주가의 역설` PER 높을때 사야 돈번다▶ 코스피, 최� � � 돌파 가능…"주식 팔 이� 없다"▶ 이세은, 반라로 목욕� 촬영 `매끈한 뒤태에 男心흔들`▶ `승승장구` 박진영, 이혼 후 첫 심경� 백 "그 사람에 대한 예의…"[ⓒ 매일경� � & mk.co.kr, 무단� �재 및 재배포 금지]

description.hltext_display: 道路照明标准：城市核心区域亮灯率100%
description.content:
在满足基本使用功能的基础上，可适度调整道路照明的亮度、照度，实行分时、分路段控制。
城市道路照明规范化服务标准适用于中心城区范围内东至309章丘收费站、西至长清大学科技园区、南至103国道市中区界内、北至北二环的路灯照明，以及城区范围内高架桥照明的服务与管理，遵循以人为本、经济适用、节能环保、美化环境的原则。在满足基本使用功能的基础上，可适度调整道路照明的亮度、照度，实行分时、分路段控制。
快速路、主次干道亮灯率达99%以上，支路、街巷亮灯率达98%以上。城市道路照明设施完好率达99%以上。按照济南地区经纬度亮度启闭照明设施，极端天气条件下及时开启照明设施。利用道路照明设施悬挂、设置的宣传品和广告，不能影响照明设施正常运行和养护维修，并与道路照明设施及周边环境相协调，保持完好、整洁、美观。城市道路照明管理机构加强核心区域日常巡查，确保核心区域每日巡查一遍，核心区域亮灯率达100%。有重大活动及节假日前，应对重点区域及周边道路照明设施进行巡查检修。遇有异常天气、灾害时，应加强重点区域、危险路段、路灯设施重要部位的巡查检修。
接到漏电报警后，抢修人员应快速反应，正常情况下1小时内到达现场进行处置，设置警戒标志，采取有效措施，迅速控制险情，防止误伤公众，并尽快修复。因重大事故造成不亮灯的，72小时内修复；一般线路故障，48小时内修复；灯泡损坏的，24小时内更换。现场作业结束后立即清扫，不能留有废料和污迹，做到设备、场地清洁。路灯电缆沟道等作业完成后，应立即盖好所有盖板，确保行人、车辆安全通行。

description.hltext_display: [마켓레이더] 설비투자 끝낸 가치주가 뜬다
description.content: 주가는 경기나 기업 이익의 그림자다. 그림자가 주인을 앞서거나 뒤서기도 하� 때로는 좀 길게 늘어지기도 하지만 주인에게� � �대 벗어나지 못하� 결국 같은 곳을 향하게 된다.� �체 시장이나 개별 기업 주가는 가치(펀더멘털)에 의해 결� �� 수밖에 없다는 얘기다. 이런 이� 로 많은 투자자들은 가치투자를 가장 효과� �인 투자 기법 중 하나로 믿� 있다.내년에는 이익 모멘텀보다 리� �이팅(주가 재평가) 작업에 따라 주가가 차별� �으로 오를 것으로 보인다.지독한 금융위기 이후 올해까지 턴어라운드를 거친 경� �가 내년에 � �상 궤도에 복귀하면 기업 이익 증가율도 자연스럽게 낮아질 것이다. 그만큼 당장 이익이 급증하는 성장주를 찾는 게 어� �워질 수밖에 없다.이럴 때 좋은 투자 대안은 리� �이팅 장세를 견인� 가치주를 찾는 것이다. 그� �다면 내년 한국 주식시장 리� �이팅을 � 도� 가치주는 어떤 것들이 있을까.일단 주주 가치라는 측면에서 � 망 종목을 찾아볼 필요가 있다. 최근 미국 기업들이 이익 � �상화나 � �부 지분의 청산 등에 힘입어 배당을 늘리거나 재개한다� 밝히는 사례가 부쩍 늘� 있다. 이런 � 배당 기업들이 최근 미국 증시 상승세를 견인하� 있다.미국 증시에� 지난 9월 초에 향후 12개월 예상 실� � 기준 주가수익비율(PER)이 11.7배까지 낮아졌다가 최근 13배 수준까지 꽤 높아졌다. 그 원동� �으로 두 차례 대규모 양� � 완화 � �책에 따른 � �금리 기조와 경기 회복을 먼� � � 올릴 수 있으나 � �부가 기업에 투입한 구� �금융을 돌� �받기 시작함에 따라 주주 가치가 � �� � 것이라는 기대감도 한몫한다.2000년 이후 한국 주식시장에서 외국인 지분율과 배당 성향은 비슷한 궤� �을 그리� 있다. 외국인들은 주주 가치가 높은 기업을 � 호한다. 이런 기업들은 과도한 투자 없이도 꾸준히 이익을 내� 배당도 많이 � 수 있기 때문이다.IBK증권이 분석 대상으로 삼는 국내 주요 � �조업체 106개사를 대상으로 살펴보면 대체로 2006~2009년 대규모 투자기를 거쳐 올해부터 본격 이익 회수기에 � �어들었다. 그 결과 매출액 대비 설비투자 비율은 2006년 11.2%에서 내년 6.4% � 까지 대폭 떨어질 것으로 보인다. 설비투자 부담 완화는 이익 안� �성을 높여준다.또 잉여현금을 배당 재원으로 더 많이 활용� 수 있어 두 가지 리� �이팅 조건을 동시에 충족한다.결� � �으로 내년엔 대규모 투자를 이미 완료해 추가 투자 없이도 지속� �으로 이익을 낼 수 있는 기업이 � 망해 보인다. 현금 흐름이 좋아지� � �버리지가 급격히 낮아� � 주주를 위해 더 많은 돈을 풀 기업을 찾아야 한다는 얘기다. 기아자동차 오리온 KCC 대한� 화 모두투어 등이 대표� �이다.[임진� IBK투자증권 리서치센터장]▶ [화보] "굴욕부터 NG까지"…2010 � �드카펫에서 생긴 일▶ 코스피, 연중 최� 치 행진 후 `숨� 르기`▶ `주가의 역설` PER 높을때 사야 돈번다▶ 코스피, 최� � � 돌파 가능…"주식 팔 이� 없다"▶ 이세은, 반라로 목욕� 촬영 `매끈한 뒤태에 男心흔들`▶ `승승장구` 박진영, 이혼 후 첫 심경� 백 "그 사람에 대한 예의…"[ⓒ 매일경� � & mk.co.kr, 무단� �재 및 재배포 금지]

description.hltext_display: Bouquet Booth gets back to work
description.content:
Tuesdays are the quietest workout day of the week at Fair Grounds, but a couple names of note appeared on the Tuesday tab this week.
Bouquet Booth went an easy half-mile in 50.40 seconds, her first workout since she won the Delta Princess on Nov. 20.
“We just gave her a little break, and that’s worked out well,” trainer Steve Margolis said.
Bouquet Booth is an intended starter in Fair Grounds’ first 3-year-old filly two-turn stakes, the Jan. 22 Tiffany Lass, Margolis said. Margolis also is tentatively pointing Little Miss Holly, a six-length Fair Grounds two-turn maiden winner on Dec. 6, to the Tiffany Lass.
Out for a three-furlong work in 37 seconds was Workin for Hops, who breezed for the first time since rejoining trainer Mike Stidham’s stable following an autumn break. Workin for Hops easily won two grass races at the last Fair Grounds meet and went on to score victories in the Arlington Classic and the American Derby. He subsequently finished third in the Grade 1 Secretariat Stakes and second in the Kent Stakes, his final start of 2010.
Mr. Sly looking to draw in
If you are a looking for an allowance-race feature on the Thursday card at Fair Grounds, well, good luck with that. What passes for the Thursday feature given the absence of a single allowance is race 7, which drew an overflow field of 2-year-old maiden turf sprinters.
There are 10 in the main body of race 7, which is carded for 2-year-olds at 5 1/2 furlongs on turf, and five more horses on the also-eligible list. It’s the first horse among the also-eligibles, Mr. Sly, who has the strongest grass breeding of those who haven’t made a turf start yet. Mr. Sly is by Mr. Greeley and out of Silvester Lady, an English-bred who won the German Oaks. Silvester Lady’s three offspring to race include a minor winner in England.
Yankee Gone South, a first-timer from the barn of trainer Bret Calhoun, has some flashy works on his tab and he’s by the versatile sire Yankee Gentleman, but there’s little turf blood in his immediate female family. Jabulani, another first-timer, is by Speightstown, whose offspring often handle grass, and he does have two siblings who have won on turf, including Proceed Bee, winner of the 2009 Hawthorne Derby.

event_or_fact.property: Bouquet Booth is an intended starter in Fair Grounds? first 3-year-old filly two-turn stakes, the Jan. 22 Tiffany Lass

description.hltext_display: European shares edge up; ARM soars
description.content:
Share on LinkedIn
Share on Facebook
Related Topics
Quotes
LONDON Dec 22 (Reuters) - European shares edged up in early trade on Wednesday, having hit a 27-month high in the previous session, and with Microsoft supplier, ARM (ARM.L), higher after media reports that Microsoft plans new windows for tablets.
At 0821 GMT, the FTSEurofirst 300 .FTEU3 index of top European shares was up 0.1 percent at 1,146.83 points, after rising 1.1 percent in the previous session to its highest close since September, 2008.
"Investors will be happy to see the market close off the year with a decent gain," said Richard Jeffrey chief investment officer at Cazenove Capital Management. "There's a lot of macro information today that may influence people's thinking on 2011."
Chip designer ARM rose more than 8 percent on reports Microsoft MSOFT.O is planning new windows for tablets.
Later, investors' attention will turn to U.S. economic data, such as home sales and GDP growth. (Reporting by Brian Gorman)

description.hltext_display: Feds plan to ban synthetic marijuana 'spice'
description.author: Jamar Younger, Arizona Daily Star
description.content:
TUCSON, Ariz. ? Federal authorities are planning to ban some of the chemicals found in a legal substance that they say, when smoked, gives a high similar to marijuana's but is potentially more dangerous.
The U.S. Drug Enforcement Administration issued the 30-day notice of its intent to temporarily place five chemicals commonly found in synthetic marijuana ? also known as "spice," ''K2" and fake weed ? into the same category as heroin and marijuana. The ban could go into effect as early as Christmas.
Synthetic marijuana is sold legally in smoke shops and online as herbal incense, but it has gained popularity among young people who smoke the product. These synthetic cannabinoids were developed in the last 30 years for research purposes and have not been approved by the U.S. Food and Drug Administration for human consumption, according to the DEA.
Despite disclaimers on the products that they are not intended for human consumption, manufacturers and retailers play up the fact that their use can't be detected on urine drug tests, the DEA said. It's when people smoke these herbs that officials have seen problems.
"People are using it to get high; this is not something that people are putting on a plate and setting a match to," Barbara Carreno, a DEA spokeswoman, said in reference to the products being marketed as incense.
Some of the effects reported when people smoke these substances include anxiety, vomiting, high blood pressure, seizures, hallucinations and non-responsiveness, according to the DEA.
The American Association of Poison Control Centers has received about 2,000 calls nationwide relating to products spiked with these chemicals this year, Carreno said.
The products containing these THC-like synthetics are marketed as legal alternatives to marijuana. THC is the main active chemical in real marijuana that causes the "high" for users.
Synthetic marijuana has become a top seller at many Tucson smoke shops.
Michael Atyani, owner of Sky Smoke Shop, said the herbal packets are a popular item at his shop.
"Everybody is buying it," Atyani said. "It's not the most-sold item, but it's a main item here."
Atyani said he had not received a formal notice from the DEA but had heard about the upcoming change in the law a couple of weeks ago. That's when he stopped ordering the synthetic marijuana and reduced the price of his current inventory to make sure it's all sold before a ban takes effect.
"We sell the product, but it's up to the person buying to go do what they want with it," Atyani said. "But when the DEA puts their hands on something, it's the law, and it's a big deal, so that's why I didn't order more."

description.hltext_display: Budgivning igång på Björksund
description.content:
För tre veckor sedan annonserades Villa Björksund i Rimforsa ut på öppna marknaden för 900 000 kronor.
Efter två visningar är nu budgivningen i full gång.
Det är många som är intresserade av att köpa Villa Björksund i Rimforsa som annonserades ut på öppna marknaden i början av december.
Två visningar
Två visningar har lockat ett 20-tal intresserade och nu är knappt tio intressenter med i budgivningen.
Villa Björksund byggdes som en av Östergötlands mest magnifika ”grosshandlarvillor” 1912 av färghandlare Fritiof Eriksson som sommarställe åt honom och hans familj.
Fritidsgård
För tio år sedan visade en privatperson intresse att för tre miljoner kronor köpa fastigheten men i stället köpte Kinda kommun Villa Björksund med tillhörande tomt på cirka 22 000 kvadratmeter.
Föreningen Fokus Björksund arrenderade fastigheten av Kinda kommun från och med 2004 och fram till i februari i år. Fram till sommaren 2009 inhystes även kommunens fritidsgård i fastigheten men till hösten flyttade den till nya lokaler i Godtemplaregården i Rimforsa.
Stort intresse
På två visningar har ett 20-tal personer visat intresse och flera har hört av sig till mäklare Thomas Johansson:
– Jag har nog haft ett hundratal telefonsamtal från intresserade men intresset har fallet när man inte riktigt har förstått att fastigheten inte får användas till bostadsändamål.
Men knappt ett tio-tal spekulanter finns kvar och i går drog budgivningen i gång.

description.hltext_display: Fem olyckor på kort tid
description.content:
Vägunderlaget är vanskligt på många håll. Allra värst tycks det vara vid Gummetorpasjön, strax söder om Kisa.
– Det är som en isbana, säger räddningschefen Thomas Blixt. Vi har redan haft fem olyckor på nästan samma plats.
Trafikanterna bör ta det extra försiktigt vid Gummetorpasjön.
I måndags larmades räddningstjänsten till just Gummetorpasjön vid tre tillfällen.
– Det var tre singel-olyckor, varav en bil hade voltat ner i diket.
Är du överraskad?
– Nja, Köleforsbron och Gummetorpasjön är två klassiker. Vi får många larm dit varje vinter.
Sänk hastigheten
För tillfället är det extremt halt på riksväg 23/34. Den fuktiga luften från Gummetorpasjön gör det extra besvärligt vid S-kurvan.

description.hltext_display: Deming couple help out Mexican border town
description.author: Rene Romo, Albuquerque Journal
description.content:
PALOMAS, Mexico ? Bloodied and bruised by the economic recession, drug-fueled violence and loss of tourism, this border town south of Columbus has been in dire need of a helping hand.
Two Minnesota transplants now living in Deming, Peter and Polly Edmunds, have extended theirs.
In the last two years, Polly Edmunds, 67, has helped organize a small business that employs seven Palomas women who make oilcloth products such as handbags and tablecloths, which Polly markets in the U.S., including stores in Santa Fe, Albuquerque and Las Cruces.
Peter Edmunds, a 71-year-old who used to run a home restoration business, has concentrated on promoting the use of low-cost, locally built solar ovens that locals can use to cook meals while saving on gas expenses.
And, in November, the Edmundses, founding members of a nonprofit group called Border Partners, launched their latest effort: a school food program to provide burritos to about 250 needy children in three Palomas schools.
"It's a very generous thing for him to do because he's giving his time to people he doesn't even know," said Palomas body shop owner Hector Ramirez recently while meeting with Peter Edmunds. Ramirez, who is involved in the burrito program, added. "I feel like this is a man that God sent to us." At one of the elementary schools where about 200 children are fed through the burrito program, principal Angel Garibay said the meals have provided a boost to the children and helped them better focus on their studies.
When children are hungry, Garibay said, "Progress diminishes. The learning curve just stays low."
Gesturing toward Edmunds and his local partners, Garibay said, "Thanks to the help of the people here, we're making some improvements."
Over a year ago, the Edmundses, enthusiastic users of solar cookers, began demonstrating how to cook with the simple wood and mylar structures in Palomas. Last spring, Peter Edmunds and a Palomas volunteer, 24-year-old Luis Garcia who acts as a translator, built four solar ovens at a local secondary school with the idea that students could use them to heat or cook meals or for science experiments.
Concerned the solar cookers weren't used more, Edmunds and Garcia went to meet with the principal, who said his primary concern was students who were coming to school hungry and had no money for lunch.
Further inquiries led to the realization that students at local elementary schools were also going to school hungry. Peter Edmunds quickly raised about $400 from a few friends and Border Partners board members, which was used to buy 2,000 pounds of pinto beans at a discount from Diaz Farms in Luna County.

event_or_fact.property: It's a very generous thing for him to do because he's giving his time to people he doesn't even know
his primary concern was students who were coming to school hungry and had no money for lunch
Thanks to the help of the people here, we're making some improvements.
"Progress diminishes; The learning curve just stays low.

description.content: 중국 증시가 다시 긴축 압� �에 발목을 잡혔다. 22일 상하이종합지수는 26.21포인트(0.9%) 내린 2877.9에 거래를 마쳤다. 내년 경기 회복 기대로 구리 등 원자재 가격이 강세를 보이며 관� �주가 상승했지만 인플� �이션에 대한 우� �가 다시 부상하자 은행주가 대거 하락했다. 오리엔트 증권의 쉔 양 연구원은 "내년 인플� �이션을 측� �하는 데 어떤 잣대를 들이댈지가 관건"이라� 밝혔다. 초상은행, 중� 은행, 교통은행 등이 2% 내외의 하락폭을 기록했다. 중국 � 한 알루미늄기업은 0.39% 상승 마감했다.[김용영 기자]▶ [화보] "굴욕부터 NG까지"…2010 � �드카펫에서 생긴 일▶ 코스피, 연중 최� 치 행진 후 `숨� 르기`▶ `주가의 역설` PER 높을때 사야 돈번다▶ 코스피, 최� � � 돌파 가능…"주식 팔 이� 없다"▶ 이세은, 반라로 목욕� 촬영 `매끈한 뒤태에 男心흔들`▶ `승승장구` 박진영, 이혼 후 첫 심경� 백 "그 사람에 대한 예의…"[ⓒ 매일경� � & mk.co.kr, 무단� �재 및 재배포 금지]

description.hltext_display: L?âge de glace 4 (Ice Age : Continental Drift) - 1ère photo ! (de Steve Martino)
description.content:
Le 4e volet des aventures de Scrat et de ses potes du jurassique sortira en 2012. Premier cliché !
Après un 3e volet à plus de 886M$ dans le monde, la franchise de la Fox L'âge de glace ne pouvait pas s'arrêter là ! Au contraire, le studio sortira un 4e volet en juillet 2012. Une première image vient de paraître sur le net... Enjoy...

description.hltext_display: Gran Estreno looks for early gift in feature
description.content:
Tis the season of giving, and Fair Grounds, hosting a rare Wednesday card, has offered up to horseplayers its strongest weekday program so far this 2010-11 racing season. The 10-race card kicks off with an open maiden special weight, includes a fairly appealing Louisiana-bred turf starter allowance, a Louisiana-bred entry-level allowance, and, better still, an open second-level turf-sprint allowance. Even then, the stocking isn’t stuffed: Featured is race 7, a high-end turf-route allowance also open to $80,000 claimers.
As for holiday generosity, the conditions of race 7 come gift-wrapped for morning-line favorite Gran Estreno. The race, carded at 1 1/16 miles on turf, is for horses who haven’t won $36,000 twice since June 22, but various types of races, such as claimers, don’t count against a horse’s eligibility. Gran Estreno has won twice since that date, but the second of those wins was for a $100,000 claiming tag. His other win came in the Grade 3 Washington Park Handicap, and Gran Estreno exits a second-place finish Dec. 4 at Fair Grounds in the Diliberto Memorial Handicap: To say he’s a strong fit in the Wednesday feature is to say too little.
But Gran Estreno figures to go postward well below his 7-5 morning-line odds. Though he ran well enough in the Diliberto, the performance marked Gran Estreno’s first on-the-board finish in three starts over the Fair Grounds grass course, and Gran Estreno, on the cusp of his 8th birthday, returns after just 17 days’ rest. Perhaps worse still, there are just five other horses entered in the Wednesday feature, and for some reason, the combination of a standout favorite and a short field often produces a less-than-obvious outcome. Maybe Gran Estreno isn’t such a cinch after all.
Two other Diliberto runners are among Gran Estreno’s opponents. Ready Set finished seventh in the race, Caberneigh fifth, and both horses raced closer to the pace than they’d prefer. But perhaps more dangerous than the Diliberto two is Cross Village, who hasn’t started since a ninth-place finish in the Grade 3 Arlington Handicap on July 17. Cross Village is a 4-year-old with only eight grass starts, and he was showing signs of serious improvement over the summer. Working at Hawthorne for his comeback, Cross Village has posted a series of encouraging workouts, and his trainer, Ingrid Mason, has won with four of her last eight starters returning from layoffs similar to that of Cross Village.

description.hltext_display: US poised to approve nuclear arms pact with Russia
description.author: Desmond Butler, Associate Press
description.content:
WASHINGTON ? The Senate is poised to approve a nuclear arms pact with Russia, handing President Barack Obama a huge victory on his top foreign policy priority.
Passage of the New START treaty appeared assured after 11 Republicans joined Democrats in a vote Tuesday to end debate on the pact. That signaled that Obama should have the two-thirds majority he needs when the Senate votes on final approval Wednesday.
The approval would mark a big comeback for Obama's arm controls efforts after the treaty appeared all but dead just weeks ago. It also would allow Obama to continue efforts to improve relations with Russia.
Ratification would mark a third recent major political victory for Obama, even though his Democratic party was trounced in last month's congressional elections. In recent days he won passage of a bipartisan tax deal and a vote ending the ban on gays openly serving in the military.
"We are on the brink of writing the next chapter in the 40-year history of wrestling with the threat of nuclear weapons," Foreign Relations Committee Chairman John Kerry, a Democrat, said after the vote.
The treaty would limit each country's strategic nuclear warheads to 1,550, down from the current ceiling of 2,200. It also would establish a system for monitoring and verification. U.S. weapons inspections ended last year with the expiration of a 1991 treaty.
The administration was adamant that it be ratified this year because the Democrats' majority in the Senate is set to shrink by five in January and waiting could have meant months of delay or defeat.
Republicans accused Democrats of rushing approval of the treaty for political reasons. They have asserted it would limit U.S. missile defense options and argued it has insufficient procedures to verify Russia's adherence.
When Jon Kyl, the leading Republican on negotiations over the treaty, suggested a delay last month, Obama appeared unlikely to find the nine Republican votes needed for passage.
But he and top members of his administration lobbied intensely, with Obama postponing his Christmas vacation in Hawaii. They enlisted support from top military officials and big-name Republicans from past administrations who argued the treaty was essential for U.S. national security.
In the end, they persuaded enough Republicans to defy the party's top two leaders in the Senate and support the pact.
"We know when we've been beaten," Republican Sen. Orrin Hatch told reporters hours before Tuesday's vote.
Even the Senate's No. 3 Republican, Lamar Alexander, endorsed the accord, saying he was assured U.S. defenses would not be weakened.

event_or_fact.property: We know when we've been beaten
We are on the brink of writing the next chapter in the 40-year history of wrestling with the threat of nuclear weapons

description.hltext_display: FDP-Politiker fordern Ende der Debatte über Westerwelle
description.content: Berlin (dpa) - Die FDP erneut im Umfragetief: Jetzt versuchen führende Liberale, die Debatte über Parteichef Guido Westerwelle zu beruhigen. Entwicklungsminister Dirk Niebel mahnte, die FDP könne nur bestehen, wenn sie zusammenhalte. Der Chef der Jungen Liberalen, Lasse Becker, forderte Westerwelle aber auch zur Selbstkritik auf. Becker appellierte an den Parteichef, beim Dreikönigstreffen in Stuttgart "selbstkritisch den einen oder anderen Fehler zu benennen". In der jüngsten Forsa-Umfrage ist die FDP auf drei Prozent abgesackt.

description.hltext_display: 대우건설, 현대 제치고 강남 보금자리 시공사 선정
description.content: [이데일리 박� 응 기자] 대우건설이 현대건설을 � �치� 강남 보금자리 아파트를 짓게 됐다.한국� 지주택공사(LH)는 강남 보금자리시범지구 A2 블록 시공사를 대우건설로 � � �했다� 22일 밝혔다.지난 21일 기� � �안 평가에서 대우건설(047040) 컨소시엄은 85.84� �을 받아 82.84� �을 받은 현대건설(000720) 컨소시엄을 3� �차로 눌� �다� 밝혔다.이어 이� 개봉한 입찰가격에서도 대우건설이 현대건설보다 90억원 낮은 1046억원으로 나타나 시공사로 최종 � � �된 것이다. 기� � �안 60%, 가격 40%를 반영하는 방식이다.대우건설의 컨소시엄 지분은 42%이며 대림산업(000210)(39%)과 태영(19%)이 참여하� 있다. 현대건설 컨소시엄은 금호산업(002990)과 KCC건설(021320)이 함께 참여했으나 기� 과 가격 모두에서 떨어졌다.이 사업은 세곡 보금자리 지구 내 900여가구의 아파트와 근린생활시설 등을 짓는 공사다. `강남 보금자리`라는 상징성과 함께 LH가 세종시 첫마을 커뮤니티센터 공사에 이어 두번째로 실시하는 기� � �안입찰이라는 � �에서 높은 관심을 모아왔다.앞서 시공사를 � � �한 서울 서초 보금자리 A2 블록의 경우 최� �가낙찰� �를 통해 서희건설이 공사를 하� 있다.▶ 관� �기사 ◀＜ⓒ종합 경� �� �보 미디어 이데일리 - 무단� �재&재배포 금지＞

description.hltext_display: 不排除系统性风险 主力是否再次借机洗盘
description.author: info@cnfol.com
description.content:
手机免费访问 www.cnfol.com 2010年12月22日 15:15 吴玲 联讯证券
查看评论
周三沪深股指小幅高开，两市早盘弱势震荡、走出二八行情，下午美韩再次军演消息再次触动投资者脆弱的心态、引发跳水，再度出现一波放量杀跌，尾盘两市企稳、这说明又是一次市场洗盘动作，投资者不必过于恐慌，近一月以来指数历次回到平台顶部就缺乏上行动力，主要原因是量能不足，现这个平台不知道还要运行多久，但有一点可以很明确，量不出来，这个平台是始终会跌破的。随着年终的降至，资金面的紧张，以及政策面的不明朗、而投资者有对于紧缩过分的悲观或担忧，市场走的很犹豫、投资者投资意愿非常谨慎，大盘上攻量能不足，随着时间推移，不排除年终大盘出现比较大的系统性风险，投资者应该做好心理准备，操作建议，谨慎投资逢高降低仓位、高抛低吸。
从本周市场走势可以看出国内投资者处于极度恐慌当中，但过度的恐慌同时也表明，市场对于利空的反应已经极为充分，短期市场仍在震荡格局，下行有效突破2800点的可能性比较小，但就目前市场的成交量来说上行突破2900点继续上攻的概率也不大，目前不排除主力借政治紧张洗盘、基金机构乘机调仓换股，其实我们可以看到对于紧张局势恐慌的大多数是不具备战略思维的中小型机构和个人投资者，但超级机构无视这个利空继续低吸，一方面说明局势未必如媒体报告的那样悲观，另一方面也说机构借利空积极寻找安全边际较大、估值较明显优势的板块进行配置。

description.hltext_display: Que justice soit faite - la critique
description.content:
Un film de vengeance particulièrement violent aux propos ridicules. On passe...
L'argument : Dix ans après le meurtre de sa femme et sa fille, un homme se dresse contre le procureur en charge du procès des meurtriers, pour obtenir lui-même la justice. Sa vengeance menace tout aussi bien l'homme qui leur a accordé la clémence, que le système et la ville elle-même.
Notre avis : Sorti aux USA en 2009, il y a donc plus d'un an, s'était fait sérieusement égratigné par la critique locale pour finalement dégoter 70M$ du côté du public visiblement favorable à ses propos. Inquiétant... Ce "vigilante movie", ou film de vengeance en français, revient à un genre propre aux années 70, mais à la sauce contemporaine, le propos ne passe plus. Scénario con comme la lune et violence de pacotille, ton sérieux rasoir et comédiens qui cabotinent (Gerard Butler frise le pathétique ; Jamie Foxx n'en est pas loin non plus)... on est bel et bien face à un gros nanar dont la sortie française est totalement injustifiée ! Oui, on l'avoue, on avait misé pour un direct-to-video pour cette série B qui hésite systématiquement entre Saw et la saga des Justiciers, mais un distributeur, pourtant très avisé habituellement, a décidé de le montrer au public français. Vous allez donc tous, citoyens de France, découvrir le massacre de la famille du personnage de Butler. Gratuit et outrancier, pour ensuite assister à sa sinistre vengeance de derrière les barreaux, car comme Jigsaw dans Saw qui oeuvre mort, ici Butler croupissant en prison, est capable de mettre la ville à feu et à sang. Honnêtement, c'est le pire film qu'on ait pu voir cette année. Dommage que 2010 s'achève avec pareil machin.
La bande-annonce : ICI

description.hltext_display: Iranian Chaos: Spontaneous Revolt Against the Regime
description.content:
The port of Bandar Abbas is one of Iran?s major shipping hubs, as well as a big naval base in the Straits of Hormuz, and the site of a big refinery.� It is now in chaos.� Thousands of trucks, many of them loaded with imported foodstuffs, commercial goods of all description, and even oil products, have blocked the city?s roads, effectively ending all movement in and around the port.� The drivers simply shut down their rigs, took the coils out of the engines, and walked away.� On the water, there?s a similar shutdown of the hundreds of small boats and ferries that usually carry thousands of people each day to the nearby islands as well as to Dubai.� They have clogged the harbor, and nothing is moving.
This is the result of the Iranian regime?s cancellation of energy subsidies, proudly announced by President Mahmoud Ahmadinejad on Sunday.� One of the subsidies was on diesel fuel, which has now become eight or nine times as expensive as it used to be, and the drivers can?t survive the cost, nor can the ferry companies.� So they went on strike.
It is hard to get details and there are of course many rumors.� It seems certain that the regime dispatched some ten thousand Revolutionary Guards to ?establish order,? but it?s the wrong remedy.� Even the toughest of them can?t convince a truck to start itself, or a ferry to get out of the way.� The Deputy Minister of Transportation arrived late this afternoon and met with the leaders of the drivers and ferry pilots, offering to let them raise their prices, although not nearly enough to compensate for the blow of the canceled subsidies.� Government officials were overheard arguing with the Guards, who seemed sympathetic to the workers.� Not a good sign for the regime.

entity.property: Regime The port of Bandar Abbas

description.hltext_display: 여수박람회 예산 확보 촉구 상경투쟁
description.content: 여수시민들, 국회·세종로 � �부청사·청와대 앞 등서 예산 미편성에 항의[� �남CBS 박형주 기자] 여수세계박람회 예산 미편성에 항의하는 여수시민들이 22일 청와대와 국회, � �부청사 앞 등에서 시위를 벌이� 긴급 편성을 촉구했다.국회와 세종로 � �부청사, 청와대 앞에서 여수박람회 예산 미편성에 항의하는 여수시민들의 분노 목소리가 울� � 퍼졌다.여수지역 89개 시민사회단체들로 구성된 여수시민비상대책회의는 오는 시민 120여 명과 재경 향우회 30여 명 등 모두 150여 명이 참여한 가운데 상경 투쟁을 벌였다.참석자들은 피켓을 들� "여수세계박람회가 여수지역만의 행사가 아닌 우리나라가 세계와 한 약속인데도 � �부가 관� � 예산 확보에 소극� �인 태도를 보이면서 불과 일년 반 � �도를 앞두� 국� �� �인 망� 을 살 우� �에 처해 있다"� 밝혔다.참석자들은 내년 2월 추경에도 필요한 예산을 충분히 반영하지 않으면 박람회 보이콧 운동을 � �개� 것이라며 이명박 대통� �의 결단을 촉구했다.참석자들은 한나라당과 국무총리실, 특임장관실 관계자 등을 만나 항의 서한과 함께 여수시민들의 분노의 목소리를 � �달했다.한편 국회 시위 현장에 함께한 주승용 의원은 "여수지역 국회의원들이 대통� � 면담을 요청했� , 면담이 성사되면 특단의 대책을 요구해 내년 2월 추경에서 예산이 반영되도록 � 것"이라� 밝혔다.상경투쟁을 마친 대책회의는 앞으로 시민 만 명 서명 운동과 투쟁기금 모금 운동을 지속� �으로 � �개하� , 대통� � 면담 성사 등 추이를 지켜본 뒤 충분한 변화가 없으면 다시 상경투쟁을 벌이는 등 투쟁 수위를 높여간다는 계획이다.jedirush@cbs.co.kr[관� �기사](대한민국 중심언� CBS 뉴스FM98.1 / 음악FM93.9 / TV CH 412)www.nocutnews.co.kr) 무단� �재 및 재배포 금지

description.hltext_display: Burlesque - la critique
description.content:
Cette comédie musicale avec Christina Aguilera et Cher, d'une naïveté affligeante, s'inscrit comme un divertissement gentillet sans aucune ambition.
L'argument : Une jeune rebelle de l'Iowa, débarque à Los Angeles sans le sou pour tenter sa chance dans le show-business. Elle se retrouve très vite engagée comme serveuse dans le cabaret Burlesque, tenu par la charismatique Tess, au bord de la faillite...
Notre avis : Ne soyons pas méchants, Burlesque est regardable. Il se suit. Mais non sans ennui ! Dépourvue d'intérêt, l'intrigue de la comédie musicale américaine de cette fin d'année (après Chicago ou Nine) n'a rien à raconter. Rien qui n'aurait déjà été dit mille fois ailleurs - en pire (Dancing girls) ou en mieux (Showgirls de Paul Verhoeven). Cette success story de cabaret d'une bouseuse de l'Iowa dotée de rage, de talent et d'un joli minois, cumule un autre handicap, ses dialogues. Tous d'une naïveté affligeante dans leur philosophie de comptoir, ils s'accompagnent en plus de personnages sans zone d'ombre, unilatéralement mous et sans aspérité. La palme revient au serveur tombeur qui devient l'ami de la nouvelle venue en ville, la peu farouche Christina Aguilera, et qui gravit, lui aussi, bien vite les échelons : il passe de meilleur pote au statut de boyfriend officiel. Il faut dire qu'à s'exhiber en débardeur ou torse nu, il ne pouvait en être autrement. Cette gravure de mode synthétise à elle seule toute la fadeur d'un script qui n'est là que pour faire baver les minettes qui en sont encore à acheter leur premier disque de Lady Gaga et séduire les fans homosexuels d'Aguilera et de Cher. Pour eux également, une poignée de personnages homos toc, une chanson de Marilyn ou de Madonna... C'est d'un convenu !
Pour son grand retour à l'écran, la chanteuse Cher vient cachetonner sans effort devant la caméra de Steven Antin avec lequel, pour la petite histoire, elle a partagé le même homme... le mogul David Geffen ! En vieille tenancière de cabaret respectée et respectable, elle auditionne, regarde ses recrues sur scène d'un air complice... Elle chante deux fois, notamment un slow sirupeux qui devrait faire l'objet d'un single. Elle ne fait rien d'autre, rien qui puisse en tout cas la remettre sur la voie des Oscar.
Cette ancienne actrice dramatique (Mask de Peter Bogdanovich en 1985) tombe bas alors que face à elle, Christina Aguilera, en ce moment en pleine guerre avec Lady Gaga pour s'imposer comme la nymphette (avec voix) trashouille de sa génération, ne vaut guère mieux. Elle s'agite souvent comme une grue, oubliant qu'à bientôt 30 ans, elle a passé l'âge de jouer à la jeune fille paumée qui découvre la grande ville et ses pièges. L'audacieuse chanteuse de Dirty (dans la vidéo, elle jouait à la traînée au milieu d'une meute d'hommes chiens du ghetto en rut) minaude et se croit souvent dans l'un de ses clips. Ce n'est pas comme cela qu'on devient comédienne !
Pour plus d'infos sur le film, voir ICI
La bande-annonce : ICI

description.hltext_display: Girls roundup: Wilson Central gives Jackson Co. first loss
description.content:
Wilson Central 53, Jackson Co. 51: Ieshia Hassell scored 20 points and led a fourth-quarter rally for Wilson Central (9-0) in a 53-51 Mid-South Classic semifinal win over Jackson County (9-1).
Moore Co. 49, Cookeville 27: Rachel Garland, Sarah Raby and Heather Vann scored 14 points each for Moore County (12-1) in the Mid-South Classic.
Harpeth Hall 58, Marlborough 56: Stephanie Seeley's two free throws in the final seconds gave Harpeth Hall (9-2) a victory in the Nike Invitational. Campbell Mobley finished with a game-high 21 points for Harpeth Hall.
Smyrna 58, Marshall Co. 46: Antionette Jenkins scored 27 points and hit four 3-pointers for Smyrna (2-8).
Hickman Co. 52, Jackson Chr. 36: Hannah Pendergrass scored 24 points for Hickman County (5-6).
Franklin Co. 66, McMinn Co. 42: Danielle Jordan and Chelsea Holman scored 20 points each for Franklin County (5-7).
Kenwood 59, La Vergne 42: Blake Jenkins led Kenwood (7-5) with 30 points.
Clarkrange 70, Oneida 29: Tara Donhauser scored 19 points, including four 3-pointers, for Clarkrange (9-2).
Red Boiling Springs 88, Breckinridge Co. 72: Layce Colter scored 30 points and hit four 3-pointers for Red Boiling Springs (13-0).
Friendship 52, Ezell-Harding 46: Laurel Burroughs scored 19 points to lead Friendship (7-3). Samantha Hoback scored 19 for Ezell-Harding (3-5).
McEwen 49, East Hickman 39: Sam Smith scored 20 points to lead McEwen (8-2) past East Hickman (4-10).
DeKalb Co. 45, Watertown 38: Martha Webb scored 19 points in DeKalb County's (7-4) win over Watertown (7-2). Morgan Gartner finished with a game-high 22 points in the loss.
Hillsboro 61, Madison-Ridgeland 36: Lady Vols signee Isabelle Harrison scored 28 points to lead Hillsboro (3-6) in the Ensworth tournament.

description.hltext_display: 行情上下两难 机会到底隐藏在哪？
description.author: info@cnfol.com
description.content:
近期盘中总是突然跳水，然后大家就是反复纠结，想卖出觉得十分难以其舍，而买入有时觉得风险在狂奔而至，这样的走势反复在抹平心态，使得整体盘面人气很低迷，到底市场出现了什么？才使得如此值得期待的市场变成这样的冷若冰霜呢？到底2800点是不是一个我们常说的重要的底部呢？我们今日就要深度阐述这样的话题。
虽然短期股指存在反复的可能，但系统风险较小，随着市场对政策、经济、流动性层面预期的逐步改善，明年初市场机会大于风险。那今日之所以出现了整理的态势，我想还是和昨日的疯狂地产上找点原因，周二地产股上涨主要原因是市场盛传未来部分拟出台房产税试点城市的政策将较市场此前预期显著偏松。其认为该传闻若属实意味着房价上涨预期将再度趋于强烈，与政府的调控政治意图不符，所以该传闻的确凿性有待观察。而结合周三的市场走势来分析，可能思路更加的清晰明了，本次地产股上涨仅仅是超跌反弹的交易机会概率较大，手中未持有地产股的投资者目前不建议追高。所以反复成了定局。大家也没有必要过分的去觉得2800点的支撑能力了。
既然这样考虑事情，结论很简单了，维持短期系统风险较小、明年初市场上行机会大于下行风险的判断。主要基于明年初政策面好于预期的可能性增大，经济增速将确定性回升、流动性数量预期会因信贷高峰的到来而向好、资金实际成本依然很低的判断。
那震荡是不是就是最近主要的走势呢？会延续多少时间呢？
首先答案是可以确定的，投资者理性与非理性的交替可以用换手率来衡量，投资者趋于理性则市场波动将趋于稳定。通过对近期A股换手率的分析，我们认为，目前A股的换手率已经处于历史低位，市场正在向理性期过渡，近期市场将呈现窄幅震荡格局。
其次就是看看统计分析能给予我们什么启迪呢？目前A股换手率为0.75%，投资者行为趋于理性。从全球各市场的历史情况来看，中国A股、台湾以及韩国市场的投资者存在较为明显的非理性行为，而美国市场和香港市场非理性程度较弱。当前A股换手率为0.75%，远低于历史均值，与美国、香港的十年平均换手率水平(0.69%、0.54%)相当，说明现阶段市场理性程度已经趋近于香港、美国的水平，投资者行为正在趋于理性。故此，要放着大眼光去选择趋势性的个股，也要着眼于当下，选取波段的差价机会。
另外，很多人又开始担心解禁股对于市场的影响了，我还是想说点相对客观的观点。
虽然短期流动性趋紧，但本周A股解禁后大股东集中减持风险较低，并不会对本周走势造成趋势性影响。上周公开市场操作继续净投放，但银行间市场拆借利率大幅度提升，说明银行间短期流动性趋紧；本周解禁规模加大，但由于解禁股以大盘蓝筹股为主，解禁类型更是以定向增发、股权分置配售股份为主，对A股影响较弱。
总之，上周通胀数据出台，11月CPI同比升幅破5%，创28个月新高，但央行并未加息，而是再度上调存款准备金率，加息时间窗口再度延后，市场不确定情绪趋缓，理性投资将驱动市场震荡上行。与此同时，目前A股的换手率已经处于历史低位，市场正在向理性期过渡，近期市场将呈现窄幅震荡格局也是可以正常理解的，故此，结合观点就是很明确的实战思维，短线想下跌很难，但想出现行情似乎也不容易，还是严格延续前期的观点，2750-2950点之间震荡，寻求个股的机会，而在2800点为中轴的情况下，尽量去完成波段的价差。

description.hltext_display: Another year - la critique
description.content:
Cette chronique des quatre saisons dans la vie d'une famille réunit tous les thèmes de Mike Leigh et dose avec brio rire et émotion.
L'argument : La famille et l'amitié. Amour et réconfort. Joie et peine. Espoir et découragement. La fraternité. La solitude. Une naissance. Une mort. Le temps passe... Notre avis : Après la Palme d'or attribuée en 1996 à , Mike Leigh ne semble pas avoir eu la reconnaissance cannoise qu'il aurait mérité. Vera Drake (2004) ne fut même pas sélectionné, avant d'obtenir le Lion d'or à Venise ; et comme (2002), Another year est reparti bredouille, quand il s'agit d'un sommet de sa filmographie. Au rythme des quatre saisons, nous suivons le quotidien de Tom et Gerri, un couple de la classe moyenne britannique, et de leurs proches : fils revenant le temps d'un week-end au domicile familial, bonne copine à la masse, fan de digestifs et de jeunes hommes dont elle pourrait être la mère, vieux copain déjanté... La banalité apparente des situations révèle en fait les failles, doutes, désarrois et espoirs de cette petite communauté : on n'est pas loin de Tchekhov par cette aptitude à mettre en exergue des questions existentielles au gré de discussions autour d'un dîner, d'une tasse de thé ou d'un bon vin. Jamais le dosage de rire et d'émotion n'avait atteint une telle harmonie : peine de cur, deuil, joies de retrouvailles et naissances justifient des ruptures de ton subtiles, sans que jamais Mike Leigh ne soit tenté par le mot d'auteur facile ou la sensiblerie. Il n'est pas superflu d'ajouter que le cinéaste est décidemment un directeur d'acteurs hors pair : si Jim Broadbent et Ruth Sheen sont impeccables en hôtes ordinaires empreints d'humanité, Lesley Manville crève littéralement l'écran. Sa composition de femme esseulée dont les extravagances masquent de réelles fêlures ont fait d'elle une sérieuse prétendante au prix d'interprétation.

description.hltext_display: Not the real deal
description.content:
Processors, processors, processors — what are you doing to nature’s almost perfect food? As dairy farmers, we would like to thank Kristen Ellis (letter, Dec. 19) for speaking out about the replacement of our delicious chocolate milk with the sickeningly sweet “chocolate beverage.” It is NOT the real deal! Why is it even in the dairy section disguised as real chocolate milk? Even the packaging suggests that it is the real thing. Mooove if out of the dairy aisle!
Henry and Carol Janssens

description.hltext_display: Les yeux de Julia - la critique
description.content:
Entre surnaturel et thriller, Les Yeux de Julia, par l'équipe ibérique de L'orphelinat, flirte avec le giallo et on aime ça !
L'argument : Quand Julia apprend la mort soudaine de sa sur Sara, tout semble clairement indiquer qu'elle s'est suicidée. Mais Julia n'arrive pas à accepter cette version des faits et commence à passer au crible les événements qui ont eu lieu les derniers mois avant le drame.
Notre avis : Sorti à la Toussaint en Espagne après un passage à Sitges et une campagne publicitaire orchestrée par Universal digne d'un blockbuster américain, Los ojos de Julia a connu un très gros démarrage dans son pays d'origine. Il s'agissait ici de faire écho au triomphe historique de L'orphelinat en 2007, pour mémoire, le plus gros succès de l'histoire du cinéma ibérique, ni plus, ni moins.
On retrouve donc ici la plupart des protagonistes à l'origine de L'orphelinat. La boîte de prod' Rodar y Rodar, Guillermo del Toro pour l'estampille de respectabilité et surtout l'actrice star du jalon originel, Belén Rueda dont la popularité en Espagne est au firmament. Finalement seul le réalisateur de L'orphelinat n'est pas de la partie, puisque s'en est allé à Hollywood développer quelques projets (il était un temps associé à Twilight 3 et bosserait aujourd'hui sur un drame avec Naomi Watts et Ewan McGregor). C'est un cinéaste aussi catalan que lui qui s'est attelé à la réalisation des Yeux de Julia. Le jeune Guillem Morales, célèbre pour ses courts gay (notamment l'excellent Backroom en 1999) et un premier long présenté à Sitges en 2004 (El habitante incierto, aussi efficace qu'inédit dans l'Hexagone).
Intervenir après L'orphelinat est sans nul doute une tache ingrate, puisque les attentes des spectateurs sont forcément élevées. En Espagne du moins. De surcroît le film de Bayona avait une fâcheuse tendance à récupérer tout le jargon du film de fantôme ibérique à la Guillermo del Toro (), Jaume Balaguero (Fragile) ou encore Amenabar (Les autres). Il fallait donc éviter la redite et prendre ses distances vis-à-vis des tendances surnaturelles un petit peu désuète. Aussi, la première surprise ici revient au genre même du film. Les yeux de Julia n'est pas un film fantastique et encore moins un film de fantôme, mais un authentique thriller. L'héroïne enquête ainsi sur le suicide de sa sur jumelle qui souffrait de cécité. Pourquoi celle-ci s'est-elle donnée la mort alors que l'espoir de recouvrer la vue renaissait. Elle va remuer ciel et terre pour se rapprocher d'une vérité d'obscurité et de ténèbres, alors qu'elle souffre des mêmes symptômes que sa jumelle. En effet, au fil de l'intrigue, elle voit sa vue diminuer et finalement disparaître.
Si l'enquête familiale adopte rapidement un discours rationnel, associant le trépas de la suicidée à la présence énigmatique d'un homme de l'ombre, au sens littéral de l'expression, l'ambiance n'en demeure pas moins celle d'une uvre fantastique. La caméra agile de Morales joue sur les angles et les points de vues, effleure les murs et s'attache à décrire un cadre d'intérieur ou de quartier à la cinégénie d'un conte macabre. On est à la lisière du surnaturel, mais les rebondissements eux, sont ceux du thriller opaque. Opaque comme la visibilité déclinante de la protagoniste, mais aussi comme la tournure que prennent les événements. L'insolite et l'inattendu étant ce que le script cherche le plus à atteindre.
Parmi les surprises qu'offre Les Yeux de Julia, c'est bel et bien un dérapage certain vers le giallo dans la dernière demi-heure. Quelques éléments ici et là nous font passer d'un pays latin à un autre. Le suspense de l'héroïne au seuil de la cécité (mais pas de l'aveuglement) face à un assaillant inconnu, pervers et manipulateur, aimant les mises en scène, est lui transalpin !
Toujours enclin à palper les ténèbres, le film de Guillem Moralès est un jeu d'ombre et de lumière, une mise en abîme pour le spectateur qui doit se prêter à un exercice terrifiant : faire du sens et déceler l'intrus dissimulé dans le noir. Le suspense marche à fond, même si la beauté vénéneuse de la mise en scène laisse poindre une touche de classicisme évidente et surtout en dépit d'une avalanche de rebondissements sur la fin qui nous porte au seuil du grotesque.
la bande-annonce : ICI

description.hltext_display: Fyra poäng av Kim Nilsson.
description.author: Björn Forsgren
description.content:
Fyra poäng av Kim Nilsson
AIK hade inga problem att besegra Linköping. Efter fyra poäng av landslagsstjärnan Kim Nilsson vann Gnaget med hela 8–2.
Samtidigt vände Dalen och vann mot Falun vilket gör att Umeålaget hakar på i toppstriden. Topplagen fortsätter övertyga i superligan. Topptrion Warberg, AIK och IBK Dalen har skapat sig ett försprång och serietrean Dalen ligger sex poäng före Storvreta på fjärdeplats.
I kväll kom nya segrar från såväl AIK som Dalen.
1–0 efter första perioden följdes av ett AIK-ryck till 4–0 i andra. Matchen slutade 8–2 efter två mål och två assists från landslagsstjärnan Kim Nilsson. Desto jämnare var det i Umeå. Dalen–Falun brukar vara jämna tillställningar med mycket känslor och så var det också i kväll. Falun ledde med 4–2 i andra perioden, men i tredje lyckades Dalen vända och vinna med 7–5 sedan Falun tröstmålat i slutminuten.
Schweizaren Cédric Rüegsegger gjorde det matchavgörande 6–4-målet med två och en halv minut kvar.
FC Helsingborg tog en viktig trepoängare mot Capeirotäby vilket innebär att de kämpar sig allt närmare slutspelsstrecket. AIK: Emanuel Antener 3, Kim Nilsson 2, Ricard Norman, Kristoffer Kranberg, Karl–Johan Nilsson.
Linköping: Anton Karlsson, Martin Karlsson.
Publik: 701. Caperiotäby: Andreas Ackevi, Rickie Hyvärinen, Danne Bron–Sundbom.
Helsingborg: Magnus Anderberg 2, Santtu Manner, Marcus Gullstrand, Linus Nordgren, Mattias Helgesson.
Publik: 475. Dalen: Jonas Svahn 2, Max Wahlgren, Peder Bodén, Johan Samuelsson, Cédric Rüegsegger, Peter Sundelin.
Falun: Jakob Lundmark, Jack Kvist, Ciya Hajo, Johannes Skog, Alexander Carlström. Publik: 1 417.

description.hltext_display: 券商：后市震荡 关注化工和新能源
description.author: info@cnfol.com
description.content:
手机免费访问 www.cnfol.com 2010年12月22日 15:11 证券时报网
查看评论
周五，两市高开低走，午后出现一波跳水走势，截至全天收盘，沪指跌0.9%收于2877.9点。收盘后，本网采访了国金证券策略分析师杨建波。
杨建波表示，今日市场受上调成品油的刺激，在石化双雄带领下高开，有色、煤炭、房地产延续昨日强势，但个股分化明显。下午受韩国23日即将在韩朝边境大规模军演的影响市场出现一波明显的跳水走势，尾盘跌幅有所收窄。纵观全天表现，盘面热点有扩散迹象但板块走势分化严重，人气仍处于谨慎中，成交量无法有效放大，预计后市仍将围绕2900点反复震荡。他认为，虽然年底市场仍将面临许多不利因素，但后市震荡走高的概率较大，面对震荡的市场，操作上，建议稳健持股，既要避免短期追高的风险，又要保持稳定的心态，短线可关注化工新材料板块和新能源板块。
本文可能影响到的板块个股

description.hltext_display: Royal Currier outlasts favored Fort Hughes by head in Southampton
description.content:
Alyssa Spakowski/EQUI-PHOTO
Royal Currier (4), under Stewart Elliott, withstands a late move by 2-5 favorite Fort Hughes, ridden by Ramon Dominguez, to win the Southampton.
Jockey Stewart Elliott turned out to be a better handicapper than the public, who made New York shipper Fort Hughes the 2-5 favorite in Tuesday’s $75,000 Southampton Stakes at Parx Racing. Named on two horses, including the Darley Stable-owned Fort Hughes, Elliott chose to retain the mount on locally based 2-year-old gelding Royal Currier, who was coming off a wire-to-wire victory in an overnight stakes at Belmont Park.
Elliott made the right choice as Royal Currier ($8) held off Fort Hughes by a head in the six-furlong Southampton, an overnight stakes for 2-year-olds.
Elliott had Royal Currier sit just off the early pace set by Unleash the Humor, part of a coupled entry for trainer Mark Shuman. Royal Currier, trained by Patricia Farro, took a short lead passing the three-eighths pole, opened a clear lead, then had just enough to withstand Fort Hughes and jockey Ramon Dominguez.
Fort Hughes, who won his career debut at Belmont in October with an impressive 91 Beyer Speed Figure, easily was second best, finishing 2 ¾ lengths in front of Unleash the Humor’s stablemate, Sky Wars, in a field reduced to five by two scratches, including recent New York Stallion Stakes winner Eminent Tale. The winning time was 1:09.66.
A son of Red Bullet owned by Mat Stables, Royal Currier is now 4 for 6 lifetime. He was claimed out of a win while running for a $20,000 tag at Monmouth Park in early September and proceeded to take an optional claiming sprint at Delaware Park and finish second in a starter allowance at Monmouth before winning the Grey Planet at Belmont Park by 2 ½ lengths on Oct. 31.

description.hltext_display: Mon beau-père et nous - la critique
description.content:
Le troisième épisode de la saga Mon beau-père fait assurément partie des pires comédies de l'année. A fuir d'urgence.
L'argument : Il aura fallu 10 ans, deux enfants avec sa femme Pam et d'innombrables obstacles pour que Greg soit enfin accepté par son beau-père. Les doutes de Jack réapparaissent lorsque Greg, à court d'argent, travaille au noir pour un laboratoire... Quand l'ensemble du clan Furniker, y compris Kevin, l'ex de Pam, se retrouve pour l'anniversaire des jumeaux, Greg doit prouver à Jack qu'il est un vrai chef de famille. Mais après tous les malentendus, l'espionnage et les missions secrètes, Greg va-t-il réussir l'examen final de Jack et lui succéder à la tête du clan...ou le cercle de confiance sera t-il brisé pour toujours ?
Notre avis : Après un premier volet fort sympathique, suivi d'un deuxième opus qui sentait déjà le réchauffé, la saga des Fockers (Furniker en français) a été reprise des mains de Jay Roach par le réalisateur Paul Weitz, responsable du premier American Pie. L'air de rien, cette passation de pouvoir a son importance. Effectivement, le troisième volet des aventures de la famille Focker s'oriente définitivement vers une surenchère de gags scatos (on y vomit beaucoup) ou portés sur le sexe. Les auteurs, en terrible manque d'inspiration, nous servent une bonne dizaine de fois le même gag déjà vu dans la série adolescente citée ci-dessus : un personnage est surpris par un groupe de gens dans une situation scabreuse ou embarrassante. Si cette mécanique comique fonctionne de temps à autre, elle ne peut en rien compenser la médiocrité de l'écriture d'un long-métrage en roue libre. N'ayant tout simplement rien à jouer, les acteurs en profitent pour grimacer et rouler des yeux. Même de grands comédiens comme , Dustin Hoffman et Owen Wilson se fourvoient lamentablement. Seul interprète à ne pas succomber aux sirènes de l'outrance, Ben Stiller reste digne et apporte l'unique touche d'humanité d'un long-métrage qui en est dépourvu.
Pire, le film en profite pour chanter les louanges de la famille traditionnelle, avec une féroce condamnation de toute forme d'adultère. Dans ce cortège d'idées conservatrices, on notera également une tendance à faire l'apologie d'une éducation élitiste, le tout enrobé dans un produit fun qui veut se donner des airs de critique sociale. Outre un cruel manque de gags vraiment drôles, une absence totale de la moindre idée de mise en scène et un scénario qui ne sait pas bien comment prolonger une saga sur le déclin, Mon beau-père et nous célèbre les bonnes vieilles valeurs familiales que chérissent tant les Américains. Le spectateur qui se sera aventuré dans la salle en pensant passer un joyeux moment en famille risque une belle déconvenue. On vous aura prévenu.
La bande-annonce : ICI

description.hltext_display: Related: Recipe: Chocolate Fruitcake
description.content:
½ cup shortening
1 cup sugar
3 eggs
3 1-ounce squares unsweetened chocolate, melted
2 cups all-purpose flour
2 teaspoons baking powder
1 teaspoon salt
1 teaspoon cinnamon
2 tablespoons milk
3 cups mixed chopped candied fruits and peels
1 cup raisins
1 cup broken walnuts
2 teaspoons butter
Cocoa powder, to coat the pan
Heat the oven to 275 degrees Fahrenheit.
In a large bowl, use an electric mixer to cream the shortening and sugar until creamy. Add the eggs, one at a time, beating well between. Stir in the chocolate.
Sift together the flour, baking powder, salt and cinnamon. Add the flour mixture to the egg-sugar mixture in batches, alternating with the milk. Mix well. Stir in the candied fruit, raisins and walnuts. Use the butter to coat a 10-inch tube pan. Dust the pan with cocoa powder, tapping the pan to remove any excess. Spread the batter into the pan and bake for 1 hour 40 minutes, or until a knife inserted at the center comes out clean. Cool in the pan.
Makes 12 servings; per serving: 416 calories; 185 calories from fat (44 percent of total calories); 21 g fat (6 g saturated; 3 g trans fats); 56 mg cholesterol; 58 g carbohydrate; 7 g protein; 3 g fiber; 200 mg sodium.
