description.hltext_display: GT5 functionality update
description.content:
As reported on PlayStation Blog - a very special Christmas present to all of you have been enjoying the pleasures of the real driving simulator over the last few weeks. Confirmed today is that a new functionality update has been made available for GT5. The update features the following new functionality.
Seasonal Events
[Seasonal Events] has been added to the upper left of the [GT Mode] – [GT Life] screen. From here you can participate in official events being held for a limited time.
In these events, all participants are under the same regulations, and if you complete the event you will win rewards and experience. Compete on the leader boards with players around the world, in Time Trials and Drift Trials!
Hot Car Dealer
A [Hot Car Dealer] has been added to the left centre of the [GT Mode]-[GT Life] screen. In the Hot Car Dealer you'll find popular and rare used cars.
You might just come across that one car you've always been looking for, that you haven't been able to find in the [Used Car Dealer]
Online Race Rewards and Experience
When you complete a race in the [Open Lobby] or [My Lounge], you will now gain rewards and experience.
Even if you are focused more on playing online, you'll still be able to gain rewards and levels that you need to progress in [GT Life].
Driving Distance and Number of Wins in Online Races
The driving distance and the number of wins you achieve when you complete a race in [Open Lobby] or [My Lounge] will now affect your stats in [Profile] and the [Garage].
Here again the results from your online play will cumulate within [GT Life].
Improved Rewards
The rewards for winning races in both A-Spec and B-Spec in [GT Mode]-[GT Life] have been increased for a limited time. (Until the end of January, 2011).
This is a great chance for those who were previously having difficulty getting ahead in the game, due to a lack of funds for tuning and purchasing required cars.GT5
There will be further enhancements and updates to come in the future, so until then enjoy the great new functions and keep a check on the PlayStation Blog and gran-turismo.com for more news.

description.hltext_display: 电动汽车股票有哪些电动汽车股票有哪些|问题热度：☆|电动车电瓶股了还能修吗，还有我的电瓶12A的可以换20A的吗?
description.content:
20a的吗?2010-12-12公益广告提醒您:绿色是地球的本色问题:我的电瓶车电瓶充了20小时电瓶壳子股了,去修理部说建议我换新的,我想知道还能用多长时间本人从网络搜集到的最佳答案:电池鼓胀后基本上没有修复价值了以为电池本身已经坏了!电池鼓胀后会严重失水,如果鼓胀的不是很严重然后电压正常那么我叫你简单的维护一下;把电池小盖片用小起子撬起然后你会看到六个加酸口把胶冒叩开用针筒每个口加20毫升纯净水不要加太多加好后把胶冒盖上然后把撬开的盖片用101或502粘上就行了。这个方法能起到一定的效果。但必须按我说的那样做!本人从网络搜集到的其他答案1:坏了就不能修的以上答案是本人从网络收集整理而来,答案真伪请访问者自行辨别判断!如需转载请注明转自本博,谢谢合作!本人从网络搜集到的其他答案2:首先一点是你的充电器也出了问题,一般来说当电瓶充电饱和以后充电器会自动切断充电电源不会过充。不过,你的电瓶还能继续使用只是它储存的电量不会太多了也就是说车行驶路程没有以前长。按你电瓶现在状况来说也就是再用半年左右就不行了。我建议你还是容量12a的为好。以上答案是本人从网络收集整理而来,答案真伪请访问者自行辨别判断!如需转载请注明转自本博,谢谢合作!本人从网络搜集到的其他答案3:鼓得厉害的话,还是换新的吧!你的是踏板电摩吗!如果是的话,大部分是可以换20ah的电池的,主要是看你的车上的电池盒子能不能装进去!能装进去,就可以换!以上答案是本人从网络收集整理而来,答案真伪请访问者自行辨别判断!如需转载请注明转自本博,谢谢合作!公益广告提醒您:地球是我家,绿化靠大家非常欢迎您来到我的博客,有你我的博客才会更加精彩!这里还有很多不足的地方,希望你能留下宝贵的意见!希望您能找到您的问题和答案,如果没有,请回复留言吧。历史上的今天:海鸥卫浴股票|问题热度:☆|如何分析股票2010-12-12
上一篇：什么叫b股股票蓝筹品种|问题热度：☆☆|什么叫蓝筹股?什么叫A股?什么叫B股?麻烦帮我介绍一下股票的基本知识好吗/

description.hltext_display: La evolución alimentaria del hombre se hace exposición
description.content:
El MEH lanza la 'Dieta que nos hizo humanos', su segunda muestra temporal
Mie, 22/12/2010
MARTA CASADO / Burgos
El Museo de la Evolución Humana y la Cátedra Tomas Pascual Sanz- Cenieh han puesto en marcha la segunda exposición temporal del centro museístico burgalés. Tras el Making of sobre cómo se hizo el Museo se busca ahora profundizar en un viaje evolutivo centrado en cómo ha variado el menú de las diferentes especies de homínidos. Cocinas y restaurantes minimalistas se combinan con conocimientos científicos y rostros del pasado para definir que los alimentos han tenido mucho que ver en cambios fisiológicos que han derivado en el Homo sapiens actual.
El director del Museo de la Evolución, Javier Vicente, el presidente del Instituto Tomás Pascual Sanz, Ricardo Martí Fluxá, la comisaría de la muestra e investigadora del Cenieh, Ana Mateos y la coordinadora general del MEH, Aurora Martín han presentado la muestra que podrá visitarse hasta el mes de abril.
El viaje arranca en el restaurante. Una estancia minimalista donde, además del menaje de restaurante y la carta del menú se entremezclan conceptos de alimentación y evolución como fórmula para que el espectador se plantee preguntas. Unas cuestiones a las que se da respuesta en la cocina donde se manejan las diferentes disciplinas científicas y de análisis que permiten definir la variación de menú en los últimos cuatro millones de años. Éstos cambios de carta se han dado desde los primeros Australopitecos y sus diferentes variantes que se alimentaban de frutos, hojas, insectos con especial mención a los Parántropos, una especie que ante la potencia de su mandíbula eran considerados como cascanueces vivientes. Los primeros Homo ergaster y habilis que comienzan a consumir carnes y grasas. Tienen una dieta más variada hasta llegar al canibalismo, del que la prueba más antigua se encuentra en Atapuerca. Tras conocer la cocina de los neandertales la muestra no termina con los sapiens y su introducción de aves, peces y moluscos y la producción de alimentos en el neolítico. Se termina con el Homo gastronomus que ha convertido la cocina en un arte, que se rige por los sabores pero que ha roto el diálogo con los diseños evolutivos de la especie vinculados a algunas enfermedades como diabetes u obesidad.
Actividades paralelas
De forma paralela al desarrollo expositivo, el Museo de la Evolución Humana plantea actividades didácticas. Entre ellas figura un previo acuerdo con la Federación de Empresarios de Hostelería de Burgos para definir un menú prehistórico. Pero también se plantean charlas sobre dietética, encuentros con cocineros, la dieta vista a través del cine así como talleres demostrativos y catas. De forma paralela se plantean dos visitas guiadas a la muestra que estará abierta en el horario del Museo.

description.hltext_display: We have eggs
description.content:
Two eggs. So simple. So satisfying. Their discovery launched an exciting day in chicken ranch land.
We have no proof here at Kismet Acres that they are the product of one of our original hens. In fact they probably are not. We bought three more "hens" this week. The really nice guy who sold them said that most of his flock were already laying. We're hoping that they set a good example for the original flock.
We considered a different breed from our first Rhode Island Reds. I recalled that our daughter in New Zealand had found a stray hen. I guess it was a stray, can chickens be feral? Anyway, the other hens shunned her: Wouldn't let her eat with them or sit on their nest. She lived a lonely existence. So I didn't want to get, say a Barred Rock, and have her fall victim to the kind of prejudice that Laurel's newcomer chicken endured.
The seller assured us that chickens practice tolerance. However, we decided the Rhode Islanders are so pretty we'd stick with them.
Saturday morning I checked on them and they were getting along famously. That's when I saw that we had two, perfect if a little small, creamy brown eggs in nests. Immediately I felt relief that we would not be the only ones contributing to this farmer-bird relationship.
The new birds got their wings clipped before we put them in their new home. But somehow one jumped over the fence. I heard the commotion as a stray dog dragged one of the hens off and gave chase. The dog stopped as I yelled and that gave the hen the second she needed to escape. Missing feathers but apparently OK otherwise, she rested awhile in the hen yard before going up the ramp and inside.
One of the chickens came out to check on her. One with a suspiciously large comb and wattle. One who seems to be making different sounds. One we believe might just be a rooster.
Happy birthday Wednesday to Linda Smith, Bill Dismuke, Terry Cordell, Chanisa Howell, Jalan Jones, Michelle McCray, Rashequa Haddock and Keisha Tayor, all of Sherman; Alexis Taylor Mosley and Frederick Linwood, both of Denison; Hazel Bracht and Sally Harris, both of Bells; Shirley Littrell and Dakota Washburn, both of Savoy; Will Tramel of Frisco; Zachary Hickman of Southmayd; Clayton McCraw of Telephone; and twins, Kendall Hall and Kennedy Hall, both of Dallas.
Happy anniversary Wednesday to Melvin and Sandra Miller of Luella, 39 years; Joe and Darlene Lyles of Ivanhoe, 38 years; Tim and Sandra McKinney of Sherman, 23 years.

description.hltext_display: 168 names added to Riverside County victims' wall
description.author: DAYNA STRAEHLEYThe Press-Enterprise
description.content:
Photo Gallery: "A Victim's Voice Will Be Heard" Almost 300 people braved the rain Tuesday evening to pay tribute as the Riverside County district attorney's office added 168 names to its Victims' Memorial Wall. "You people will remember your families no matter how much it rains or snows," said speaker Collene Campbell, chairwoman of National Force 100 and founder of Memory of Victims Everywhere. Her son, Scott, was murdered, and later so were her brother and sister-in-law, motorsports legend Mickey Thompson and his wife, Trudy.
Campbell, of Orange County, now advocates for victims' rights and said her son's killer had been let out of prison. "Most of our family members are dead because of criminals who were given another chance," she said. Like Campbell, most of those attending were family members of the victims. Some victims' relatives sobbed openly. "I am one ticked-off old broad," Campbell said. She told the grieving relatives their loved ones were "killed by people who are evil." Some of the 168 were murdered in the past year, and the names of others were engraved after their relatives brought their omission to the district attorney's office, which verified their cases. The wall, located on an outside wall of the DA's office, was dedicated exactly one year before, said John Hall, public information officer for the district attorney.

description.hltext_display: •遇到不斷相親“擇優錄取”的劈腿男
description.content:
http://www.tianshannet.com 天山網 2010年12月22日 11:54:52 我來說兩句
更換背景顏色︰
更改文字大小︰
你遇上的，只是一個不斷相親，然後“擇優錄取”的劈腿男，不要因為“喜歡”而固執的拒絕去相信你感覺到的事實。
我和男朋友是相親認識的，彼此可能感覺都不錯吧。從認識那天一直見面，到現在我已經有三天沒見到他了。也沒有主動給我打電話或者發信息，我給他打電話總是說他這幾天忙。
第一、他要是在乎我他就是在忙也會給我打電話什麼的吧？
第二、他刪了我給給他空間留的關心的話。
第三、從上2點，我覺得他有別的朋友。
我就發信息給他，我說要是你有女朋友，就告訴我，不要欺騙我。他回我的是︰“我要是有還相親，你既然懷疑，你自己看著辦！”
我覺得他很高傲。他真的是忙，還是真的有其他女友？以我一貫的性格早火了，只是我還是滿喜歡他的，我該怎麼辦？

description.hltext_display: 国王杯-巴萨战平10连胜终结 梅西替补难破门
description.content:
北京时间12月22日凌晨3时，10-11赛季西班牙国王杯1/8决赛首回合，巴塞罗那主场迎战毕尔巴鄂竞技，双方最终战成0-0，六冠王各项赛事10连胜嘎然而止。下半场比利亚曾打进一粒好球，但被判越位无效。
这是双方2010年最后一场比赛，也是百年历史第163次交战，此前162战巴萨以77胜26平59负占优，其中在诺坎普球场以55胜9平8负占绝对统治地位。双方曾在2009年国王杯决赛和西班牙超级杯决赛（两回合制）相遇，巴萨三战全胜。本赛季西甲第5轮巴萨曾客场3-1击败对手，是役比利亚曾因报复对手而遭红牌驱逐。
上半场毕尔巴鄂率先开球，10秒便发起中场长传冲吊，皮克大脚解围。第3分钟客队右路长传，禁区内缺乏高点接应。第5分钟哈维中路转移，阿尔维斯右路连过2人，禁区内射门被挡。第7分钟伊涅斯塔中场挑传，博扬弧顶远射被扑，这是双方今天第一脚有威胁射门。
梅西和比利亚今天没有首发，巴萨锋线突破力度不强，较多采用了远射，第10分钟哈维传，凯塔弧顶远射偏出。第12分钟哈维右路禁区前直塞，佩德罗跑位差了5米，梅西、比利亚的价值此处可体现。第14分钟阿尔维斯右路传中，客队门前一片混战，凯塔抬脚射门抡空。
缺乏射手的巴萨只能采用外围战术，第17、20分钟阿尔维斯两次右路起球，禁区内无高点接应，巴萨的突破战术今天暂无发挥。第24分钟巴萨经过一系列配合后，伊涅斯塔弧顶完成一脚质量极高的远射，被伊拉佐兹单掌托出横梁。第28分钟伊涅斯塔中路带球，弧顶远射再次被伊拉佐兹单掌托出横梁。
第31分钟毕尔巴鄂中场起球，伊图拉斯佩门前抢点捅射，平托稳稳扑住。1分钟后哈维-马丁内斯对哈维-埃尔南德斯犯规，领到了本场双方第一张黄牌。第37、38分钟客队门将两次罚球拖延时间，现场球迷一片嘘声。第43分钟佩德罗左路下底传中，球滑门而过。1分钟后古佩吉铲倒伊涅斯塔，领到本场客队第二张黄牌。伤停补时第1分钟，哈维禁区前挑射偏出，双方暂以0-0结束上半场。
易边再战，双方暂未换人，第46分钟梅西在场边热身。第48分钟伊涅斯塔弧顶分右，阿尔维斯下底传中，伊拉佐兹摘高空球发动反击，毕尔巴鄂右路突破传中，伊戈尔中路包抄稍稍跑过了位置。第51分钟佩德罗右路传中，哈维门前包抄挑射稍稍高出，这是巴萨今天最佳机会。
第52分钟梅西登场，换下凯塔。2分钟后毕尔巴鄂用前锋穆尼安尼换下伊戈尔，双方皆加强进攻。第59分钟佩德罗跃起争顶，古佩吉狡猾地站在原地将佩德罗顶翻，裁判判巴萨任意球，却未向古佩吉出示黄牌。第63分钟比利亚换下博扬，巴萨锋线重归MVP组合（梅西+比利亚+佩德罗）。
梅西上场后巴萨进攻速度加快，第69分钟梅西禁区前带球连过2人，被断后巴萨中场就地拦截再次进攻，阿尔维斯右路下底小角度射门偏出。第73分钟梅西禁区前在对方球员拉拽下带球连过2人，主裁判鸣哨，巴萨获得27米任意球；哈维主罚直接射门，被伊拉佐兹摘得。
第78分钟梅西弧顶直塞，比利亚倚住对方后卫射门偏出，随后阿德里亚诺换下马斯切拉诺。第81分钟巴萨进球，却被判无效，梅西禁区内射门打在对方后卫身上变线，比利亚跟进破门，边裁示意比利亚越位。
比赛最后时刻巴萨发起猛攻，第85分钟哈维弧顶挑传，比利亚反越位成功，但包抄稍慢一步。第87分钟梅西右路禁区前传中，皮克门前包抄射偏。伤停补时第1分钟，阿尔维斯右路传中，门将没收；第2分钟佩德罗右路下底传中，后卫挡出底线；角球罚出，哈维传中，后卫解围。全场比赛结束，双方0-0战平。
巴萨（4-3-3）：
门将：13-平托
后卫：2-阿尔维斯、3-皮克、22-阿比达尔、19-马克思维尔
中场：6-哈维、14-马斯切拉诺（79'阿德里亚诺）、15-凯塔（52'梅西）
前锋：17-佩德罗、9-博扬（63'比利亚）、8-伊涅斯塔
毕尔巴鄂（4-3-3）
门将：1-伊拉佐兹
后卫：15-伊劳拉、6-圣乔斯、4-乌斯塔蒂兹、3-科基利
中场：18-古佩吉、24-哈维-马丁内斯、14-苏赛塔、11-加比隆多、8-伊图拉斯佩（72'奥拜斯）

description.hltext_display: Cinnaminson's Hazell realizes dream
description.author: Marc Narducci
description.content:
Hazell became the first minority coach in the 90-year history of the program. He replaced Doug Martin, who resigned last month.
The 46-year-old Hazell spent the last seven seasons as an assistant at Ohio State. Most recently he was the Buckeyes' assistant head coach and also coached the wide receivers.
He was also an assistant coach at Rutgers, West Virginia, Army, Penn, Oberlin College (serving two different stints) and Eastern Illinois.
During his long career, Hazell has coached running backs, receivers, tight ends and also served as offensive coordinator at Oberlin College from 1989-91.
Despite moving up the ladder, he has never forgotten his roots. "I had a great time attending Cinnaminson," Hazell said in a phone conversation on Tuesday. "What was great was how close everybody was." Hazell, who also ran track at Cinnaminson, attended Division III Muskingum College in New Concord, Ohio, where he was a three-time, all-conference performer and earned all-America honors as a senior.
Right after college he began his long journey as an assistant coach. "I learned something at every place I coached," he said. Hazell will be doing double-duty for the next few weeks. Ohio State is playing Arkansas in the Sugar Bowl on Jan. 4 in New Orleans. Even though he has his new job, Hazell said he didn't want to leave Ohio State until the season was complete. "I love my players at Ohio State," he said. "I want to see it right though." Hazell is a first cousin of Cinnaminson's most famous football family, the Collinses. Andre Collins was the most well known of the family, a former star at Penn State and in the NFL. Hazell vows that he will be returning to his roots to recruit. "I want to work the 1-95 corridor in recruiting," he said. "I know what great players there are in the South Jersey, Philadelphia area and I will be there for sure." Hazell is fulfilling a dream by being named a head coach. His base salary will be $300,000 with additional contractual details yet to be worked out, according to the school. "I'm proud and excited to be named Kent State's head football coach," Hazell said. "I believe this is a tremendous opportunity and I can't wait to give the Golden Flashes' fans the winning program they deserve." Contact staff writer Marc Narducci at 856-779-3225 or mnarducci@phillynews.com.

description.hltext_display: Today's local news briefsFROM: Ulster County, Saugerties, DCC, Wallkill
description.content:
FROM: Ulster County, Saugerties, DCC, Wallkill
3 Ulster legislators on state committees
KINGSTON — Three Ulster County legislators have been appointed to standing committees of the New York State Association of Counties.
The announcement was made by Legislature Chairman Frederick Wadnola, R-town of Ulster.
Legislator Peter Loughran, D-Kingston, has been reappointed to the Intergovernmental Affairs Committee, on which he has served for the past eight years.
Legislators Brian Shapiro, D-Woodstock, and James Maloney, R-town of Ulster, will serve on the Economic Development, Environmental and Rural Affairs Committee.
Get a sneak peek of redone Saugerties library
SAUGERTIES — The group Friends of the Saugerties Public Library will host a preview of the remodeled and refurbished Saugerties Public Library from 2 to 4 p.m. Jan. 22.
The friends group will be joined at the event by members of library’s Board of Trustees.
The event is free and open to the public. Continued...
Reader Comments »
View reader comments (0) » Comment on this story »
Friends of the Saugerties Public Library recently contributed $62,500 to the library for the Adult Reading Room and Reference Room furnishings and for exterior landscaping.
DCC program for EMTs wins accreditation
POUGHKEEPSIE — The Dutchess Community College Emergency Medical Technician-Paramedic program has been reaccredited by the Commission on Accreditation of Allied Health Education Programs.
Students in this associate degree program master advanced life support skills, which are learned in college laboratories, affiliated hospitals and advanced life support ambulances.
The Commission on Accreditation of Allied Health Education Programs is the largest programmatic accreditation organization in the health sciences field. In collaboration with its Committees on Accreditation, the organization reviews and accredits more than 2,000 educational programs in 22 health science occupations.
For more information about the DCC program, contact Seth Goldstein at (845) 298-0717 or seth.goldstein@sunydutchess.edu.
Wallkill school district sets two budget forums
WALLKILL — The Wallkill school district will host two community forums to gather input from residents about the district’s 2011-12 budget.
The first will be at 7 p.m. Jan. 4 in Plattekill Elementary School’s Library/Media Center; the second will be at 7 p.m. Jan. 12 in the Wallkill Senior High School Library/Media Center.

Students in this associate degree program master advanced life support skills, which are learned in college laboratories, affiliated hospitals and advanced life support ambulances.
The Commission on Accreditation of Allied Health Education Programs is the largest programmatic accreditation organization in the health sciences field. In collaboration with its Committees on Accreditation, the organization reviews and accredits more than 2,000 educational programs in 22 health science occupations.
For more information about the DCC program, contact Seth Goldstein at (845) 298-0717 or seth.goldstein@sunydutchess.edu.
Wallkill school district sets two budget forums
WALLKILL — The Wallkill school district will host two community forums to gather input from residents about the district’s 2011-12 budget.
The first will be at 7 p.m. Jan. 4 in Plattekill Elementary School’s Library/Media Center; the second will be at 7 p.m. Jan. 12 in the Wallkill Senior High School Library/Media Center.
Reader Comments »

description.hltext_display: Totalslut pĂĽ snĂśskyfflar
description.content:
Snösvängen går för högtryck över hela landet.. Snöskovel,snöraka eller snöskyffel eller vad man väljer att kalla de åtråvärda snöskyfflarna har blivit hårdvaluta i dessa bistra vintertider.
I hela Vansbro kommun har butikerna sedan länge sålt helt slut på de fåtal man lyckats att hitta. Nu väntar butikerna och många kunder med spänning på om det ska komma några fler leveranser den här vintern. – De är slut i hela kommunen och man har samma problem över hela landet och det var lika förra året, tillägger Tomas Hermansson på Granngården i Hulån. Han menar att den enkla förklaringen är att snön nu ligger över hela landet. Det har lett till att tillverkarna, och de som importerar snöskyfflar, inte haft en chans att hinna med. De senaste veckorna har man haft många kunder som kommit till Granngården och som fått vända hem tomhänta. – Vi har blivit lovade en leverans i nästa vecka, men det är knappt jag vågar säga det då vi inte vet hur många vi får, säger Tomas Hermansson. Butikskedjorna portionerar nu ut snöskyfflarna man lyckas hitta över hela landet. Det är även skälet till att man inte vet hur många man får i nästa vecka på Granngården. Det är inte bara brist på de moderna snöskyfflarna i plast. Även de så kallade snösläderna är slut i alla butiker. – Vi samarbetar ju med de flesta butiker här i kommunen och de står även och väntar på nya leveranser, säger Tomas Hermansson. LEIF OLSSON 0281-713 43 leif.olsson@daladem.se

description.hltext_display: Los vuelos para viajar a Praga en Carnaval ya están a la venta
description.content:
Solo 200 de 700 personas han optado por cambiar la fecha
Mie, 22/12/2010
C.V. / Burgos
El 4 de diciembre, más de 700 personas se quedaron en tierra en el aeropuerto de Villafría después del plantón de los controladores aéreos. Sin embargo, solo unos 200 han optado por posponer su viaje a marzo, en concreto, del 4 al 8 de marzo. Por ello, ya se han puesto a la venta las plazas restantes en las agencias de viajes de la capital, según explicó ayer el portavoz del equipo de Gobierno, Javier Lacalle, tras la celebración de la Junta de Gobierno Local.
El destino elegido para estas fechas es la República Checa, mientras que el circuito de Milán y Florencia, se deja para más adelante, ya que va dirigido a un público más concreto. Lacalle no descartó, además, que en un futuro se pueda incluir alguna otra ciudad del norte de Italia.
Desde el Consorcio para la Promoción del Aeropuerto de Burgos-compuesto por Ayuntamiento, Diputación y Junta de Castilla y León- trabajan en la determinación de otros destinos después de que una de sus grandes apuestas- el turismo de ski- tuviera que ser abandonada hace poco más de una semana como consecuencia directa de la cancelación de los charter durante el puente de la Constitución.
En este sentido, durante la festividad local del Curpillos en el mes de junio, el Consorcio tiene previsto programar otro vuelo a Praga aunque no será el único. En las próximas semanas se presentarán los destinos para esta fecha y para las vacaciones de Semana Santa, matizó el edil popular.

description.hltext_display: LBSU shows flash of what could be
description.author: Robert Morales Staff
description.content:
LONG BEACH - If the Long Beach State women's basketball team can find a way to bottle what it did in the first half Tuesday against North Carolina State, the 49ers might be able to do some damage in the Big West Conference.
Trailing by 14 points with 5:37 left in the half, the 49ers went on a 19-5 run that culminated with a pretty eight-foot scoop shot by Lyndsay Heard that tied the score at the buzzer.
But the Wolfpack opened the second half with a 7-0 run and went on to a 92-72 victory over Long Beach before 487 in the Beach Classic at Walter Pyramid. The 49ers trailed, just 71-67, with 6:38 to play but were outscored 21-5 down the stretch.
With that, Long Beach is now 2-11. But Coach Jody Wynn was not chagrined. She particularly liked the way her team played in the first half when it appeared it might be down by 20 at intermission.
"We didn't play scared," Wynn said. "We got down but we didn't get rattled and I think we just felt like we can compete. And I think the girls are getting more confident in each other. And it helps when you have kids coming off the bench contributing like they did tonight in Lyndsay Heard and Ella Clark. That really helps out people like Tipesa (Moore), Courtney (Jacob) and Brandi (Henton)."
Starters Jacob and Moorer scored 14 points apiece to lead the 49ers and Henton - who played just 14 minutes because of foul trouble - had 10 points. Moorer had eight rebounds and four assists, Jacob hadyld_mgr.place_ad_here("adPosBox"); seven rebounds and five assists. Heard and Clark each scored 10 points off the bench; Clark also had seven rebounds and two blocked shots.
Unfortunately for Long Beach, it was not able to keep things going in the second half against a solid ACC team.
"I think what happened was, in the second half they kind of imposed their will on us and they got second-chance points and they scored on the block and got some and-1s," Wynn said.
Although the offensive rebounds were nearly identical - 19-18 in favor of the Wolfpack - North Carolina State had 29 second-chance points to just eight for Long Beach.
Still, Jacob liked what she saw - the loss notwithstanding.
"The way we were passing the ball and moving the ball and working together today was a lot different than we've seen," she said.
North Carolina State (7-6) had six players score in double figures. Leading the way was Bonae Holston with 17 points and 10 rebounds. Marissa Kastanek and Brittany Strachan scored 13 apiece.
Wolfpack coach Kellie Harper was not astonished that the 49ers put up such a good fight for most of the game.
"Well, I was a little disappointed in the way we ended the (first) half," she said. "I thought we were a little tired and they made that run when we were not as focused as we need to be. We knew they were going to play hard and be scrappy for 40 minutes and we knew we were going to have to really battle in that area."
Harper had some words of wisdom for her players at halftime.
"To start the second half we just really challenged our kids to get down defensively and guard somebody," she said.
Long Beach will take a few days off, then return to practice to begin preparing for the conference opener Dec. 30 against UC Santa Barbara at Walter Pyramid.

description.hltext_display: Memorable 2010 Cricketing Moments (3) - A hat-trick in sri lanka after nine years
description.content:
A hat-trick in cricket is a rare phenomenon that it has happened only on 27 times in ODI cricket. Even though Test cricket has been played for over hundred years, the longer form of the game has seen only 38 such instances. Sri Lankan fans had an opportunity to see a hat-trick being recorded this year when Farveez Maharoof ran through India’s lower middle order in Dambulla and his was the first on Sri Lankan soil since Chaminda Vaas’ effort against Zimbabwe at SSC in 2001. Overall, there have been just two hat-tricks recorded in Sri Lanka with the first such effort coming from Pakistani all-rounder Abdul Razzaq, who achieved the feat in Galle in 2000 in a Test Match when he dismissed Romesh Kaluwitharana, Rangana Herath and Nuwan Zoysa in successive balls in Sri Lanka’s first innings of the second Test.
Then Chaminda Vaas achieved a hat-trick in an ODI against Heath Streak’s Zimbabwe followed by Lasith Malinga six years later during a stunning spell where he did even better by claiming four wickets in four balls in a World Cup game against South Africa in Guyana that Sri Lanka almost won. Vaas also claimed a hat-trick in a World Cup game against Bangladesh in Pietermaritzburg in 2003. This hat-trick was unique as it was recorded off the first three balls of the match.
On June 20th this year, Maharoof joined the two illustrious Sri Lankan cricketers becoming the third man to take a hat-trick (Nuwan Zoysa is the only Sri Lankan to take a hat-trick in Test cricket) when he performed the feat against India in Dambulla during the Asia Cup.
Sri Lanka had long prayed for a fast bowling all-rounder, a component successive Sri Lankan coaches felt will serve the team well particularly when they travel overseas playing in conditions which suit fast bowlers. Farveez Maharoof had been long earmarked as a future Sri Lankan prospect while at schools and he graduated to the national side immediately from school when he was chosen to play in Zimbabwe.
He had progressed smoothly before he began to be down with injuries, particularly in between or during some of Sri Lanka’s crucial campaigns. Around the same time Angelo Mathews emerged and it looked as if Mathews, another Sri Lanka under-19 captain, had more to offer than Maharoof forcing the former Wesleyite out of the side.
Then the arrival of Thissara Perera, another fast bowling all-rounder, pushed him completely out of the radar and his selection to the Asia Cup squad this year came as a massive surprise. He had played his last ODI more than a year ago and hadn’t done anything startling to regain his place in the side.
The selectors were asked about the thinking behind and journalists were told that Maharoof was ideally suited for conditions in Dambulla.
His comeback was against Pakistan, a game that Sri Lanka won comfortably, but Maharoof contributed just one run with the bat and failed to pick up a wicket.
But he was a revelation when he played the game against India a week later. Sri Lanka had opted to field first, but India didn’t encounter many problems as they reached 189 for four with still 12 overs left.
There was a sudden slump and it all started with the run out of captain M.S. Dhoni who was dismissed in the last ball of the 38th over when Chamara Kapugedara was successful with a direct hit.
Maharoof then came on for the second over of his new spell and got going immediately by having Ravindra Jadeja in trouble when the batsman walked across and was trapped leg before wicket. Then next man in Praveen Kumar dragged one onto the stumps to put him on a hat-trick. The game was witnessed by a fairly big crowd and as Zaheer Khan faced the hat-trick ball there was quite an expectation and the prayers were answered when he edged one to Kumar Sangakkara and Maharoof went berserk.
As Maharoof completed the hat-trick it seemed as if the selectors had been spot on saying that he was ideally suited for conditions at Dambulla.
He went onto complete a five wicket haul, only the second time he had taken five wickets or more in an ODI and was named Man of the Match.
India lost four wickets in four balls and slumped from 189 for four to 189 for eight and were bowled out for 209 in 42.3 overs. Sri Lanka had no trouble in chasing the target and got home with seven wickets and more than 12 overs to spare.
"It’s something that I didn’t plan. I am really happy with what I have done. This particular venue suits my style of bowling. It was one of those days where all what I did went perfectly well and hopefully, I’d be able to keep that up in times to come," Maharoof said speaking to journalists after the game.
"There was not much of assistance from the wicket. I just bowled a good length. It was one of those days where it just happens for you. For example, that hat-trick ball, I thought I would bowl there and I bowled and it just happened. Day time it doesn’t do much but it does help bowlers under lights," he added.
Captain Kumar Sangakkara reminded that preparation is extremely vital for an international cricketer when he said, "Farveez, over the last 18 months has realised that nothing comes easy. You have to work hard and if someone’s working harder than you, you’ve got to match that, not just on the field, off the field as well. Training and preparation is the key."
Although he did well in that particular game, the final was a disappointment for Maharoof as much as for Sri Lanka as he failed to take a wicket and contributed with just ten runs with the bat. Fielding has never been his forte and once again he came up with a poor effort on the field in the final.
Although the selectors said that the conditions at Dambulla ideally suited him, he was overlooked for the tri-nation ODI competition that involved New Zealand and India following the Asia Cup at the same venue.

There was not much of assistance from the wicket. I just bowled a good length. It was one of those days where it just happens for you. For example, that hat-trick ball, I thought I would bowl there and I bowled and it just happened. Day time it doesn?t do

It?s something that I didn?t plan. I am really happy with what I have done. This particular venue suits my style of bowling. It was one of those days where all what I did went perfectly well and hopefully, I?d be able to keep that up in times to come

description.hltext_display: Belarus jails 600 held at post-election protest
description.content:
Belarus has jailed 600 demonstrators detained during a mass rally against the re-election of President Alexander Lukashenko, defying fierce Western condemnation of the bloody crackdown.
Police officials said that the protesters would be held for up to 15 days while prosecutors probed their alleged involvement in “organising mass disturbances” – a crime that carries a sentence of up to 15 years.
“It is not a fact that all of them will be released after 15 days,” Minsk police spokesman Alexander Lastovsky told AFP.
Lukashenko vowed on Monday to come down hard on all those responsible for taking part in Sunday’s unauthorised demonstration against his regime.
“That is it,” Lukashenko declared in a nationally-televised press conference. “Our country will have no more senseless, muddle-headed democracy.”
“I warned you,” he added. “Kids - you are messing with the wrong guy.”
The wave of arrests left relatives searching for loved ones in the city’s prisons, with groups scouring the long list of names posted on the walls of one facility and waiting outside its entrance gate in hopes receiving any news.
Once labelled as the last dictator of Europe by Washington, Lukashenko was re-elected to a fourth term on Sunday with nearly 80% of the ballot on Soviet-style turnout of more than 90%.
His nearest rival received less than 3% of the vote in an election that the challengers vowed to contest even before the results became official.
Seven of Lukashenko’s nine election rivals were arrested in what appears to be a massive crackdown on the opposition, with five candidates beaten up by riot police.
Three of them – Ales Mikhalevich, Vladimir Nekliaev and Andrei Sannikov – were being held by the KGB, while two others – Rygor Katusev and Dmitry Uss – were released under orders not to leave the city, their offices said.
Two more candidates – Nikolai Statkevich and Vitaly Rymanshevsky – are still believed to be in police detention.
The Belarussian justice ministry also threatened to ban parties and movements that took part in the protests, with the warning affecting organisations headed by two of the challengers.
The clampdown came despite signals in the last months that Lukashenko was seeking to smooth his isolated former Soviet country’s frayed relations with both the European Union and Russia.
EU officials had promised to offer Belarus up to $3.5bn in loans should it stage a free and fair election. And Russia resolved most of its trade conflicts with its smaller neighbour in the run-up to the vote.
But while Russia refused to condemn the violence, with President Dmitry Medvedev calling it an “internal matter” for Belarus, Belarus was roundly admonished by both the White House and the European Union.
“The US strongly condemns the actions that the government of Belarus has taken to undermine the democratic process,” President Barack Obama’s spokesman Robert Gibbs said in a statement.
The European Union’s top diplomat Catherine Ashton meanwhile called on the regime to “immediately release” the opposition leaders.
But the authorities said they were in fact being lenient and had let “a lot of people” go without prosecution.
“We released several foreign nationals, including journalists,” said top Minsk police official Leonid Farmagei.
The Belarussian Journalists’ Association said that 25 media representatives had been arrested in all. At least four reporters were known to have been jailed for up to 15 days while their cases were being studied.
The KGB was also holding two reporters – Irina Halip, a journalist with Moscow’s opposition Novaya Gazeta newspaper, and Natalia Radina, a worker with Belarus’ Charter97 news website, one of the campaign offices said.

description.hltext_display: Assassin's Creed: The story so far
description.content:
This website requires Flash Player 7 or higher.
It looks like you do not have this installed.
Visit the Adobe website to download the latest version of player..
JavaScript needs to be enabled on your PC in order for you to view this content. Please enable JavaScript and try again.
Travel back in time with Desmond Miles and discover how his ancestors changed history.
It begins...
The year is 2012, and Desmond Miles has been kidnapped by the Abstergo Corporation. Here, he is forced into the Animus; a device able to synchronise the user's memories with their ancestors. Welcome to Assassin's Creed on PlayStation 3.
Desmond's ancestor, Altaïr Ibn-La'Ahad was an assassin during the Third Crusade in 1191. The Animus reveals that Altaïr had been demoted after he broke several Assassins' Brotherhood creeds while attempting to prevent Robert de Sable, the Grand Master of the Knights Templar, from taking an artefact from a temple. Sinan, leader of the assassins, gave Altaïr the chance to restore his status by taking down nine important figures, accountable for continuing the Crusades.
As he completes his assassinations, Altaïr discovers that each target is a member of the Templars searching for Pieces of Eden. Similar to the one Sable was trying to steal, these powerful artefacts are sought after pieces that can control the minds of others.
Discover a rich story filled with twists and turns as both Altaïr and Desmond make startling discoveries that will change their lives and reveal the truth behind the Abstergo Corporation.
The missing link
Taking place between Assassin's Creed and Assassin's Creed II, Assassin's Creed: Bloodlines on PSP follows Altaïr on another astonishing journey. The adventure takes place on the island of Cyprus, in the cities of Limassol and Kyrenia, where the new Grand Master of the Knights Templar, Arnand Bouchart, and other notable Templar leaders are gathering in search of the Apple of Eden. Altaïr finds himself on a quest to hunt down and assassinate the remaining Templars.
This story unravels the links between the game's three main protagonists: Desmond Miles, Altaïr Ibn-La'Ahad and Ezio Auditore da Firenze, and is exclusive to PSP.
History will repeat itself
After escaping the Abstergo Corporation with the help of fellow modern-day assassin Lucy Stillman, Assassin's Creed II on PS3 sees Desmond Miles introduced to Shaun Hastings and Rebecca Crane. The pair have created their own version of the Animus and propose to send Desmond back in time to Renaissance Italy to relive the life of Ezio Auditore da Firenze.
While he relives the memories of Ezio, Desmond is trained in assassin skills he can apply to the present day, and he must try and locate the remaining Pieces of Eden still sought after by the Abstergo Corporation.
Ezio journeys to Florence, Venice and eventually Rome, assassinating political figures and upgrading his weaponry along the way. He finds Rodrigo Borgia, the mastermind behind a conspiracy that caused the death of his father and his brother, and decides to get his revenge.
Desmond and his ancestors will become closer than they ever thought possible in this historical tale of heroism and bloodshed.
Rome is where the heart is
Picking up where its predecessor left off, Assassin's Creed Brotherhood on PS3 follows Ezio to Rome for a new adventure. Cesare Borgia, son of Rodrigo from Assassin's Creed II, has brutally murdered Ezio's uncle Mario and attacked the city of Monteriggioni where Ezio and his remaining family live.
Desmond has also travelled to Italy to relive the events of Ezio's life, and he and his companions set up camp in the ruins of the Villa Auditore. Ezio, determined to take down the Templar Order and kill Cesare Borgia, must form his own Brotherhood and train more assassins to help him complete his mission.
While fighting for justice, Ezio restores Rome to its former glory by refurbishing shops, reviving the city's income and eliminating the Borgia presence.
Post comments and share all the latest PlayStation happenings along with the rest of the PlayStation community at the Official New Zealand

description.hltext_display: 49ers fade away again in 2nd half
description.author: John Marshall The Associated
description.content:
TEMPE, Ariz. - Freshman Kyle Cain had 12 points and 16 rebounds, senior Ty Abbott added 15 points and Arizona State used a big second-half run to pull away for a 72-55 victory over Long Beach State Tuesday night.
Long Beach State (5-8) finally finished off a tough nonconference schedule that should only help once the Big West Conference starts next week. The 49ers started strong against Arizona State, only to fade for the second straight game in their fourth consecutive loss.
Greg Plater had 15 points and T.J. Robinson had 12 points and 13 rebounds to lead the 49ers, who shot 33 percent in their fifth straight road game.
"I told our guys I need a break, they need a break, it's been a long (nonconference) season," Long Beach State coach Dan Monson said. "I think it's a welcome three days off for all of us."
Long Beach had gone through a rough stretch even before Tuesday's loss, dropping five of seven while allowing 80 points or more six times.
Part of it was the schedule.
Long Beach State has already faced two Top 25 teams - San Diego State and Washington - played North Carolina close in Chapel Hill and lost to Clemson and Saint Mary's. The latest was an 82-74 loss to the Gaels on Saturday, when the 49ers shot well early and faded down the stretch. Long Beach State has been without guard Larry Anderson since Nov. 30 due to a broken hand, but had been able to put up some points without him, dropping 91 on Northyld_mgr.place_ad_here("adPosBox"); Carolina, leading Saint Mary's most of the way. But, just like they did against Saint Mary's, the 49ers started clanging shots, hitting just seven of 28 in the second half and shooting 4-for-18 from 3-point range overall.
"Can't win a game individually, that's the main thing," Plater said. "We played good the first 10 minutes because we played as a team, and then the next 30 minutes it was like feast or famine."
The 49ers begin Big West play Dec.28 at UC Santa Barbara.

I told our guys I need a break, they need a break, it's been a long (nonconference) season; I think it's a welcome three days off for all of us.

description.hltext_display: El puente y la pasarela de la Evolución abren esta semana
description.content:
La rotonda de la Plaza de Santa Teresa albergará la estatua de Diego Porcelos
Mie, 22/12/2010
C.VELASCO / Burgos
Los deseos de muchos conductores parece que están a punto de verse cumplidos, y es que, el Ayuntamiento de Burgos pretende abrir, mañana jueves, tanto la pasarela de Atapuerca como el puente de la Evolución. Ambos, puntos de unión entre la avenida del Arlanzón y la plaza de Santa Teresa o el Museo de la Evolución Humana.
A falta de la señalización horizontal del los viales del puente, las condiciones climatológicas condicionarán la apertura definitiva de esta estructura en el día de mañana, por lo que podría posponerse hasta el viernes. En todo caso, cuando esté operativa, «se pondrá en funcionamiento un solo carril de los previstos en cada sentido, y el tránsito de peatones será posible en uno de los lados, en concreto, aguas abajo», relató ayer el portavoz del equipo de Gobierno, Javier Lacalle.
El edil de Urbanismo y cabeza de lista a las elecciones municipales por el Partido Popular señaló que, a lo largo del primer trimestre, se concluirán las obras de este puente con la entrada en funcionamiento de los otros dos carriles. Las aceras tendrán una anchura variable, lo que ofrecerá un aspecto más moderno, que se completará con las barandillas de acero inoxidable y las aceras de granito. La puesta en funcionamiento de esta estructura permitirá distribuir el tráfico en el centro de la capital burgalesa.
Con la apertura del puente se habilita también la plaza de Santa Teresa, en la que se ubicará la estatua de Diego Procesos, tal y como avanzó este periódico a principios de 2010. Un complemento a la rotonda y que será colocado a lo largo del próximo año, ya que es necesario realizar labores de limpieza de la misma. Además, estará orientada en dirección a la Catedral, matizó ayer el edil popular, quien subrayó que, de está forma, se consigue un espacio más diáfano en la plaza de San Lesmes para futuras celebraciones como el Festival de Folklore Ciudad de Burgos.
La inauguración más cercana será la de la pasarela de Atapuerca en el día de mañana. Una obra que se ha ejecutado durante los cuatro últimos meses y que ha contado con un presupuesto de casi 600.000 euros. Con la nueva infraestructura de 56 metros de largo, cinco de ancho en el centro y siete en cada uno de los extremos, se cuadriplica la capacidad de la antigua, que será desmontada en las primeras semanas de 2011, explicó Lacalle.
Ayudas al comercio
Las declaraciones de edil de Urbanismo se produjeron durante un encuentro con la prensa tras la celebración de la Junta de Gobierno Local, en la que se resolvió la convocatoria de unas subvenciones destinadas a siete asociaciones de comerciantes sectoriales de la ciudad por un importe que asciende a los 40.000 euros.
Los beneficiarios de estas ayudas económica- G 9, Mercado Norte, Asocama, Grecabur, Mipesbur, Acotex y Mercado Sur- recibirán un montante total que varía entre los 2.247 del G9 a los 13.657 del Mercado Norte.

description.hltext_display: 北京机动车保险查询北京机动车商业保险将改革车险费率浮动加大
description.content:
北京机动车商业保险将改革车险费率浮动加大2009-10-21 21:52来源:搜狐理财为切实维护被保险人的合法权益,提升车险服务水平,促进道路畅通,北京保险行业将建立商业车险保费与理赔记录挂钩的费率浮动机制,即简化费率浮动系数,加大与理赔次数相关系数的浮动区间,根据车辆过去的理赔记录,由车险信息平台统一计算费率浮动系数,真正实现费率高低与风险状况匹配,解决机动车出不出事故、事故多少与保费无关的不公平问题。今天,北京保险行业协会公布了《北京地区机动车商业保险费率浮动方案(征求意见稿)》,向社会广泛征求意见,广大市民可登录北京保监局网站和北京保险行业协会网站,查询《费率浮动方案》的具体内容,并充分发表意见。《费率浮动方案》的主要内容:一是在保持现行商业车险条款费率不变的基础上,将商业车险《费率调整系数表》中的14项系数简化为4项,取消易被保险公司利用进行不正当价格竞争的系数。二是加大"无赔款优待及上年赔款记录"系数的浮动区间,使安全行车的车主能够享受保费优惠。如车辆五年不出险,保费最低下浮60%,一年出险8次及以上,保费最高上浮至3倍。三是通过北京车险信息平台对各保险公司商业车险承保环节进行系统管控,确保各公司能够按照车辆实际发生赔款次数合理计算保费。四是规范各公司现行的车型代码和新车购置价,解决保险公司利用新车购置价搞恶性竞争,损害被保险人利益的问题。北京保险行业将继续细化影响费率浮动的内容,适时推出商业车险费率与理赔金额、交通违章、车型等因素挂钩的方案。《费率浮动方案》的实施,将促使北京机动车承保、理赔服务上一个新的台阶,对社会产生积极的影响。一是大部分车主能够享受到更大的商业车险保费优惠。北京车险信息平台数据显示,在投保商业车险超过一年的车辆中,约60%的车辆未发生过赔款,这些车辆在第二年续保时即可享受31%的保费优惠。如上述车辆在第二年仍未发生赔款,第三年再续保时即可享受43%的保费优惠;另有约15%的车辆仅发生过一次赔款,第二年续保时可享受19%的保费优惠;约19%的车辆发生过2-3次赔款,第二年续保时保费与标准保费持平。北京车险信息平台数据还显示,仅有约6%的车辆发生赔款次数超过四次,在下一年度续保时将不同程度提高保费。二是增强信息透明度,遏制保险公司承保环节的恶性竞争,并积累真实准确的车险经营数据。商业车险保费由车险信息平台根据车辆相关信息和浮动系数计算,提高了信息的透明度,遏制保险公司承保环节的恶性竞争,同时积累真实准确的北京地区商业车险承保及理赔数据,为进一步科学厘定北京地区商业车险费率提供数据支持。随着商业车险费率浮动机制的建立和逐步完善,车主安全驾驶意识的提高和虚假赔案逐步减少,商业车险基准费率将可能会有进一步下调空间,从而使广大车主享受到更大的实惠。三是有利于营造安全、畅通的交通环境,提升理赔服务水平。保险费率与理赔记录挂钩,可以引导广大车主遵守道路交通法规,安全驾驶,减少交通事故发生,支持首都道路安全畅通。同时,交通事故率降低带动赔付率也随之下降,保险公司可以投入更多的人力和物力为车主提供人性化的服务。四是使商业车险费率水平真正与车辆风险状况相匹配。高风险车辆高费率,低风险车辆低费率,有效保证公平合理地对待投保人和车主。五是有效防范车险骗赔的风险。《费率浮动方案》推行后,广大车主将更加关心自己车辆的出险情况和理赔记录,不法分子制造的虚假赔案无处藏身,更有效地打击骗赔行为。北京保监局为保护广大被保险人的合法权益,全程跟踪监督了商业车险费率浮动的研究、计算工作,并提示广大市民,充分发表自己的意见、建议,尽快登录北京保险行业协会网站查询自己爱车过去的理赔情况。商业车险保费计算举例一辆五座小轿车,投保10万元的车损险及10万元的商业三者险,其标准保费为2594元。《费率浮动方案》推行后,如果上一年度未发生赔款,"无赔款优待及上年赔款记录"系数为0.85;同时投保包括商业三者险在内的两项险种并且平均年行驶里程小于30000公里,该两项优惠系数均为0.9;另外该车非老旧新特车型,综合以上因素,最终费率浮动系数为0.6885(0.85×0.9×0.9),应交纳保费1785.97元,节省保费808元。同样是这辆车,如果其它条件不变,今后4年内不出险,到第5年时保费将下浮至840.46元,节省保费1753.54元,中间年度应缴纳保费详见下表;同样,如果这辆车上一年度发生1次赔款,最终费率浮动系数为0.81(1.0×0.9×0.9),应交纳保费2101.14元;随着发生赔款次数的增加,保费将出现不同程度的上浮,如发生8次及8次以上赔款,最终费率浮动系数将上浮至2.43,应交纳保费6303.42元,比标准保费上浮3709.42元,其他发生赔款次数应缴纳保费详见下表附表:商业车险费率浮动系数表发生赔款次数标准保费无赔款优待及上年理赔纪录多险种投保平均年行驶里程最终浮动系数最终保费浮动金额连续5年未发生赔款25940.40.90.90.324840.456-1753.54连续4年未发生赔款25940.50.90.90.4051050.57-1543.43连续3年未发生赔款25940.60.90.90.4861260.68-1333.32连续2年未发生赔款25940.70.90.90.5671470.8-1123.2上年未发生赔款25940.850.90.90.68851785.97-808上年度发生1次赔款259410.90.90.812101.14-492.86上年度发生2次赔款25941.10.90.90.8912311.254-282.746上年度发生3次赔款25941.20.90.90.9722521.368-72.632上年度发生4次赔款25941.50.90.91.2153151.71557.71上年度发生5次赔款259420.90.91.624202.281608.28上年度发生6-7次赔款25942.50.90.92.0255252.852658.85上年度发生8次及8次以上赔款259430.90.92.436303.423709.42北京地区机动车商业保险费率浮动方案(征求意见稿)一、基本费率确定:商业车险基本费率根据现行的机动车商业保险行业基本费率表执行。二、费率浮动系数的计算:(一)北京地区商业车险费率浮动系数包括"无赔款优待及上年赔款记录"、"多险种同时投保"、"平均年行驶里程"以及"特殊风险"(即原"老、旧、新、特车型"系数)四项,具体费率浮动系数值详见附表。现行《费率调整系数表》中其他系数暂不使用。摩托车和拖拉机暂不浮动。(二)与机动车发生赔款次数相联系的浮动系数a根据发生赔款情况,等于a1至a14其中之一,不累加。同时满足多种情况的,按照向上浮动或者向下浮动比率最高者计算。(三)其他费率浮动系数由北京车险信息平台根据各公司录入的承保信息进行校验。(四)确定最终费率浮动系数采用系数连乘的方式计算:最终费率浮动系数=系数a×系数b×系数c×系数d。(五)由于北京地区已建立较完善的车险信息平台,因此"无赔款优待及上年赔款记录"系数应由各公司通过车险信息平台统一查询返回。各公司在录入车辆其他相关承保信息后,计算最终费率浮动系数,并按照"商业车险最终保险费=商业车险标准保险费×最终费率浮动系数"公式计算最终保费,之后向车险信息平台提交校验及投保确认。(六)机动车发生赔款次数应根据计算区间内被保车辆的赔款金额不为零的已决赔案次数统计。(七)方案实施首年,"无赔款优待及上年赔款记录"系数根据自车辆投保之日起上溯一年(365天)期间所有有效商业车险保单在北京车险信息平台记录的赔款次数进行计算。(八)方案实施第二年开始,费率浮动系数计算区间为"自上期商业车险有效保单投保查询时间起至本期商业车险有效保单投保查询时间止"。附表:商业车险费率浮动系数表发生赔款次数标准保费无赔款优待及上年理赔纪录多险种投保平均年行驶里程最终浮动系数最终保费浮动金额连续5年未发生赔款25940.40.90.90.324840.456-1753.54连续4年未发生赔款25940.50.90.90.4051050.57-1543.43连续3年未发生赔款25940.60.90.90.4861260.68-1333.32连续2年未发生赔款25940.70.90.90.5671470.8-1123.2上年未发生赔款25940.850.90.90.68851785.97-808上年度发生1次赔款259410.90.90.812101.14-492.86上年度发生2次赔款25941.10.90.90.8912311.254-282.746上年度发生3次赔款25941.20.90.90.9722521.368-72.632上年度发生4次赔款25941.50.90.91.2153151.71557.71上年度发生5次赔款259420.90.91.624202.281608.28上年度发生6-7次赔款25942.50.90.92.0255252.852658.85上年度发生8次及8次以上赔款259430.90.92.436303.423709.42(来源:北京保险行业协会)

description.hltext_display: 黄健翔粗口骂老东家 言辞过激称“鸡”都不如
description.content:
青山常在绿水长流，抬头不见低头见。作为职场人士，互有过节儿是很正常的，尤其是在中国这个人事关系素来比较复杂的地方。不过若如黄健翔这般，利用微博这个平台，居然爆粗不惜问候对方母亲下体，来问候自己的老东家，着实也让人开了眼界。
黄健翔粗口怒骂老东家
作为一个公众人物，自然你的一言一行都要慎之又慎，因为每天都有无数双眼睛在盯着你，也许你挖下鼻孔整理下裤链，都会被民众嗤之以鼻。黄健翔，作为曾经央视的名嘴，目前依然是国内出名的主播，当然是公众人物里的正面形象了，他理应为民众树立一个道德的标杆。
微博作为目前兴起的一个媒体，传播速度之快让人无法预测，一分钟之内可能几万几十万的人就可以收到你的讯息。虽然是一个私人的空间，但是公众人物的微博无法和普通人的微博相提并论，因为民众会把你的微博当成是一个新闻媒体，或者是一个道德崇拜的殿堂。
黄健翔和凤凰卫视之间有什么过节儿，我们无从知晓也无这个必要去知晓，因为打工仔和老板之间的关系甚是微妙，即时是包拯再世恐也难断个一清二白。但是如果到了如同下三滥的泼妇骂街般无所顾忌，那么就不明白黄健翔的素质去到哪般了。
我们可以看下据称是网友当时截屏的黄老师微博：“我就XXX的凤凰！鸡都不如！17:30的节目你们跟爷要收视率？X你们XX！有本事你们X爷的蛋？”在这条微博发布了两分钟之后，据闻黄健翔自己也觉得太过火爆，于是删之。然而接下来黄健翔依然不够解恨，用指桑骂槐的手法讽刺了下老东家：“每只鸡都以为自己是凤凰。”
好嘛，虽然博文可以删除，但是转发的力量却不能删除，于是我们知道了其实粗俗下流并不是我们普通人的权利。
是真情流露还是自我炒作？
黄健翔的骂街让我想起了昨天央视新闻主播郭某点评《让子弹飞》的事，这个郭主播说《让子弹飞》充斥了色情和暴力，让他在观影过程中产生了不适感，不得不提前离开电影院。所以当朋友转发此新闻给我的时候，我的态度就是：坚决不转发下去了，不能满足这个主播借批《让子弹飞》来达到炒作的目的。
炒作，确实可以让一个人迅速成名，因为连凤姐这样的人都能通过炒作红遍中国，还跑到美国去说要“劫道”奥巴马，让我们和蔼的奥总统也着实受惊不小。黄健翔在离开央视凤凰之后，可以说曝光率确实下降了不少，不过近年来的频频放炮让他挽回了在镜头前的损失。可以说，浸淫电视圈多年的他也是深谙炒作之道，知道只有保住了关注度，方才能保住钱途。
不过这次“真性情”的爆发却让我们看到了黄健翔粗鄙的一面，如果说之前在央视的激情解说是真情流露的话，那么这次的爆粗实在让我们觉得他之前一直在装。一个已经主动把自己下降到和下三滥流氓以及泼妇同等级的公众人物，你说他之后再装斯文再装理性，又会让我们感觉到多少的不适感呢。

description.hltext_display: KEISSER: LBSU is a tough buy for recruits
description.author: Bob Keisser
description.content:
It seems quaint looking back almost 40 years ago at the national championship fields in women's college volleyball, kind of like skimming through an old Farmer's Almanac and rediscovering small town charms and moon tides.
49er Hall of Famer Dixie Grimmett, who was still shepharding students toward degrees a few years ago and is retired in name only, was the 49ers' head coach in 1972 and led them to a 33-0 season and the Association for Intercollegiate Athletics for Women's (AIAW) title.
To win that title, the 49ers had to beat eight teams in a jam-packed national tournament that included Eastern Kentucky, Portland State, Western Michigan, Missouri State, Lehman College, Northeast Illinois, Southwest Texas State and BYU. When Dixie's girls repeated as national champs in 1973, the field included Illinois-Chicago, Texas Women's College, Cincinnati, Houston, Oregon, Tennessee and UC Santa Barbara.
USC and UCLA were around, mind you, but the 49ers beat them 11 times in 1972. Over the next few years, the likes of Brooklyn College, Delaware and Lamar also reached the championships, much as one might recall that the dominant teams in AIAW women's basketball were the 49ers, Immaculata, Delta State, Louisiana Tech and Old Dominion.
Moon tides remain the same, of course, but everything else has changed.
The NCAA was dragged into women's athletics only because gender equity rules made it, much to the dismay of knuckle-dragging football coachesyld_mgr.place_ad_here("adPosBox"); who though it would ruin sports. Like any good oligarchy, the NCAA adapted nicely.
Penn State just won its fourth consecutive women's title, beating Cal last weekend. The Bears were the sixth different Pac-10 team to make a trip to the Final Four since 2001. The only programs to reach the Final Four without membership in what is now known as the six Bowl Championship Series football conferences since 2001 are the 49ers, Santa Clara (2005) and Hawaii.
There are postseason berths available for non-BCS schools, but actually fewer on a percentage basis than before and many schools once considered contenders now suffering a full eclipse.
It's taken all of Brian Gimmillaro's considerable abilities to keep the 49ers in the tournament every year - 24 consecutive times since 1987 - but they've been a first weekend victim each of the last nine seasons.
The 2010 team played well despite its youth and injuries and will return a strong nucleus for 2011, making a run at more than a bid possible for the first time since the 2001 team reached the title match.
But Gimmillaro knows the terrain has changed, forever, lest some antitrust lawyers gather to shoot holes in the NCAA's policies.
"They are the major control group in the NCAA right now," Gimmillaro said of the BCS schools when Hawaii announced its plans to return to the Big West. "The majority of the seats on major committees go to the major conferences. They share most of the revenue, and they really don't want anyone else coming to the table. They have a nice hold on the mentality in our sport and several others, which wasn't necessarily so two decades ago.
"They've taken the football and basketball money and used it to build these programs. There's nothing wrong with that, but it's been at the expense of those programs that lack access to those kind of resources. And it really shows in recruiting."
Gimmillaro said he was recruiting a high-profile national recruit who was comparable to a Danielle Scott or Cheryl Weaver who sincerely told him that her decision was down to "the Pac-10, Big 12 and you." And another along the lines of a Tara Cross who said "it's the Pac-10 or you."
"How do you compete?" he said. "It's 12 handsome guys from the Pac-10 or me." Gimmillaro can still coach with any of those 12 models but it eventually becomes a bloated matter of real estate - location, location, ad infinitum.
It's intriguing to note that a lot of schools from the major conferences never came close to a NCAA bid until the football money began rolling their way. For every Texas, Penn State, Florida and Nebraska that seized the sport from the NCAA's beginning in 1981, there are another half-dozen who didn't make their first appearance until the mid-90s or later.
Gimmillaro can only worry about his program, and believes a modest shift in the way the school uses revenue would help. Rather than put such a strong emphasis on fund-raising per se, which usually gets tossed into the same lunch pail for everyone, he thinks it should emphasize getting more people from the community into seats.
It's a unique area where a Long Beach State isn't necessarily at anyone's knee. Football schools throw money at women's sports, but it doesn't show in attendance. Gimmillaro thinks if he, basketball coaches Dan Monson and Jody Wynn, men's volleyball coach Andy Read and baseball coach Troy Buckley were coaching games in front of 3,500-plus fans a night, Long Beach State would suddenly be as handsome as they come.
"We can't sell the other," meaning conference affiliation and pigskin, he said. "We can sell that community feeling, and I'll tell you straight out - give me a chance to coach games in a full, 10,000-seat arena with the community solidly behind it and filling the arena, and I have a chance to win every (match).
"That's still a fact of life about college sports that hasn't changed, and will always be our biggest possible resource."

event_or_fact.property: They are the major control group in the NCAA right now
How do you compete?; It's 12 handsome guys from the Pac-10 or me.
he was recruiting a high-profile national recruit who was comparable to a Danielle Scott or Cheryl Weaver who sincerely told him that her decision was down to "the Pac-10, Big 12 and you.

description.hltext_display: •小三跟我結婚後要離婚 我� � 打了她
description.content:
分開那天，我給粟蓮打電話，毫不拐彎地問她︰“為什麼我們最終會失敗，你知道嗎？”她的回答很讓我意外︰“我終于知道，敢為你離婚的男人，遲早一天也敢為別人離婚，這個道理以前別人跟我說過，但今天我總算明白了，也堅信了。”
這是充滿矛盾和焦慮的一天，對于我這個即將作出重大決定的男人來說，感覺特別漫長。
傍晚6點多了，天還沒完全黑下來。照平時的時間，這個時候我已經回到家，躺在沙發上看電視，等著開飯了。
而這一天，我始終在回家的路上徘徊，平時只要20多分鐘的路我走了快1個小時。我在街上漫無目的地走著，始終在琢磨該怎樣跟妻子碧雲(化名)開口。
此時，我知道，我回到家的時候，妻子一定已經做好了飯。女兒一定餓得發慌了，但她媽媽一定要求她等著我一起吃。
女兒長得很像我，因為女兒，我愛這個家。關于妻子，我承認，我們之間只剩下一份親情，愛情早已在多年的磨合中消失殆盡。
但是，不管是什麼情，也都是感情。只要是感情，想要得到或者拋棄都不是一件簡單的事情。
所以，這天下班我不知道怎麼回家，怎麼對碧雲說出那句“我們離婚”的話。我毫不隱瞞，此次離婚是為了一個女人，一個我自認為很愛的女人。
我終于還是回家了
碧雲出門以後，我把女兒哄睡，一個人躺在床上，再一次回憶了我和碧雲從認識到結婚的整個過程。
那年我29歲，家里人對我說︰“你今年必須結婚！”于是帶我去相親。一進門，碧雲已經先到了，她圓圓的臉，鼻子不高，笑起來有一邊的臉頰上還有個小酒窩，身材談不上好，還微微有點胖。
她是那種說不上漂亮，但也不會叫你討厭的女孩子。她喜歡開玩笑，吃飯的時候一點也不矜持，大大咧咧，很直率的一個人。
“這個丫頭一看就適合過日子，就她吧！”相親回來的路上，媽媽這樣對我說。
就這麼一錘定音，沒過多久，我們就結婚了。不得不承認，碧雲是個好女人，對我相當體貼，對孩子和家庭就更不用說了。
她每天一下班就急匆匆往家里趕，忙著張羅晚餐。晚餐後，又開始忙各種家務，五六年來，這早已成了她的一個生活習慣。而我總是習慣了被她照顧，習慣了過一種悠然的生活。
原本以為我是愛碧雲的，沒想到粟蓮一出現，我才發現自己在心里並不愛她。
時間回到18年前
那年我24歲，經歷了我人生中最痛苦的一次離別。那個和我離別的人叫粟蓮(化名)，我的初戀。
粟蓮的父母和我的父母是同一個單位的職工，我們住在同一個宿舍區里。這些先決條件成全了我們的愛情，但也成為我們愛情的障礙。
因為我們的父母有很深的過節，所以我們的愛從一開始就不為雙方父母所接受，但我們不在乎，年輕的我們相信能堅持到雙方父母松口的那一天。
我們都以為愛情可以戰勝一切，愛情可以天荒地老。粟蓮跟父母一起離開武漢去北京的時候，我對她說︰“我會等你的。”我們許下誓言，即使不能在一起，也決不和別人結婚。
粟蓮去北京後，信成了我們聯系的唯一方式。我們在信里互相鼓勵，互訴衷腸。她家里不讓我們來往，我的信只能寄給她北京的朋友，再輾轉交到她手中。這樣盡管非常累，但因為有一份愛，感覺依然非常幸福。
一晃就是三年，粟蓮給我的信越來越少，也越來越短。到後來，一連兩個多月沒收到她的信。我每天下班都到單位的門房去看，一次次讓我失望。
終于等來了一封信，我站在單位門口的一棵樹底下撕開了信封，里面薄薄的一張紙，紙上用紅筆寫著簡單的一句話︰“我現在明白，人是看不到地老天荒的。我結婚了，以後別再給我寫信。”紅色的墨水，白色的信紙，像傷口滲出的血。
我怎麼也不相信這個事實，一連給粟蓮寫了好幾封信，卻再也沒有收到她的回信。
失戀給我的打擊無比巨大，支持我內心世界的柱子坍塌了。兩年多時間里，我一直很消沉。既然沒有地老天荒，那就只能各人顧各人。不管為自己還是為家人，都需要有個家了。
我和碧雲婚後的生活是平淡的，也是充實的。原本以為，這足以讓我這輩子安安心心地過下去了，但怎麼也沒料到，如此穩固的婚姻也會有松動的一天。
我沒想到這輩子還會和粟蓮重逢，我以為自己對她已經死心了，然而，當我在2000年底的一次朋友聚會上，意外見到她時，四目相對，我的內心像開水一樣翻滾起來。
那次聚會後，我和粟蓮又見了幾次面，她告訴我原本她有著非常美好的婚姻，可因為丈夫出軌，不得不選擇離婚。
她還說，婚後她忘不了我，和丈夫的關系也因此每況愈下。
她的話一瞬間就把我點燃了
她還是那麼漂亮，那麼年輕，跟多年前一樣，有著無可挑剔的身材。
我們回想起當年的山盟海誓，兩個人抱頭痛哭。其實，我們都不再年輕，但當粟蓮問我還愛不愛她的時候，我義無反顧地說︰“愛！”
短短幾天時間，我陷入了不可自拔的感情沼澤。我突然感覺，自己應該為愛情活上一回。我對她說，為了你，我願意賭上一次，賭注是我的家庭。
可粟蓮非常反對︰“你就是敢離婚 ，我也不敢要你啊，畢竟我也是因為老公的外遇離婚的，對你妻子來說，她跟我受的是一樣的傷害，太殘酷了！”
我知道粟蓮沒有說實話，她肯定是愛我的，只是怕為現實所傷。所以，我決定先離婚，給她一個完全自由的我。
為了離婚，我放棄了財產，忍受父母的冷眼，我覺得自己這一生還有最後一點熱情可以為愛燃燒。于是，我選擇了燃燒。
對碧雲而言，我只有愧疚。結婚多年，她沒有什麼不好的地方，是我拋棄了她。但懷著一絲悲壯，一絲憧憬，我還是果斷地離婚了。
2003年，我帶著女兒，和粟蓮重新組成了一個家庭，一家四口開始了新的生活。不得不承認，我們有過很幸福的時光，有過重新找回的激情。那些日子，盡管有內疚有不安，但幸福足以沖淡這一切。
可是，僅僅兩年時間，我們的生活就漸漸流入平庸。爭吵，冷戰，指責……所有夫妻可能有的毛病我們都有了。
到2006元月，我們的矛盾已經進一步升級了，吵架成了家常便飯。
不知道為什麼我和粟蓮會有那麼多矛盾和爭吵。為了孩子讀書和撫養的問題，就不知道鬧了多少回。
也許做父母的都有點偏心，我也在努力平衡對兩個孩子的關愛。可粟蓮總認為我對她親生的孩子不好。
現在兩個孩子的學費和各種生活費，讓我們這個家庭很吃緊。我覺得越是這樣的時候，越要同舟共濟，何必鬧內訌呢。
可粟蓮不這麼看，她認為我沒有擔負一個男人應該擔負的責任。
我也想不通，當初我為了她義無反顧拋棄了自己的婚姻，為的就是一份感情，既然感情沒了，我這樣苦苦支撐不就是一份責任嗎？難道她沒有一點感恩心理嗎？
相反，她還說我變了，說我心里還想著碧雲。我真是有口難辯。
一怒之下打了粟蓮一個耳光
2006年暑假，為孩子們暑假培訓的事，我們又吵起來。我的確只給我的孩子報了名，但那也是因為她的成績更好一些，更適合學奧數，而不是偏心。
粟蓮卻不依不饒，一直跟我吵到深夜。第二天，又跟孩子吵架，還動手打了孩子。這次我真的火了，一怒之下也打了粟蓮一個耳光。
晚上，我去了酒吧，一個人喝酒，直到深夜。從酒吧出來，我感覺自己被一種巨大的失落感包圍。
不由自主撥通了對我表示過愛慕的女孩小丁的電話，我不知道是什麼力量的驅使，當天晚上，我就留在了小丁身邊……
不知道怎麼回事，我和小丁的事，很快就傳到粟蓮的耳朵里。
粟蓮向我提出了離婚，而且是毫無商量余地。沒辦法，我只能答應。想想這些年和她一起生活，突然發現，磕磕踫踫遠比第一段婚姻要多得多。離婚也許是唯一選擇。
我真是想不明白，我費了這麼大力氣才得到的婚姻怎麼就不讓人舒服呢？我到底錯在什麼地方了？
分開那天，我給粟蓮打電話，毫不拐彎地問她︰“為什麼我們最終會失敗，你知道嗎？”她的回答很讓我意外︰“我終于知道，敢為你離婚的男人，遲早一天也敢為別人離婚，這個道理以前別人跟我說過，但今天我總算明白了，也堅信了。”
離婚已經半年了，我始終沒明白，為什麼最終會落得個如此兩敗俱傷。今天說出這個故事，我希望有人告訴我，這個過程中，我到底錯了沒有，錯在哪里。
“當一個男人為了你離婚，你的第一感覺是什麼？”很多人可能會毫不猶豫地說︰“感動！”——自然有人會因為“感動”而跟他結婚，這就是所謂的“婚外情修成正果”。

description.hltext_display: El Athletic aguanta el tirón al Barcelona (0-0)
description.content:
copa del rey Los vascos tendrán en casa la oportunidad de dejar fuera del torneo al equipo de Guardiola, que no acababa un partido sin marcar un gol desde su derrota en Liga con el Hércules.
Ginés Muñoz (efe), barcelona | Actualizado 21.12.2010 - 22:25

description.hltext_display: Real Madrid captain Casillas: I do not fear Barcelona (tribalfootball.com)
description.content:
Real Madrid captain Iker Casillas insists they will catch up to Barcelona.
Casillas says the only difference between the two teams is "time".
He explained: "The difference is time, they perform well together because they have had more time of playing alongside eachother. That's what we do not have, we need that, more time.
"But can you put yourself in the middle of the Bernabeu and tell people it takes time for the pieces fit? No, it is impossible.
"Actually, I have no fear of FC Barcelona. I respect them mostly, the numbers are there, but we will keep fighting to be in first place."

event_or_fact.property: The difference is time, they perform well together because they have had more time of playing alongside eachother.
the only difference between the two teams is "time"

description.hltext_display: Letters to the editor (12/22/10)
description.content:
Lisa Murkowski has wasted no time in thumbing her nose at her supporters. The recent Senate vote on the so-called DREAM Act was defeated but it received a 'yea' vote from both of our senators. Mr. Begich, also voted "yea," but as an unapologetic liberal we could have predicted that.
But Ms. Murkowski voted 'nay' on a similar bill in 2007 and as a Republican I feel she abandoned those of us who work hard, pay taxes and wish to stop the obscene level of spending our government has adopted in its effort to prop up every business and cause it encounters.
Ms. Murkowski was fortunate that her opponent was a person with a checkered history which wasn't fully known until after the primary -- thus her write-in victory, which more correctly was a Mr. Miller loss. If Ms. Murkowski wants to survive another election I suggest she becomes the Republican she claims to be.
-- B.K. Robinson
Anchorage
'Holidays' a bland compromise
What happens when a child takes a box of crayons, takes all the colors and mixes them all together? You get a mix of colors that is unpleasant and bland. What happens if you take those same colors and draw a picture, you get something that has character and is beautiful.
Saying "Happy Holidays" is bland, it's a vague recognition of some celebration of what you may or may not be a part of.
I may not celebrate Hanukkah, Kwanzaa or whatever holiday that you celebrate. However, I would welcome you wishing me Happy Hanukkah (for example) because Hanukkah is important to you. With that wish, you have shown me that you are thoughtful enough, even in a social nicety, to include me into what you find important.
Tolerance is defined as "sympathy or indulgence for beliefs or practices differing from or conflicting with one's own." We don't need to agree but my hope is that you wish the best for me and I will wish the best for you. Merry Christmas.
-- Sam Sullivan
Anchorage
Maybe it's a library opportunity
Thank you for the letters of support for a South Anchorage library. I made a commitment during our Assembly meeting to work with the administration to have a library in South Anchorage. I see this as an opportunity to further discuss the community's vision on what a library will look like in 25 years.
Will it be a library of books filed in the Dewey Decimal system? Will it be a place that folks exchange electronic books? Will reference librarians be there to help navigate various search engines? Will it be a place for the Department of Labor to assist the unemployed? Will it be a place for continuing education classes? Is it a way to keep school libraries open after school for everyone in the community? Will it be a community idea incubator? What do we want in a community library and how much space is needed?
I look forward to hearing your ideas.
-- Jennifer B. Johnston
Anchorage Assembly
Senators had eye on the prize
Even though the opportunity for young adults to obtain a postsecondary education did not materialize, I am very proud of the fact that both Sens. Begich and Murkowski voted for two important civil rights acts, "don't ask, don't tell" and the "DREAM Act".
We must keep our eyes on the prize and keep hope alive!
-- Arthur Sosa
Anchorage
An alternative energy opportunity
I have read with great interest about the wind turbine project at Nicholas Begich Middle School in Anchorage. However I am dismayed that the ASD does not have any budget for, or plans at all, to study wind project feasibility or solar power or ground heat transfer technologies at its school or other buildings.
With millions of square feet of flat roofs on their buildings, sport tracks and fields adjacent to many schools, the ASD would be able to have a good mix of such technologies to produce electricity and heat on-site. These projects would set predictable electric and utility rates for 30 or more years for our schools and other ASD facilities, but nothing is planned except asking for more and more tax dollars to spend.
ASD from the top down is rife with stodgy old-think people and they need to get with the modern world or be let go posthaste, Carol Comeau included, for lack of vision on how to reduce ASD's financial needs through such efforts.
-- Thomas W. Guziejewski, M.D.
Anchorage
Snow stopped, scraping goes on
I commend the mayor for trying to balance the budget and wish him well. However, I suggest that he have a talk with the street maintenance department head about wasted fuel and overtime pay. We didn't have much, if any, measurable snow in over a week through Sunday, Dec. 19. Yet the maintenance crews and graders have been scraping our street; at least three times in the last week. The most recent scraping was Sunday, Dec. 19.

description.hltext_display: 小孩有必要买保险吗友邦保险为儿童精心打造保险计划
description.content:
分类:保险理财友邦保险近日对数款广受客户欢迎的产品进行精心组合,帮助客户及早合理地规划子女目前的保障及未来的教育支出,以应对未来的各种开销。据悉,友邦保险此次推出的组合产品中,很多都是曾在市场上广受客户称赞的产品,如友邦卓越宝贝综合保障计划,该计划涵盖公司最新推出的《友邦金喜多多两全保险》、《友邦附加世纪英才储备金两全保险》、《友邦附加守御天使b款重大疾病保险》以及《友邦附加添益儿童意外伤害及医疗综合保险计划》,保障范围涵盖子女的意外伤害保障、重疾保障、住院医疗保障和教育金储备计划。其中,主险《金喜多多两全保险》只需付费6年,付费期满后即可每两年领取生存现金直到子女85岁,保证孩子未来的生活品质,且生存现金可以灵活运用,满足子女人生不同阶段的多种需求,为孩子的人生保驾护航。此前,同济医科大学少儿卫生学教研室的统计显示,非致命意外伤害的发生率为24.10%。友邦保险《住院给付、重大疾病保险金、意外身故(包括残疾和烧伤)保险金、意外医药费用补偿金等多项周全而完整的保险保障。主合同付费期满后,李女士的儿子即可开始每两年领取生存现金直至85岁。此外李女士的儿子在18-21岁读大学期间,每年都可以领取1万元作为教育储备金,以保障其在大学期间的教育及生活质量,当孩子年满85岁时可以获得一笔满期金,保障年老时的生活品质。李女士选择的这款推荐计划还具有在特定情况下豁免保险费的功能,使孩子的保障更加稳妥,李女士也可以更加放心。详情咨询:138888888友邦黄金未来a款/b款两全保险(分红型)友邦金色年华ii年金保险(分红型)友邦世纪英才两全保险友邦儿童教育保险计划
上一篇：北京机动车保险查询北京机动车商业保险将改革车险费率浮动加大

description.hltext_display: La candidatura de Burgos 2016 suma ya un centanar de voluntarios
description.content:
900 comercios reparten desde hoy tarjetas para que los burgaleses expresen sus deseos 'R-evolucionarios' para 2011
Mie, 22/12/2010
J. M. / Burgos
La candidatura de Burgos a Capital Europea de la Cultura en 2016 cuenta ya con un centenar de r-evolucionarios (voluntarios). Personas que han decidido, de forma individualizada, ofrecer su tiempo en colaborar con los actos que se programen, de ahora hasta el futuro, desde la Fundación 2016. A estos hay que añadir cerca de una veintena de colectivos de la ciudad que, si se les requiere, ya han comunicado su predisposición a ayudar.
La primera prueba de fuego de los voluntarios ya se ha realizado y ha servido para poner a punto la última iniciativa que se presentó ayer y que se pone en marcha a partir de hoy mismo y hasta el próximo 8 de enero. A través del programa R-evolucionarios, 12 voluntarios han repartido 30.000 tarjetas por 900 comercios de la ciudad y edificios municipales. Unas papeletas en las que los burgaleses podrán expresar sus deseos para el 2011, y en los que deberán expresar «los valores sociales y las aspiraciones culturales para el futuro». Unos deseos que también se podrán realizar a través de la red social Facebook. Las tarjetas se tendrán que depositar en una serie de urnas que estarán colocadas en casi la totalidad de los edificios municipales (Centros Cívicos, bibliotecas, Ayuntamiento, Citur...)
Entre los participantes se sortearán 160 entradas para espectáculos del Teatro Principal y del Clunia (80 pares), y 20 lotes de libros y CD´s. En el caso de Facebook, el premio se otorgará según la aceptación del público y se contabilizará con los que mensajes que más hayan recibido la calificación de Me gusta.

description.hltext_display: ゼニトはスパレッティ退団を完全否定
description.content: ［Goal.com］ インテルはラファエル・ベニテス監督を解任する可能性を騒がれており、その後任候補の一人として挙げられていたのが、ゼニト・サンクトペテルブルクをリーグ優勝へ導いたイタリア人のルチアーノ・スパレッティ監督だ。しかし、以前から言われていたように、ゼニトに同監督を手放すつもりはまったくないようだ。ゼニトのイゴール・コルネエフＳＤ（スポーツディレクター）がロシア『ソビエツキ・スポーツ』に対し、次のように話している。「スパレッティは来シーズンもゼニトの監督だ。彼自身が何度も繰り返しているようにね。（イタリア復帰は）現実と合っていないことだよ」ゼニトで優勝したスパレッティ監督は、チャンピオンズリーグ出場権も獲得し、豊富な資金力を誇るオーナー会社による投資にも期待できる。イタリアと比べてプレッシャーも少なく、ゼニトを離れる理由はないということかもしれない。

description.hltext_display: •我獨自一人過月子 快得產後抑郁癥了
description.content:
http://www.tianshannet.com 天山網 2010年12月22日 11:54:43 我來說兩句
更換背景顏色︰
更改文字大小︰
我差不多每天都哭，心情沒有一天是好的，因為我是在冬天生下寶寶的，婆婆不在身邊，老公也忙工作，媽媽心疼我想過來照顧我，可是我不願意她大老遠過來吃苦，于是變成我一個人在忙活，有時候要照顧寶寶，寶寶一哭我就心疼。
我今年21歲，剛生完寶寶。媽媽說做月子一定要把身體養好，那可是一輩子的事情啊，月子里落下病根一輩子都帶在身上。記得當初我也是這樣勸我同學的，可是現在輪到自己了才知道其實坐月子沒那麼舒服（別人都說有好吃的好喝的，還有人伺候，不用下床舒服的很）。
我差不多每天都哭，心情沒有一天是好的，因為我是在冬天生下寶寶的，婆婆不在身邊，老公也忙工作，媽媽心疼我想過來照顧我，可是我不願意她大老遠過來吃苦，于是變成我一個人在忙活，有時候要照顧寶寶，寶寶一哭我就心疼︰是不是又尿了，衣服濕了不舒服？是不是餓了？給寶寶洗澡也擔心忽熱忽熱的水燙到他。寶寶的尿布也是我洗的，天寒地凍，還要經常用冷水洗衣服。水涼颼颼的，凍得我直抖索。我最難過的是寶寶經常尿濕衣服，
晾得滿屋子的尿布、衣服，卻沒有一塊干燥的可以給寶寶用。怎麼辦，再這樣下去，我要得產後抑郁癥了。
以前沒有寶寶就要一個，現在有了，發現原來那是一個很大的責任啊，哎……

description.hltext_display: 日本プルーフポイント、NRIセキュアとMSPパートナー契約を締結
description.content:
日本プルーフポイント（辻根佳明社長）は、NRIセキュアテクノロジーズ（増谷洋社長）と、MSP（マネージドサービスプロバイダー）パートナー契約を締結した。NRIセキュアがMSPパートナーとして、エンタープライズ市場に向け、プルーフポイントの電子メールセキュリティソリューションのサービス提供を行っていく。
NRIセキュアは、プルーフポイント製品を使ったセキュリティサービスを、国内で数十社に提供している。これまではプルーフポイントのチャネルパートナーを経由しての2次パートナーだったが、今回、プルーフポイントとの直接契約に移行した。日本国内でプルーフポイントと直接MSPパートナーとしての契約を締結するのは、NRIセキュアが初めてだ。今後、スパムやウイルスなどのメールインバウンド対策に加え、メール誤送信対策もプルーフポイントの新機能を活用したサービスとして展開する。
プルーフポイントは、エンタープライズ市場への販売力の強化を狙い、全世界でディストリビュータ網の再構築に取り組んでいる。今後は、従来の国内代理店網の再編を実施し、エンタープライズ市場にフォーカスしたパートナー制度を取り入れながら、日本市場でのビジネス拡大を図っていく。初年度で新規顧客獲得50社、売り上げ2億円を目標としている。

description.hltext_display: Abajo acusa a Cáritas de 'chantajear' con el concurso de ayuda a domicilio
description.content:
«Estoy un poco cabreada e indignada por esta especie de presión o de chantaje que está intentando movilizar Cáritas para que demos marcha atrás sobre un procedimiento que es totalmente legal, transparente y habitual». Así de contundente se mostraba ayer la concejala del área de Servicios Sociales del Ayuntamiento de Burgos, María José Abajo, ante la reacción de Cáritas por la pérdida del concurso para la explotación del servicio de comida a domicilio a personas mayores y necesitadas. Un resultado que se conoció el pasado 14 de diciembre y que daba como ganadora a la empresa de servicios Clece. La segunda en puntuación fue Valoriza Ucalsa, la tercera Tsys y ya en cuarto lugar quedó Cáritas.
Abajo expresó ayer que no entiende la postura de la ONG católica ya que, en estos momentos, el concurso está en el trámite formal de reclamaciones y en la organización «se están poniendo la venda antes de la herida».
Según la concejala, el principal motivo por el que Cáritas podría haber perdido el concurso se explica en que «creo que no han sabido documentar el trabajo que están haciendo, que es muy bueno. Pero, lógicamente, cualquier empresa, aunque sea de inserción, tiene que tener esas habilidades técnicas. Lo que tienen que hacer es preparar un buen recurso para que se les acepte y se revise. A dedo no se les puede adjudicar un servicio ni un programa. Eso es una irregularidad absoluta. Sobre todo, porque ellos han aceptado entrar en un concurso, con un procedimiento concreto de puntuaciones y valoraciones».
Respecto a la posibilidad de que los empleados de El Gusto de Servirles (Cáritas) puedan perder su puesto de trabajo, la concejala de Servicios Sociales explicó que ya se han entablado conversaciones con la empresa Clece y ésta parece que no tiene inconveniente en contratarlos.

description.hltext_display: Arbejdsgiverjul giver ekstra milliardbeløb
description.author: Ritzau
description.content:
Arbejdsgiverjulen i år giver en stor ekstraindtjening fra flere arbejdsdage, konstaterer Dansk Erhverv.
Alle glæder sig til jul, og i år kan især arbejdsgiverne glæde sig lidt ekstra, da juleaften falder på en fredag. Dermed er både 1. og 2. juledag blot en normal weekend. Det betyder at der kun er én julerelateret helligdag i 2010, som koster arbejdsgiverne.
Det vil i år medføre en ekstra værdiskabelse i omegnen af 3,7 milliarder kroner sammenlignet med 2012, som er den næste "medarbejdervenlige" jul, fremgår det af en beregning fra organisationen Dansk Erhverv.
Faktisk har hele 2010 været et arbejdsgiverår, da flere andre helligdage også uden for december er faldet i weekenden. Blandt andet faldt 1. maj og grundlovsdag på lørdage.
Det samme gør sig gældende for julen næste år, hvor juleaften er en lørdag. Helligdagenes placering har betydning for antallet af arbejdsdage et givent år.
Antallet af arbejdsdage lå i 2007 på 224, året efter på 226 og 225 i 2009. I år når vi op på 228 dage.
- Det er især månedslønnede medarbejdere, der mærker størst forskel fra år til år, da de får det samme udbetalt uanset antallet af fridage og helligdage, siger Mira Lie Nielsen, økonom i Dansk Erhverv.
For arbejdsgiverne og samfundet betyder de ekstra arbejdsdage ekstra dage med produktion og indtjening
Til forskel fra 2010 og 2011, kan arbejdstagerne glæde sig lidt mere til julen 2012. Da falder juleaften nemlig på en mandag, og der er derfor et maksimalt antal helligdage, som falder på hverdage. Dermed er der i 2012 tre julerelaterede fridage. To mere end i år.

description.hltext_display: 朴成华赴韩敲定转会 实德最大投入引进李玮锋
description.content:
大连实德队主教练朴成华今天返回大连，这次归来他给球队和球迷带来了一个不错的消息：李玮锋加盟大连实德队一事已接近成功。
今天中午，朴成华才姗姗归来。大连实德队在12月15日就重新集结，开始了新赛季前的冬训。一向十分敬业的朴成华迟迟未归，是因为他的女儿在12月18日举行结婚仪式。在参加女儿婚礼的同时，朴成华还利用这段时间，在韩国运作李玮锋加盟大连实德队一事。据了解，朴成华在这个冬季的假期里一直很忙碌，除了忙碌女儿的婚礼，再就是球队的引援工作。在韩国期间，他通过自己的关系，让水原三星做出了放弃李玮锋的决定，并且和对方俱乐部达成了转会协议。近期，他的工作重点转向了李玮锋，李玮锋这段时间一直停留在韩国。
在韩国水原三星俱乐部宣布下赛季放弃李玮锋后，李玮锋峰并没有选择马上离开，而是继续留在韩国。他如此选择，就是要在韩国完成自己再次转会的谈判。暂留在韩国，李玮锋和他的经纪人可以随时和水原三星俱乐部进行沟通，同时他也可以顺利地与最希望引进他的大连实德俱乐部，进行有关谈判事宜。
朴成华在韩国首尔和李玮锋进行了见面后，就一直和对方保持联系，争取说服李玮锋做出加盟大连实德的决定。朴成华直言不讳自己对李玮锋的欣赏，并且保证他在球队中的主力核心位置。在北京奥运会期间，时任韩国国奥队主教练的朴成华就对中国队的超龄球员李玮锋十分欣赏，在上个赛季还没有结束的时候，就提出要引进李玮锋。他对李玮锋的速度和头球十分欣赏，认为李玮锋到来后，会给球队的防守带来很大的变化。尽管此前有消息称，李玮锋有可能加盟深圳、天津等球队，但是留在韩国的李玮锋，其实主要目的和精力，都是放在和大连实德俱乐部的谈判上。在谈判和接触的过程中，李玮锋发现，大连实德队是最欣赏他、最具有引进诚意的一家俱乐部。
在这种情况下，对李玮锋的能力十分欣赏的朴成华，此前一直留在韩国，就是为了推动这个事情的发展。在引进李玮锋没有任何悬念的情况下，朴成华才安心返回大连。从目前情况看，李玮锋加盟大连实德队一事，已经接近成功。上周，李玮锋的经纪人就已经到达大连，进行最后合同细节的敲定工作如果不出意外的话，在今年年底，大连实德俱乐部将会完成对李玮锋的引进工作。
大连实德只有在确定李玮锋加盟成功后，才能开始外援的真正确定工作。李玮锋的到来，才是大连实德全面调整的开始，一位俱乐部领导说，李玮锋的事情不定，其他事情都很难开展。正是因为这个原因，大连实德俱乐部在引进李玮锋的问题上，投入最大，花费的精力最多。

description.hltext_display: 兴业银行基金定投兴业趋势定投*兴业银行基金定投-兴业基金定投【答企
description.content:
兴业趋势定投*兴业银行基金定投-兴业基金定投【你说,要超脱就要减少关注点,但是,看到问题在那摆着,怎么能不着急能不管呢?那你就有时睁一只眼闭一只眼。这,你可能也会说很难。我们来说射击瞄准吧,两只眼都睁着不如闭上一只眼。有时为了达到关键的目标,采取这样的方法更有效。人的眼睛也总不能连着好几天都不合眼,有时需要闭目养神,需要睡觉。睡觉时,双目也是闭着的。许多老板,总希望有更多的时间睁着眼睛管事情,总是把眼睛盯得大大的。我们来个比较。大家随意找出古今中外十位很有成就的大老板,再找出十位经商经得不太起色的老板,就会发现:不太起色的这一批,他们关注的、着急的、爱管的问题,超过了有成就的这一批,他们多管了许多不一定要去管的事,多操心了许多不一定由他操心的问题。有些人管理不成功,并不是他们管得少,并不是他们不辛苦,并不是他们双眼不累。有太多太多的老板管得太多,有太多太多的老板管得太累。有太多的管理者太爱管了。大家知道,中国比较多地讲管理,从八十年代开始,近十几年来,似乎掀起了一股管理学的热潮。人们讲管理,讲着讲着,讲出了一个误区,习惯定势为:总想管人,总想要去管什么,而不想被人管,不去想一想什么不该管、不要管;总想领导别人,没想怎么样让他人领导;总想提高领导力,提高管人的能力,很少去想想怎么样增强被人领导、被人管理的本事。许多人认为,能力要用到管人、管事上,忘了人的能力是要用到:与周围的人、事物、大自然好好地相处;应该用来滋养生命!说一句比较武断的话:有些老板如果他们管得少了,如果有时能睁一只眼闭一只眼,或闭目养神,可能他经营的企业会做得更好。经过了全球性的金融危机,最近,一位西方人,也就是很多人说的那位"学习型组织"的教父级人物、《第五项修炼》的作者彼得・圣吉,他说:"其实我们现在可能真正需要的是领导力的终结。"我想:领导力终结是终结不了的,领导者、管理者睁一只眼闭一只眼有时则是需要的。可以让"领导力"回归正常,不需老去盯着它,过分地追求它,没有这个必要。(《雨水说成功--老君岩前的感应》,即将发行。台湾著名诗人余光中、国际易学顾问唐明邦题词。敬请关注)分享到新浪微博

description.hltext_display: Telecom firms ask government not to stop roll out of 3G
description.author: admin
description.content:
Share
We will work with the government and in the next three-four months we will come up with technology that allows legal interception in these kind of activities
Telecom operators Tuesday asked the government not to stop the roll-out of third generation (3G) phone services, saying they will soon come up with a method to intercept the calls for security purposes.
"We are working with the government and have asked them not to stop the roll-out of 3G," said Rajan S. Mathews, director general of the Cellular Operators Association of India (COAI).
According to Mathews, he expects new technology within three-four months which would allow the government legal wiretaps to address security concerns.
"We will work with the government and in the next three-four months we will come up with technology that allows legal interception in these kind of activities," Mathews said.
According to reports, some companies were asked to provide a compliance report on security aspects of 3G services to the Department of Telecommunications (DoT).
Recently Reliance Communications and Tata Teleservices had launched their 3G services, while Bharti Airtel said it will introduce its service by the year-end.
3G services offer features such as video-calling, mobile TV, video streaming and applications access at super fast internet connections on a wide variety of both mobile phone and personal computing devices.

director general, Cellular Operators Association of India
