description.hltext_display: واشنطن تعتبر ان كوريا الشمالية غير مستعدة لاستئناف المحادثات السداسية
description.content:
٢٢ كانون الاول ٢٠١٠
قال البيت الأبيض ان تصرفات كوريا الشمالية تبثت أنها غير مستعدة لاستئناف المحادثات السداسية حول برنامجها النووي.
وقال الناطق باسم البيت الأبيض روبرت غيبس في مؤتمر صحافي أمس الثلاثاء ان "المحادثات السداسية ستستأنف مرة أخرى عندما يظهر الكوريون الشماليون استعداداً لتغيير سلوكهم"، غير أنه أضاف ان "الأعمال الحربية التي قامت بها كوريا الشمالية برهنت خلال الأسابيع الماضية انهم غير مستعدين حتى عن بعد لاستئناف المحادثات بطريقة مسؤولة".
وأضاف "حين يكونون (مستعدين) فإن العالم سيكون مستعداً للقيام بما هو ضروري. ولكن في الوقت الراهن لا يجب أن يأتي هذا التحرك (استئناف المحادثات) بناء على خطاباتهم، بل بناء على أفعالهم".
وجدد اتهام كوريا الشمالية بالفشل في القيام بأي من واجبتها الدولية كي تكون "عضواً محترماً في المجتمع الدولي".
وقال غيبس "لن نحضر طاولة ونبدأ التحدث، لن نستأنف المحادثات السداسية لمجرد كون الفكرة تعطي شعوراً جيداً. عندما يكون الكوريون الشماليون مستعدون جدياً للقيام بواجباتهم، سنفكر باستئناف المحادثات السداسية".
ويتصاعد التوتر بين الكوريتين بعد قصف بيونغ يانغ لجزيرة حدودية الشهر الماضي ما أدى إلى مقتل 4 كوريين جنوبيين وإصابة 18 آخرين بجروح.
وكان حاكم ولاية نيو مكسيكو الأميركية بيل ريتشاردسون زار كوريا الشمالية في 18 كانون الأول/ ديسمبر، وأعلن انها وافقت على عودة مفتشي الوكالة الدولية للطاقة الذرية، وتعهدت ببيع قضبان وقود غير مستنفذ إلى كوريا الجنوبية، ووافقت على إنشاء لجنة عسكرية مكونة من ممثلين عن الكوريتين والولايات المتحدة.

description.hltext_display: 前瞻：中马战高帅定名单 逢欧五连胜乃浮云？
description.content:
北京时间12月22日19：30，即将出征卡塔尔亚洲杯的中国男足，将在广州越秀山体育场与马其顿队进行一场热身比赛。这是亚洲杯前国足在国内的最后一场公开热身，主帅高洪波表示将在赛后敲定参加亚洲杯的名单。不过从赛前我们邀请的对手的成色看，中马之战很可能与之前一场的中爱之战一样，成为精彩程度不高的比赛。不过高洪波已经明确表示，不管对手情况如何，国足也将本着锻炼队伍观察新人的角度，以替补阵容出战。值得一提的是，央视体育频道将现场直播这场热身赛。 进入直播室 竞猜比赛结果 中国进球数 失球数
举办中马战颇费周折
这场热身赛的组织工作，可以说有些混乱，但从另一个角度说也是周折颇多。中国足协原本打算在国足出征前联系三场热身赛，但印尼突然爽约令国足只有两场正式热身赛可打。临到快比赛之前，承办第二场国足与马其顿比赛的佛山突然提出，佛山难以接手，足协原本打算请珠海继续接手，以免除国足车马劳顿之苦，但珠海方面已无兴趣，比赛最终经过艰苦的协调定于12月22日在广州越秀山体育场进行。
对手成色与爱队一样水
比赛承办的过程已经够让人纠结了，而我们邀请来的马其顿队的实力依然让人难以放心。从对外公布的18人名单来看，马其顿并没有派出自己最强的阵容来。虽然马其顿主帅约鲁兹宣称他们有实力战胜中国队，但对手的成色与之前的爱沙尼亚差不多，中马之战的份量难以高估。
六年前阿里汉率领的中国队曾在国内与马其顿队连战两场，首战两队激战成0-0，次战中国队凭借郑智的头球以1-0小胜对手。近年来马其顿队进步神速，在欧洲赛场时有惊人之举，目前马其顿队的国际排名是第76位，比国足高出11位。马其顿队这来华名单里召入了18名球员，但18个人代表国家队出场次数加起来才只有70场，平均每人不到4场，18人中除后卫拉扎雷夫斯基有40次的国家队出场纪录外，有7人甚至是首次入选国家队。这样的阵容估计比爱沙尼亚强不到哪里去，高家军周三晚上的对手又是一个请来陪我们练摊的活靶子。
不过这场中马之战有一个看点，就是同样来自上海东亚的与卡尔切夫。上海东亚的马其顿籍后卫卡尔切夫这次也入选了来华的热身名单，29岁的卡尔切夫只在2006年代表他的国家队打过两场比赛，近四年没有国字号出战记录，属于马其顿队板凳级球员。
逢欧五连胜？意义不大
在这场比赛之前，高家军已经取得了对欧洲球队的四连胜。今年的5月19日，全队在佛山3-0击败勒沃库森；6月5日高家军又在留尼旺爆冷1-0击败前世界冠军法国队；11月17日全队在昆明1-0击败拉脱维亚；12月18日国足在珠海3-0大胜爱沙尼亚。如果本周三在热身赛中再次击败马其顿，就将实现对欧洲球队的五连胜。不过高洪波表示，此战对国足的最大意义在于确定征战亚洲杯的最终23人大名单，其他的都是浮云。
赛前高洪波已经公开表示：“我希望，在郜林、杜威和于海等少数主力球员的带领下，替补球员能发挥出自己的特点来，为自己多挣点前往多哈的积分。”也就是说，聪明的高洪波知道对手的斤两，以及这种热身赛的真实意义，他不会派全部主力出战，依然将以考察队员锻炼队伍为主要目的。高帅已经明确表示，中马之战后国足将根据近两场热身赛的情况，最终敲定参加亚洲杯的名单。
本期集训国家队调集了30名队员，目前有张鹭、冯仁亮、韩鹏三名队员因伤先后离队。除了程月磊到海口报到顶替张鹭外，其他两名队员离队并没有人顶替，目前继续在队参加集训的为28名队员。与马其顿的比赛结束后，哪些人将离队哪些人会搭上亚洲杯的末班车，将一目了然。

description.hltext_display: Futterneid und Schleckalarm beim "V.I.P. Hundeprofi"!/ VOX zeigt ab 15. Januar die zweite Staffel der Promi-Coaching-Doku rund um Martin Rütter
description.content:
Köln (ots) - Die erfolgreiche VOX-Coaching-Doku "Der V.I.P. Hundeprofi" meldet sich am Samstag, 15. Januar 2011 um 19:10 Uhr mit der 2. Staffel zurück! Dann widmet sich Tierpsychologe Martin Rütter in 12 neuen Folgen wieder den kleinen und großen Problemen von Promi und Tier. Denn wenn der VOX-"Hundeprofi" den VIPs mit Rat und Tat unter die Arme greift, werden die Hunde ihre Star-Allüren los - oder umgekehrt. Martin lässt sich vom Glanz der Stars nicht blenden: Er erkennt schnell, auf welcher Seite der Leine das eigentliche Problem ist und sorgt für Zufriedenheit und Harmonie bei Vier- und Zweibeinern. In der 2. Staffel mit dabei: Moderatorin Nina Ruge, die Schauspieler Peer Kusmagk und Milos Vukovic, die Moderatorinnen Dunja Hayali, Sonja Zietlow und Miriam Pede, Sänger Oli P., Fußballspieler Toni Polster, Model Jana Ina Zarrella, Moderator Uwe Hübner, "No Angels"-Sängerin Sandy Mölling und Ex-Eiskunstläuferin Tanja Szewczenko.
In der ersten Folge hat es Martin Rütter gleich mit zwei ganz unterschiedlichen Fällen zu tun: Sänger Oli Petszokat kämpft bei seinen zwei Hunden mit Futterneid und stundenlangem Schlecken, Nina Ruge sucht Unterstützung bei einem großen Schritt: Sie will sich einen zweiten Hund anschaffen.
Chaotische Zustände und Ärger im Doppelpack erwarten den "V.I.P. Hundeprofi" bei Sänger Oliver Petszokat. Die französische Bulldogge "Pontus" und Labrador-Mix "Phoebe" haben ihre ganz eigenen Macken: "Pontus" bettelt bei jeder Gelegenheit und gönnt "Phoebe" nicht das kleinste Leckerchen. Wenn "Phoebe" hingegen mit dem Schlecken angefangen hat, hört sie von alleine nicht mehr auf. "Sie denkt, ihre Aufgabe auf dieser Welt ist es, mich abzuschlecken", erklärt der Sänger. Tierpsychologe Martin Rütter hat das Spiel jedoch schnell durchschaut: "Das nennt sich soziales Komfortverhalten. Das ist nicht weiter schlimm, in maximal zehn Tagen haben wir das im Griff", so Rütter. Problematischer wird es bei der bettelnden "Pontus", die einfach alles haben will, sobald es jemand anderes bekommt. Hier sieht der "V.I.P. Hundeprofi" die Schwierigkeit mehr bei Herrchen Oliver: "Du bist ein absoluter Hunde-verrückt-Macher. Das, was du mit den Hunden machst, führt bei sensiblen Tieren zu einem Worst-Case-Szenario." Harte Worte für den Sänger. Zu allem Überfluss muss Oli P. nicht nur mit Martins Ratschlägen und Kritik klarkommen: Genüsslich, amüsiert und gerne auch mit einem Schuss Häme kommentieren sich die teilnehmenden Promis gegenseitig auf dem Weg zur perfekten Harmonie. Ob Martin Rütter aus Oliver Petszokat ein richtiges Herrchen machen kann?
Szenenwechsel: Nina Ruge hat sich entschieden: Ein neuer Hund soll neben Entlebucher Sennenhund "Lupo" an ihre Seite. Martin Rütter: "Nina und ich hatten schon in der 1. Staffel richtig Arbeit mit 'Lupo'. Ich hoffe, sie weiß, dass es mit einem zweiten Hund natürlich noch anstrengender wird!" Gemeinsam geht es für die beiden nach Italien, um bei einer ortsansässigen Schweizer-Sennenhund-Züchterin den passenden Welpen und Spielgefährten für "Lupo" auszusuchen. Eine Hündin soll es sein, so viel steht fest. Doch welchen Charakter hat das Tier? Und welcher Hund passt zu "Lupo" und Nina? Hier weiß Martin Rütter Rat: Bevor die Moderatorin einen Welpen mitnehmen kann, muss ein Vertrauenstest her: Nina soll einfach nur einen Welpen auf den Rücken drehen und trotz Gegenwehr festhalten. Doch da wird gestrampelt, gefiept und gemotzt, was das Zeug hält. Der "Hundeprofi" ist begeistert: "Das Hundetrainerherz schlägt höher bei der Welpenauswahl, das ist sehr sehr niedlich." Die kleine "Simba" soll es am Ende des Tages werden: "Das ist sie! Guck' mal, Martin, die ist doch total nett!", freut sich Nina. Wird sich "Simba" in ihrem neuen Zuhause wohl fühlen? Wie wird Energiebündel "Lupo" auf den neuen Spielgefährten reagieren und ist Nina Ruge für die neue Herausforderung gewappnet?
"Der V.I.P. Hundeprofi" mit Nina Ruge, Peer Kusmagk, Milos Vukovic, Dunja Hayali, Sonja Zietlow, Miriam Pede, Oli P., Toni Polster, Jana Ina Zarrella, Uwe Hübner, Sandy Mölling und Tanja Szewczenko ab Samstag, 15. Januar 2011 um 19:10 Uhr bei VOX.
Weitere Informationen finden Sie in der Pressemappe zur Sendung "Der V.I.P. Hundeprofi" im VOX-Pressezentrum unter http://kommunikation.vox.de.

description.hltext_display: Rancocas Valley defeats Willingboro, 60-52
description.author: Phil Anastasia
description.content:
Fortunately for Rancocas Valley, senior swingman Kenny Johnson is a versatile handyman who has a knack for patching over problems.
Johnson did a little bit of everything as Rancocas Valley scored a 60-52 victory over Willingboro on Tuesday night in a clash of Burlington County League boys' basketball powers.
The 6-foot-3 Johnson scored 2points, grabbed nine rebounds, had three steals, dished three assists, and took three charges for the Red Devils, the No. 2 team in South Jersey in The Inquirer Top 10.
Junior guard Tariq Jett collected 10 points and six assists and senior guard Kalee Marshall scored 16 for Rancocas Valley (2-0). "We don't have our full team, so everybody has to step up," Johnson said. "I'm a captain this year, and I feel like my role is to do whatever I can to help the team, whether it's score, rebound, play defense." Junior guard Terrell Maloney scored 18 for Willingboro (2-1).
The Chimeras used their height advantage to dominate on the backboards but were hurt by free-throw shooting. They were just 13 for 30 from the foul line. "You lose by eight and you miss 17 free throws, that's a tough pill to swallow," Willingboro coach Jeff Haddock said.
This was a fast-paced, physical game before a near-capacity crowd in Rancocas Valley's gym, with lots of end-to-end action and lots of fouls. "It's a rivalry game, always action-packed," Johnson said. "They come out with a lot of emotion. We come out with a lot of emotion." Rancocas Valley used a small, quick lineup - at times, the Red Devils had Johnson, the 6-foot Jett, and three 5-foot-1guards on the floor - to pressure Willingboro on the perimeter and generate a transition game. "We had a little bit of a patchwork lineup," Rancocas Valley coach Jay Flanagan said. "But as long we play defense, we should be right there." Rancocas Valley is missing two projected starters in 6-foot-shooting guard Elijah Burley and 6-foot-4 forward Kareem Jones.
Burley, who has a broken wrist, is likely out until the middle of January, if not longer. Jones, who has a sprained ankle, should be back much sooner. "We knew they were short, but they were scrappy as always," Haddock said. Johnson's three-point jumper gave Rancocas Valley a 28-20 lead at halftime. Johnson hit another three-pointer on the first possession of the second half.
Marshall added a three-pointer and a couple of layups off transition as the Red Devils stretched their advantage to 40-23. "I always tell the team the most important part of the game is the first three minutes of the second half," Flanagan said. Johnson scored 10 of his points in the fourth quarter but was just 4 for 9 from the foul line. For the game, Johnson was 7 for 14 and Rancocas Valley was 12 for 28. "We definitely need to work on that," Johnson said. Willingboro 10 10 15 17 � 52 Rancocas Valley 15 13 19 13 � 60 W: Maurice Counts 7, Dominic Cain 5, Shahaad Crowley 3, Kyle George 4, Terrell Maloney 18, Mike Owens 6, Noah Taylor 8, Rashoun Housto

event_or_fact.property: It's a rivalry game, always action-packed; They come out with a lot of emotion. We come out with a lot of emotion.
We don't have our full team, so everybody has to step up; I'm a captain this year, and I feel like my role is to do whatever I can to help the team, whether it's score, rebound,play defense.
We definitely need to work on that
a three-pointer and a couple of layups off transition as the Red Devils stretched their advantage to 40-23

I always tell the team the most important part of the game is the first three minutes of the second half

description.hltext_display: Banker gør oprør mod Nationalbanken
description.author: Ritzau
description.content:
Banker tøver med at tilmelde sig ny bankpakke trods opfordring fra Nationalbanken.
Landets bankdirektører vil ikke bakke op om den bankpakke, der skal sikre ro og stabilitet for fremtidens danske banksektor. Det sker kort tid efter, at staten med to bankpakker har reddet en stor del af landets banker fra kollaps, skriver Morgenavisen Jyllands-Posten.
Den nye pakke, der går under navnet Bankpakke III, sikrer ellers, at kunderne kan være trygge, hvis en bank fremover kommer i krise. De kan for eksempel uden problemer benytte deres dankort, fordi banken på forhånd har godkendt at lade sig overdrage til oprydningsselskabet Finansiel Stabilitet.
Hvis bankerne siger nej tak eller undlader at tage stilling til Bankpakke III, går de stik imod nationalbankdirektør Nils Bernsteins og økonomi- og erhvervsminister Brian Mikkelsens (K) usædvanligt skarpe opfordring til på forhånd at acceptere ordningen.
Jyske Banks topchef, Anders Dam, har som en af de første bankdirektører drøftet sagen med sin bestyrelse, og han stiller sig meget tvivlende overfor, om landets tredjestørste bank vil tilmelde sig ordningen.
- Vi har endnu ikke truffet en beslutning. Men det er bestemt ikke uproblematisk at gå med. Først og fremmest er der jo tale om dansk enegang, for vi er det eneste land med sådan en pakke, siger Anders Dam til avisen.
- Vi skal passe på, at det ikke påvirker vores konkurrencesituation i forkert retning. Det vil det gøre, hvis vi fundingmæssigt får sværere konditioner end vore konkurrenter, tilføjer han.

description.hltext_display: Wolfson founder sells off shares in company
description.author: Simon Bain
description.content:
David Milne, the founder of Scottish technology star Wolfson Microelectronics, has sold 250,000 of his shares in the company.
The sale came as Wolfson shares hit a three-and-a-half-year high at 290p, and raised �725,000 for Mr Milne, who is still on the board and still owns 2.84m shares or 2.45% of the company.
Wolfson shares last topped 300p in July 2007, but they slid as low as 67p in the financial crash of October 2008.
Mr Milne last sold a tranche of shares in August 2009, when the shares had rallied to 127p.
His holding, said to be about �17 million as the shares peaked at 548p in May 2006, had shrunk to �2m two years ago but was worth some �8.15m at last night?s closing price of 287p, down 4p on the day.
Mr Milne piloted the chipmaker to its 210p a share flotation in October 2003 and stepped down as chief executive in early 2007, but remained on the board as an adviser. At this year?s annual meeting he told The Herald he was happy the firm he founded as a spin-out from Edinburgh University 25 years ago was ?back on track? after a ?disappointing and frustrating? two years. His successor as chief executive Dave Shrigley lasted only 19 months before being replaced by Mike Hickey two years ago.

event_or_fact.property: he was happy the firm he founded as a spin-out from Edinburgh University 25 years ago was ?back on track? after a ?disappointing and frustrating? two years

description.hltext_display: •春節就結婚了 男友出軌對象勒索二十萬
description.content:
http://www.tianshannet.com 天山網 2010年12月22日 11:54:19 我來說兩句
更換背景顏色︰
更改文字大小︰
跟男友拍拖9年，終于決定在2011年的春節結婚了，卻意外的發現了我的未婚夫，曾經背著我，在外面跟一個女的發生了關系……
我跟男友拍拖9年，終于決定在2011年的春節結婚了。
然而，正在我們籌備婚禮以及拍婚紗的這些日子，我意外的發現了我的未婚夫，曾經背著我，在外面跟一個女的發生了關系，而且這個女人知道我們要結婚了後，就時常打電話，或QQ發信息脅迫我的未婚夫，要給她20萬作為賠償，不然就跑我們家來自殺，還寫了遺書，一封給父母，一封給我的未婚夫。她說她光腳的不怕我們穿鞋的。
未婚夫向我道歉並承諾以後不再跟這個女人有任何瓜葛，也不會給她錢。但是希望我能夠與他一起處理好這件棘手的事。
雖然很憎恨他對我的不忠，但是顧及到我們那麼多年風風雨雨相伴過來了，我還是不忍就這樣放棄這段感情，有朋友說這樣的男人你還要？勸我分手，但是我還是願意再相信他一次，希望他能吸取這次教訓，吵鬧過後依然選擇跟他一起面對。

description.hltext_display: 冯潇霆因伤无缘亚洲杯 国奥小将或随队赴多哈
description.content:
虽然还在国内，但是因伤较长时间没有训练的冯潇霆也没有参加国家队的本期集训，他已经没有可能23人名单前往多哈参加卡塔尔亚洲杯。少了冯潇霆，国奥小将李建滨则很可能得以随队前往多哈。
国家队12月1日在海口开始亚洲杯备战集训，而冯潇霆同期也一直在国内休假。虽然前段时间传出了国内恒大、实德等俱乐部向全北现代提出收购冯潇霆的消息，但此事至今还迷雾重重，没有确切结果。而这段时间，冯潇霆就在国内休假。
据悉，冯潇霆是在联赛中受伤的，也因此没有怎么参加K联赛最后一月的比赛。联赛结束后，冯潇霆因伤就一直在休息，也没有进行系统性训练。显然，以这样的情况，即便现在归队，冯潇霆的各种状态都难以适应亚洲杯比赛。在今天下午的赛前新闻发布会上，国家队助理教练区楚良表示自己一直不知道冯潇霆来队时间，其实反映了国家队和冯潇霆之间这段时间不正常的关系。――冯潇霆在相当一段时间都是游离在国家队之外，虽然队伍已经备战亚洲杯而集训了三周时间。
国足主帅高洪波，曾经对冯潇霆和蒿俊闵两名海外球员寄予厚望。他曾经表示，当前效力于海外联赛的中国球员里，就冯潇霆和蒿俊闵的进步明显，而且有望在国家队发挥更大作用。但是，这两名海外球员在本届亚洲杯上，却只有蒿俊闵一人能够归队。当然，毕竟这还只是亚洲杯比赛，国家队还可以在无法组成最强阵容的情况下投入比赛。而明年下半年世界杯外围赛中，如果再出现类似情况，对国家队来说可能就是自毁长城了。
为了减少冯潇霆不参加亚洲杯的影响，国家队这次征调队员的时候，除了杜威、赵鹏、汪强这三位国家队常客外，另外征召了国奥小将李建滨。虽然李建滨还年轻，但是参加过亚运会，也见了一些世面，教练组对他还是比较信任的。这位国奥小将，很可能会是国家队亚洲杯23人名单的最后一名队员。

description.hltext_display: UConn sets new mark of dominance
description.author: Doug Feinberg
description.content:
Connecticut women�s basketball coach Geno Auriemma, never at a loss for words, was close Tuesday night. His No. 1 Huskies topped the 88-game winning streak set by John Wooden�s UCLA men�s team from 1971-74, beating No. 22 Florida State 93-62. �I don�t want my team to compare themselves to anyone,� Auriemma said. �I�m not John Wooden and this isn�t UCLA. This is Connecticut and that�s good enough.� Maya Moore had a career-high 41 points and 10 rebounds, and freshman Bria Hartley added 21 points for the Huskies, who have not lost since April 6, 2008, in the NCAA tournament semifinals. Only twice during the record run has a team come within single digits of UConn ? Stanford in the NCAA championship game last season and Baylor in November.
When the final buzzer sounded, UConn players sprinted across the floor to shake hands with the student section as fans held up �89� signs and �89� balloons bobbed in the stands behind center court. Two other fans raised a banner that read �The Sorcerer of Storrs� ? a play on Wooden�s nickname, �The Wizard of Westwood.� After a brief huddle in front of their bench, UConn players re-emerged wearing �89 and Counting� T-shirts. Connecticut long ago established itself as the marquee program in the women�s game. The Huskies own seven national titles and four perfect seasons under Auriemma. The streak, though, takes it to another level.
UConn toppled the mark in front of a sellout crowd of 16,294 at the XL Center that included Wooden�s grandson Greg Wooden, attending his first women�s game. �My grandfather would have been thrilled. He would have been absolutely thrilled to see his streak broken by a women�s basketball team,� said Wooden, 47. �He thought, especially in the last 10 years, that the best basketball was played at the collegiate level ? and it wasn�t by the men.� With the game tied at 6, Moore and UConn (11-0) took command. The senior All-American had seven points during a 15-2 run to give Connecticut its first double-digit lead, and Moore�s fadeaway jumper from the baseline extended the advantage to 34-15. Florida State (9-3) made a quick run to cut the lead to 11, but the Huskies weren�t about to let anyone spoil this night as they ripped off the next 16 points. During his postgame news conference, Auriemma took a congratulatory phone call from President Obama. �Mr. President, I really appreciate that. It�s an incredible thing that these kids have done, and we owe you a little bit of gratitude. That lesson you gave on the White House basketball court really paid off. I appreciate you doing that for them,� Auriemma said. �We have not lost since you have been inaugurated and how �bout we keep that streak going for a couple of more years, huh?�

event_or_fact.property: He would have been absolutely thrilled to see his streak broken by a women?s basketball team,?

description.hltext_display: Viewing rugby through the eyes of a scribe - Point of view
description.content:
For some people in Sri Lanka, rugby, despite being a spectator sport, is not doing too well. They’ll also find enough reason to frown at rugby despite it having a regular slot on television, during weekends. The little success the islanders had at the Asian 5 nations is also played down by some. They say we have beaten Singapore (Sri Lanka beat Singapore in the final) before and it’s no big achievement. Sri Lanka’s juniors finished third in the ASIAD and beat South Korea, the second consecutive win inside two years, in this annual tournament. For some, this feat might be insignificant because they argue South Korea’s rugby is in the doldrums. But from a journalist’s perspective, rugby has been very beneficial, in terms of providing news throughout the year.
Rugby was in the news for both the right and wrong reasons this season. There were enough news makers who contributed to keep the ‘voice of rugby’ echoing loudly for 12 long months. The passing away of rugby coach Beauty Guneratne was mourned by not only his loved ones back in the Sabaragamuwa Province, but also by his countless number of students (Specially women’s national players) who come from all over the island. Guneratne ran a flower nursery and pumped in some of his earnings towards rugby development. His financial contributions to rugby came at a time when the SLRFU funding for development had come to a grinding halt.
We had news of a young prospect in Sri Lankan born Nigel Ratwatte returning ‘home’ to continue his rugby career. Nigel had by that time represented Mauritius at rugby sevens. When people who migrate return, they indicate in no uncertain terms that the future will be rosy for the islanders. However, in sport, these hopes will only turn to reality if players like Nigel continue to be available for selection, come 2011.
Some time during the 2010 rugby season, this writer had the good fortune of interviewing Kamal Jayawardene who is now part of the coaching team at Hisham Abdeen’s Rugby Academy. ‘Kamal Sir’ has produced many national caps and when this writer asked how many, he said, ‘Putha (son), I’ll have to go home and make some calculations, because the list is so long." Wow! What an achievement!
During the interview, he spoke of old age and feeling the strain from coaching long hours, but he vowed to continue for a few more years for the love of rugby.
A journalist is always in a fix when the result of a sporting event can be predicted. Kandy SC’s invincible run had made reading rugby news in the newspaper a little boring. CR&FC and Navy SC may have tried hard, but spectators always came to the venue expecting the juggernauts from Nittawela to take home the league trophy. The second round match between Kandy SC and CR&FC proved to be a thriller! CR&FC pulling this one off came as a shock. The shock was severe enough to jolt anybody who was half a sleep thinking domestic rugby was dull. That win by the Longden Place club brought under the microscope the emergence of two young coaches in Viraj Prashantha and Bilal Yosuf, the latter already having handled the youth national side in 2009.
We also can’t overlook the achievement of up and coming coach Nilufer Ibrahim who was offered the reins as coach of the national team, which contested the rugby test event for the Commonwealth Games in India. This team made it to the finals and lost to Malaysia. Disgruntled sports fans must fathom that these small achievements have been realised despite Sri Lanka not having a professional set up in sport. May be, it’s the Sri Lanka Rugby Football Union’s turn to tell the rugby fraternity what they’ve done since they were elected to office, to improve rugby in the island.
Imthie Marikar was heavily criticised when he quit as coach at the last hour before a national assignment. The coach, who changed his decision, wanted a player who didn’t receive the ‘vote’ of the national selectors. Sources close to Marikar pointed out that the player left out was one of the fittest and should have made the final squad. Imthie coached for free and also obliged to be part of a team which was heavily under prepared due to lack of training time. Someone can opine that under these circumstances, it was not too much for Marikar to ask whether he could name the final 12, which he thought were the best. In this scenario, it must be said that the argument that the coach must be willing to do his best with the squad named by the national selection committee also holds weight. This is why selections for rugby sevens provided matter for many controversial newspaper articles.
If Sri Lanka has seen two three quarters who have made everybody sit up and take note in recent times, they are Pradeep Liyanage and Fazil Marija. Both made lots of news this year, but unfortunately for the wrong reasons. Liyanage quit after disputing the training methods used for players, while Marija tried to get clearance to play domestic rugby in Ireland, but didn’t receive support.
Why people are venting their anger because rugby in Sri Lanka has so much potential, but no one really seems to care. Rugby in Sri Lanka is divided to shreds and it’s amazing that these islanders can win internationally when politics are at a minimum. Winning the Asian 5 nations’ Division 1 Tournament was a great example. In the school scene, we had a glorious league tournament, but couldn’t stop a very ugly finish to the knockout when some parties obtained an enjoining order to halt the final, between Royal and St. Peter’s. The spirit of sport that was lost was found again when an old boy of St. Peter’s, a deputy solicitor general, pointed out that the injunction order was against the Sri Lanka Schools Rugby Football Association and not against the two schools in the final and hence a friendly match could be arranged. A game of rugby was organised and played in all its excitement. This rejuvenated the deflated spirits of spectators who had gathered in numbers to witness the final.
From the perspective of a rugby writer, the rugby scene was like a pond with fish in plenty. This writer is sure the television presenters, rugby columnists and web based sports journalists, sponsors, referees, trainers and players would be counting their fingers till the next season begins. Rugby in Sri Lanka couldn’t be dead as some proclaim it to be. Unlike those involved directly with rugby, we scribes viewed the sport from its boundaries and hence can say the time invested in reporting was fruitful.

entity.property: the Sri Lanka Schools Rugby Football Association
Sri Lanka Schools Rugby Football Association

description.hltext_display: チェルシー、カクタとの契約延長を発表
description.content: ［Goal.com］ チェルシーは２１日、クラブの公式サイト上で、ＭＦガエル・カクタと新たに４年半の契約を結んだことを発表した。同選手の契約は今シーズン限りとなっていたが、これで２０１５年までに延長されている。カクタは２００７年にチェルシーへ加入し、０９年にデビュー。まだ１９歳で将来が嘱望されている同選手は、公式サイトで今回の契約延長について、次のように喜びを表している。「１６歳のときにチェルシーと契約してから、僕はずっとトップチームのことを考えていた。今は何度かそこでプレーできたし、さらに４年半の契約を結ぶことができた。スタメン入りを目指さなければいけない。自分の夢を実現させないとね」「監督からは、プレーするのに適切なタイミングだと言われた。僕もそう思う。僕の仕事はベストを尽くし、より頻繁にプレーして、監督に自分が十分に良いプレーをすることを見せることだ」「若いときにチャンピオンズリーグでプレーするなんて、夢なんだよ。もっと多くの試合に出たいと願っている。経験豊富な選手たちとプレーするのも、いつだって良いことさ。より早く学び、より早く成長できるからね」

description.hltext_display: •我暫時不想結婚 她一個月內就跟了別人
description.content:
http://www.tianshannet.com 天山網 2010年12月22日 11:54:13 我來說兩句
更換背景顏色︰
更改文字大小︰
我和她是08年經過同學介紹認識的。現在我26，她28。都在上海，她說想和我結婚，我固執的認為兩個人在一起和結婚有什麼區別呢？就這樣她父母就一個勁的反對我們。
我是一個喜歡潛水的人，一般都是默默的看文章，看下評論。感悟下傾訴者和評論者兩者的不同心態。通過兩者觀點的對比去領悟人間真諦。
但是當一些感情上的事情發生在我自己頭上時，我就沉默不住了。說出來讓大家來評評，或許心理會找到一些平衡。
我和她是08年經過同學介紹認識的。現在我26，她28。都在上海，那時候她的工作是房屋中介，我是搞IT（網站運營）的。或許一開始彼此都對得上眼吧。感情很快升溫。
和我在一起後，我教她工作上從房屋中介轉型到文員，一開始她說做文員她不會。我鼓勵她支持她。到現在做采購，我都一步步支持她鼓勵她。
我是一個事業心很重的人，覺得作為一個男人一定要出人頭地。可能是受家庭環境影響從小我就很獨立，也為了那句話出人頭地。一進大學我就開始在外兼職到畢業，自學IT知識。
那時候，我自主創業。很辛苦也很累。壓力也比較大，她一直都很支持我。隨著時間的推移轉眼到了09年，此時我們已經在一起兩年多的時間了。可能是經驗不足（我07年畢業）加上各種原因，為了生活，我不得不放棄。去外邊找工作。
此時的她就開始發生一些小變化，變得想法多起來，感覺我不夠努力，思想不夠成熟等等。總之經常會為事業上的事情小吵小鬧的。
她說想和我結婚，我固執的認為兩個人在一起和結婚有什麼區別呢？不就是差一個證的問題嗎？大家彼此都要為了自己的事業去好好奮斗，到了該結婚的時候結就是了（我承認現在我知道我這個觀點是錯了，女孩子更希望是有一個歸屬）。
我希望她是一個積極奮斗的人，但是她是一個會說不怎麼會做的人，腦子很靈活，說一個觀點一套一套的，但是在真正做的時候就不這樣了，晚上下班回來不看電影就看小說。為了這個事情我和她吵過多次。我說你一直說我，我天天在努力，你呢？就知道玩。說多了就和玩貓和老鼠游戲一樣，一看到我就把電影關了。說實話這樣我也很煩，努力是要靠自己自覺的發自內心的。
可能這樣說多了吧，她自己也覺得太煩了太累了。以至于就開始亂想。把我不願意和她結婚的事告訴她父母。可憐天下父母心，听到這個還得了啊。就這樣她父母就一個勁的反對我們。
她是一個不喜歡言語的人，什麼事情不到萬不得一是不說出口的。也就是在上個月（11月份）的時候，她突然說要回去。一下搞得我措手不及。而且一旦下定決心就死不回頭（這是她的性格）我好話歹話都說了，求她不要離開我。還是一個勁的說一點我要回去我們要分開一段時間。
我當時也拿她沒辦法，就想讓她回去散散心也行。等過完年了以後在來，也許就好了。但是事情在這個點上就發生了N度的大轉彎。上個月18號到現在，短短一個月的時間，他和另一個男人好上了，而且去了深圳。一直都不給我說，還很關心我。
直到上周，我把這事給我爸媽說了，叫我激她下。她才全說出來了……
我極力求她說，你回去後，我一直在深刻反思總結，或許我不應該讓你和我一樣去承擔這個壓力去拼搏。我們三年的感情難道敵不過一個月只有一個月的嗎？但是她就說兩個字︰“晚了”。不可能回頭了。我說他有什麼好？她說他31歲，比我大，思想比我成熟，懂得承擔，在深圳有兩套房。听到這話給我無比大的壓力。因為我一套房都沒有。
她說她很現實，物質對于女孩子是一種安全感。我听了，心里好難受！一方面覺得她為什麼變化那麼快？短短一個月的時間，就和另一個男人在一起，我和她可是三年的感情呢！她說她也放不下。我一說我感冒了身體不好了，就想關心我，說想和我做普通朋友。想看到我事業一步一步起來。
我說你為什麼這麼放得下，她說︰真正的放得下，是我離開你都不說一聲，也不讓你聯系到的，都不理你的，不管你任何的事情的。
這話听著好象是有些道理，我想不管怎麼樣，你已經拋棄我了，背叛我了。
在事業上我表現得很沉著，會很理智的去思考問題，但是在感情上我表現得很浮躁，可能是我真愛她了吧。情緒極度低迷。經常失眠。
今天早上她電話給我（我給她說我生病了），說擔心我的身體狀況。也說現在那個男的以前也是這樣，和他在一起的女人因為遇到更好的，所以離開他了。
我就在想你剛好彌補上去，那我呢？又被抽空了。難道我就是你的台階嗎？你沒遇到好的之前你就和我好好在一起，現在遇到好的了，你就義無返顧的離開我。還反過來還來安慰我，叫我好好奮斗！真是無語啊……

description.hltext_display: Itri et Gül insistent sur l'importance de la relation stratégique entre les deux pays ... Le communiqué conjoint syro-turc : Détermination à approfondir la coopération bilatérale dans tous les domaines
description.content:
Ankara / Le président turc, Abdullah Gül, a insisté sur l'importance de la relation stratégique avec la Syrie, soulignant qu'elle est devenue un exemple à suivre pour servir les questions de la région et de ses peuples. Rencontrant aujourd'hui M. Mohammad Naji Itri, président du Conseil des Ministres, le président Gül a souligné la nécessité de consolider les relations de coopération accrue entre les deux pays et de développer leurs perspectives pour satisfaire les liens historiques et culturels existant entre les deux peuples amis. Le président turc s'est informé de M. Itri des résultats des travaux de la 2ème réunion du conseil stratégique de haut niveau entre la Syrie et la Turquie et des projets d'accords signés au terme des travaux de la réunion et qui ont pour but l'augmentation du volume des échanges commerciaux et l'élargissement de la base de la coopération bilatérale économique et d'investissement. Le communiqué conjoint clôturant la 2ème réunion du Conseil de coopération stratégique de haut niveau syro-turc Un communiqué conjoint a été publié à la suite de la 2ème réunion du Conseil de coopération stratégique de haut niveau syro-turc qui a insisté sur la coopération profonde entre les deux pays dans tous les domaines. Le communiqué a affirmé la satisfaction des deux parties quant au niveau des relations bilatérales atteint depuis la 1ère réunion tenue à Damas le 23 décembre 2009.
Les ministres des deux pays ont tenu des réunions bilatérales au cours desquelles ils ont poursuivi l'exécution des 51 documents signés lors de la 1ère réunion du Conseil.
Les deux parties ont exprimé leur satisfaction devant le niveau de la coopération sécuritaire et affirmé leur disposition à renforcer cette coopération qui constitue une contribution à la sécurité et à la stabilité régionales.
Elles se sont félicitées de l'exécution de l'accord de libre échange mis en exécution le 1er janvier 2007 et affirmé que cet accord est l'un des moyens les plus importance pour la promotion du commerce entre les deux pays.
Les deux parties ont exprimé leur satisfaction devant les efforts actuels pour l'exploration et la production commune des sources hydrocarbonées et dans les domaines de l'électricité et du gaz naturel.
Les développements au Moyen-Orient et des questions d'intérêt communs ont été passés en revue au cours de cette réunion qui a porté également sur l'importance de la réalisation de la paix, de la sécurité, de la stabilité et de la prospérité des deux peuples et des peuples de la région.
Les deux parties ont convenu de soutenir les efforts de la réalisation de la sécurité et de la stabilité en Irak, tout en se félicitant de la compréhension à laquelle sont parvenus les groupes politiques irakiens.
A propos du Liban, les deux parties ont insisté sur l'importance de la sauvegarde du calme et de la stabilité au Liban, réitérant leur engagement de poursuivre la conjugaison des efforts pour aider à encourager le dialogue entre les groupes politiques libanais.
Les deux parties ont affirmé le besoin urgent de trouver un règlement global du conflit arabo-israélien sur les trois volets, tout en réitérant leur conviction que le règlement juste et permanent doit être basé sur les résolutions du Conseil de sécurité, le principe de la terre contre la paix, la référence de Madrid et l'initiative de la paix arabe. Les deux parties ont également affirmé le besoin urgent de lever le blocus injuste imposé au peuple de Gaza. La partie syrienne a réitéré son appréciation du rôle honnête que joue la Turquie pour la réalisation de la paix juste et globale dans la région et accueilli favorablement les efforts déployés par la Turquie lors des pourparlers indirects entre la Syrie et Israël. Les deux parties ont convenu de poursuivre la coordination et la coopération pour parvenir à un règlement permanent garantissant le retrait israélien total du Golan syrien occupé en 1967.
Les deux premiers ministres se sont félicités de la signature des onze documents de coopération touchant les différents domaines.
Augmentent des voyages aériens entre la Syrie et la Turquie pour couvrir la croissance du nombre des passagers entre les deux pays Le ministre turc du transport, Binali Yildirim, a indiqué que la Syrie et la Turquie se sont mises d'accord sur l'augmentation du nombre des voyages aériens entre elles grâce à l'augmentation accrue du nombre des passagers et des marchandises acheminées entre les deux pays, notamment après l'annulation des visas d'entrée entre la Syrie et la Turquie. Le ministre turc du transport, Binali Yildirim, a indiqué que la Syrie et la Turquie se sont mises d'accord sur l'augmentation du nombre des voyages aériens entre elles grâce à l'augmentation accrue du nombre des passagers et des marchandises acheminées entre les deux pays, notamment après l'annulation des visas d'entrée entre la Syrie et la Turquie. Dans une déclaration faite à l'agence SANA au terme de la 2ème réunion du conseil de coopération stratégique de haut niveau entre la Syrie et la Turquie, M. Yildirim a indiqué que les deux pays uvreront pour ouvrir la ligne de TGV entre Gaziantep et Alep. Il a fait savoir que le conseil a examiné nombre de questions contribuant à la facilitation et la simplification des mesures dans les postes frontaliers, soulignant que le conseil a également discuté de la coopération bilatérale dans le domaine de la navigation maritime. M. Yildirim a indiqué que les ministres du transport de Syrie, du Liban, de Jordanie et de Turquie tiendront le mois prochain à Amman une réunion pour examiner la coopération dans le domaine du transport dans le secteur régional. A. Chatta / R. Bittar

description.hltext_display: 苏东：贝尼特斯或起死回生 暴雪反成英超福音
description.content:
世俱杯的夺冠，成了贝尼特斯在国际米兰最后的救命稻草。他的表现就像一个小孩子一样，一百万分地放大胜利的意义进而任性地要求权利和关注，但他的心里其实又清楚得很，这样的公关，做了未必能通，但不做绝对不行。
而事情的发展也在正常的轨道上发展，一个冠军挽救了表面上的决裂，却扩大了队内众叛亲离的矛盾，主席莫拉蒂不管他了，马特拉齐不屑他了，无论是上层还是基层的关系，都足以让贝帅“头疼不是两三天”。
他其实也冤，只是找不到更恰当的人替他埋单。换帅如换刀再一次地没有发生在他身上，与上次红军老板付不起违约金不同，这次真的就要看莫拉蒂的耐心了。除非老贝真的非常好命，像上个赛季的范加尔一样，突然就起死回生了。
当然，这只是调侃。一个世俱杯冠军成色几何，所有人的眼睛都是雪亮的。而现在，摆在贝尼特斯和国际米兰面前的，除了人心不齐，还有伤病、状态难调等诸多问题，贝尼特斯倒是可以祈祷，意大利的雪可以多下一些，让短暂的冬歇期可以更久一些，或许，这能让矛盾冷处理。
说到这欧洲的暴雪，真是肆无忌惮。影响了欧洲人的日常生活，也影响了我们的周末安排。不少球迷都对曼联和切尔西之间的红蓝大战倍儿期待，可暴雪硬是让一切都被迫搁浅。好在，那儿的天气没有像美国一样，造成橄榄球场的顶棚倒塌，不然，这积蓄已久的暴雪一泻千里的场景，可真不好用“壮观”来形容。
不过，对欧洲足球而言，这暴雪的到来也不全是坏事。一如贝尼特斯的国际米兰需要一场“及时雪”来缓解队内的矛盾和气氛，对于没有冬歇期的英超联赛而言，也算是给多支球队都放了个短假，圣诞快乐，新年快乐。
这样一来，弗格森这些名帅也不用站出来抨击赛事过于密集而导致球队身心疲惫了，英超的那些球星大腕儿们也不用埋怨缺乏休息而导致疲劳和伤病了，英足总也不用改变不休赛的历史和传统，真是皆大欢喜。
自得其乐一番大笑，但还是要正视，欠下的总要补上的，到时候更为密集的一周双赛，各位球员们是否吃得消又是另一番考验。毕竟，这不是以赛代练，成绩的压力之下，现实的矛盾自然会增多。
所幸即将到来的2011年是体育小年，球员们的运动生涯和职业规划也都可以有条不紊地预先安排好。并且，这些事情都交给经纪人，球员们、特别是英超的球员们要做的，就是享受着难得的圣诞假期吧。

description.hltext_display: Massive Rogue Power Cuts Back In Vogue
description.content:
User Rating: / 0
PoorBest
Srinagar, Dec 21, KONS: The Power Development Department’s unannounced and unscheduled power cuts in Kashmir have assumed crisis proportions as consumers, particularly in outlying districts, get electricity barely for four out of 24 hours.
Failing to come out with a curtailment schedule which at least could leave consumers forewarned, the PDD has not even resorted to its stock and lame excuse of generation falling drastically during lean months to explain the massive power cuts in force in Kashmir.
The central government which sucks out every megawatt of hydel power produced in the state during months of high discharge leaves Jammu and Kashmir, particularly the latter, high and dry in harsh winters by its stingy policy on exporting power to the region.
The state government too has been pathetically wanting in anticipating the situation ensuing due to a prolonged dry spell and taking advance measures to avert a grave crisis.
It has hidden behind a stony silence on the power situation in Kashmir, and uses planted stories in the media to accustom the public to the coming dark and difficult days.
Deeming itself not accountable to the public in Kashmir, the government does not bother to explain how it can charge full fees from consumers when it cannot keep even a fraction of its agreement on supplying power.

description.hltext_display: Ratings agency Moody's puts Portuguese government bonds on review
description.content:
MADRID - Ratings agency Moody's warned Tuesday it could downgrade Portugal's public debt because of uncertain economic growth amid the nation's austerity drive, the high cost of borrowing on global markets and worries about the banking sector.
Portugal's sovereign credit rating could be lowered a notch or two from A1, Moody's Investors Service said in a statement. The agency last week slashed Ireland's rating by five notches and also warned Spain and Greece of possible downgrades.
Portugal is considered one of the weakest links in the 16-nation eurozone and fears it could follow Greece and Ireland in needing a bailout have pushed its borrowing costs sharply higher. It has been struggling with high debt and low growth since before the global financial crisis, but the government insists it can resolve its problems without help.
"In Moody's opinion, Portugal's solvency is not in question," said Anthony Thomas, Moody's lead analyst for Portugal, "But the likely deterioration in debt affordability over the medium term and ongoing concerns about the economy's ability to withstand fiscal consolidation and private sector deleveraging mean its outlook may no longer be consistent with an A1 rating."
Many economists worry that eurozone nations' austerity efforts to cut deficits will also hurt growth and that banks' losses will weigh on public finances. After Greece and Ireland resorted to help from the EU and International Monetary Fund, Portugal and even much larger Spain — both still tapping the open market for credit — have caused borrowing rates to jump.
"The markets have remained open to the Portuguese government, but it is having to pay an elevated price, which if sustained will increase substantially its debt service costs over time," Thomas said.
Portugal has in the past borrowed huge amounts to finance welfare entitlements and private consumption. At the same time it has protected jobs through outdated labour laws that make it difficult to hire and fire workers while industry has broadly failed to modernize and is chronically uncompetitive.
The country's austerity package, due to be introduced Jan. 1, cuts the pay of public employees by an average 5 per cent, trims welfare benefits and hikes income tax and sales tax. The government is also in talks with unions about labour reforms.
Economy Minister Jose Vieira da Silva has said the government wants to reduce the financial and bureaucratic burden on companies reducing their workforce. That may include paying less compensation to fired workers.
Last year's state budget deficit of 9.6 per cent was below Greece's 15.4 per cent but was still the fourth-highest in the eurozone.
Portugal recorded growth of 1.8 per cent in the first nine months this year, and exports rose more than 15 per cent.

event_or_fact.property: In Moody's opinion, Portugal's solvency is not in question
The markets have remained open to the Portuguese government, but it is having to pay an elevated price, which if sustained will increase substantially its debt service costs over time

description.hltext_display: K's coach's job is secure despite team's struggles
description.author: Justin A. Cohn
description.content:
But with Fort Wayne, he�s never overseen a stretch as bad as this season�s 5-15-1 start that has the Komets 10 points behind Evansville for the eighth and final playoff spot in the Central Hockey League�s Turner Conference.
One CHL coach has been fired this season ? ex-Komets player Kevin Kaminski was axed in Mississippi ? but Sims� job seems safe even if Fort Wayne doesn�t turn this season around. �We are not going to do anything with the head coaching position,� general manager David Franke said. �We feel very confident in Al. He�s working to try to better the hockey club. He�s trying everything he can. �No, nothing�s going on with Al Sims� (job) at all.� Franke and Sims, who put the roster together, have admitted to misjudging the talent on their team and may have underestimated the CHL�s skill level. �Looking back, we thought a lot of our players would do better than they have,� said Sims, who coached the NHL�s San Jose Sharks in 1996-97. �(Mathieu) Curadeau, (Derek) Patrosso, (Brandon) Naurato, all of the players we had brought in who had scored in the past, we expected them to score the same at this level and that might have been a mistake. But these guys were proven scorers. That�s all I can say.� The Komets released Naurato ? he will be in the lineup tonight for visiting Dayton ? and stripped Guy Dupuis of his captaincy and P.C. Drouin of his alternate captaincy. They�ve acquired Tab Lardner via a trade with Missouri. And more changes will be coming, Franke said.
Sometimes, players on struggling teams begin tuning out the coach, but Sims, 57, doesn�t believe that�s happening. In fact, he has heaped praise on their efforts throughout the last four games of their seven-game losing streak, while also deriding their penchant for penalties and inability to capitalize on scoring chances.
The next three games are against the Gems (13-9-1), coached by Fort Wayne native Brian Gratz, whom the Komets are 0-4-0 against this season. �I think there�s still time to salvage this,� Franke said. �That�s our opinion, that we still can. But we�ve got to start right now. We can�t fall much farther behind, otherwise, it will take a Herculean task to get back into the playoff race. We do have a lot of games, 45 of them, to play, though.�

event_or_fact.property: And more changes will be coming
?Looking back, we thought a lot of our players would do better than they have,?

description.hltext_display: League: Carney calls on NRL to stop defections
description.content:
Dally M Medalist Todd Carney has thrown his support behind rugby league nomad Greg Inglis, saying the NRL needs to do more to keep its star players from defecting to the AFL.
Speaking exclusively to Nine, the Roosters five-eighth said another big-name player moving to a rival code would be a huge blow to rugby league, just as Inglis was due to hold talks with AFL club Essendon.
"To lose a player of his calibre will not only hurt the NRL, but also Queensland and Souths," Carney told Nine's Erin Molan.
"We can't keep letting players leave the game, as they are obviously the main thing people are coming to watch.
"He is an excitement machine, and we don't want to see him lighting the AFL on fire when he could be lighting up the NRL."
The former Canberra Raiders star said that the delay in finding a new contract would affect Inglis's preparations for 2011.
"Teams have been back since November, so it has delayed his progress in getting fit for the start of the season.
"Not only him, but the club would want him to start training and meet his new teammates as soon as possible.
"It has to be frustrating and I guess that's why his management team are looking at other avenues. You can't just sit and wait."
Following the defections of league stars Israel Folau and Karmichael Hunt to AFL, Carney acknowledged that the temptation could be there for other players to make the move.
"We've got to see how Karmichael and Israel go. I've got no doubt they will be dominant forces in AFL," Carney said.
"If others see them doing well they may defect, but I'd like to think players will stay in the NRL, and that the NRL will work out ways to keep players in the game."
As for turning out for the Sydney Swans or Greater Western Sydney Giants one day, Carney was adamant that he would stay loyal to the game he loves.
"I'm happy with rugby league. It's something I grew up playing and I wouldn't leave," he said.
"Players out wide - wingers and fullbacks, might be able to handle it, but for me, I'm staying in rugby league."

description.hltext_display: 北 김정일ㆍ정은 부자, 희천발전소 건설장 시찰
description.content:
북한 김정일 국방위원장이 자강도 희천발전소 건설현장에 가 '강성대국 원년'인 2012년 이전에 공사를 끝내라고 지시했다고 조선중앙통신이 22일 전했다.
김 위원장이 이 발전소 건설현장을 시찰한 것은 올해 들어 1월4일(중앙통신 보도날짜 기준), 4월17일, 11월3일에 이어 4번째다.
북한 매체가 이 발전소 착공 소식을 처음 전한 시점은 2001년 3월이다. 그러나 공사에 속도가 붙기 시작한 것은 2009년 초 김 위원장의 `2012년 이전 완공' 지시로 `군인건설자'(건설노동 군인 지칭)들이 투입되면서부터다.
청천강 상류에 위치한 이 발전소는 발전용량 30만㎾로, 남한의 충주수력발전소(40만㎾)와 소양강수력발전소(20만㎾)의 중간 규모다. 하지만 북한 중앙방송은 작년 3월 희천발전소에 대해 `최근 20여년간 (북한에서) 건설된 발전소 가운데 규모와 공사량에서 가장 방대하다'고 전한 바 있다.
중앙통신에 따르면 김 위원장은 이날 후계자 김정은(당 중앙위 부위원장)과 함께 마감단계에 들어선 희천2호발전소의 댐 건설현장을 시찰하고 "군인건설자 등 발전소 건설자들의 투쟁에 의해 2012년 전에 건설을 끝낼 수 있는 전망이 열렸다"면서 "수령님(김일성 주석) 탄생 100돐 전에 발전소 건설을 끝내기 위해 전당, 전군, 전민이 공격전을 벌려야 한다"고 말했다.
그는 희천청년전기연합기업소에도 들러 생산공정과 새로 만든 전기제품을 둘러봤다고 중앙통신은 덧붙였다.
이번 현지지도에는 김정은 외에 당 정치국 위원인 김경희(당 부장 겸직)와 후보위원인 장성택(국방위 부위원장〃), 박도춘ㆍ최룡해ㆍ태종수ㆍ김평해(당 비서 〃), 국방위원회 국장인 현철해ㆍ리명수가 수행했다.
북한 매체가 김 위원장의 공개활동 소식을 전한 것은 21일 자강도 희천연하기계공업공장 시찰 이후 하루만이다.

description.hltext_display: Eye bigger picture, not quick money: Amartya Sen at TiE summit
description.author: admin
description.content:
Images Document Summary B ig enterprises need to focus on the bigger picture and long-term instead of getting carried away by the lure of quick money, Nobel laureate Professor Amartya Sen said Tuesday.
"Business community plays a unique role, but they are also part of the society. They should not get into making quick money on the sly," Sen said at the inaugural session of The Indus Entrepreneurs (TiE) summit here.
"They have to think big, not just in terms of money, but also in terms of remedies for the society," he said.
On the recent scams and scandals, Sen said it was disturbing but its impact should not be exaggerated.
"Scams are not special to India. Its impact should not be over-estimated," he said.
Sen said Prime Minister Manmohan Singh was a man of integrity and it would be bizarre to link his name to any corruption or scandal.
"Having known Manmohan Singh from college days, I can say that he is a man of integrity. Nobody can question that," the Nobel prize winner said.
Earlier, Sen inaugurated the three-day summit being organised by TiE, a group of over 15,000 first generation entrepreneurs from 14 countries.
Addressing a session on innovation, Noted film maker Shekhar Kapur said: "Entrepreneurship comes out of nothing, so if we can force entrepreneurship down to the bottom of the pyramid, we can become a truly great nation."
Kapur said the real power of India is in how "we manage the bottom of the pyramid".
"The ‘I' in India should stand for innovation, and not for imitation," said R.A. Mashelkar, chairman of the National Innovation Foundation.
Emphasising the need for inclusive growth, Mashelkar said the new slogan around innovation is "More for less for more".
The event also witnessed a special session on sports, where champion shooter Gagan Narang spoke about the support parents need to give to children who are interested in taking up sports as their career.
Concluded.

The ?I' in India should stand for innovation, and not for imitation
the new slogan around innovation is "More for less for more"
Scams are not special to India.; Its impact should not be over-estimated

They have to think big, not just in terms of money, but also in terms of remedies for the society

description.hltext_display: イタリア、８２年Ｗ杯優勝監督が逝去
description.content: ［Goal.com］ １９８２年のスペイン・ワールドカップ（Ｗ杯）でイタリア代表を優勝に導いたエンツォ・ベアルゾット監督が２１日、逝去した。８３歳だった。ベアルゾット監督は現役時代にトリノ、インテル、カターニアなどでプレー。６９年からイタリア代表の下部組織を率い、７５年からＡ代表の指揮官へ。７８年のアルゼンチンＷ杯では見事なパフォーマンスで４位となり、８２年のスペインＷ杯では大きな批判を浴びながらも優勝を果たし、栄華を極めた。だがその後、８４年のＥＵＲＯでは予選敗退。８６年のメキシコＷ杯でもベスト１６で姿を消し、代表監督の座を退いた。１２月２１日はイタリアが３４年、３８年のＷ杯連覇を成し遂げた際の指揮官、ヴィットーリオ・ポッツォ監督が亡くなった日でもある。これも何かの運命だったのだろうか。

description.hltext_display: Under-13 Div-I Cricket Quarter-finals - Richmond juniors cap successful year
description.content:
Under-13 cricketers of Richmond College, Galle capped a successful year in cricket for their alma mater as they booked a semi-final berth in the Inter-school Under-13 Division-I cricket tournament, beating Thurstan College in the quarter-final played at Royal College Junior Cricket Ground, Reid Avenue, Colombo yesterday. The year 2010 saw their Under-19 team clinch the Wesley Sixes title for the first time. Their Under-15 team shared the Inter-school Under-15 Division-I cricket title with St. Joseph’s College, Darley Road (the final was affected by rain). Now with their Under-13 cricketers securing a semi-final berth in the lowest age group cricket tournament, the Southern Province school has achieved a feat which is otherwise synonymous with only a few Colombo schools. Some Colombo schools such as Royal College and St. Peter’s College managed to secure top spots in many an age group cricket tournament every year.
Richmond survived a middle-order collapse to post 221 runs before skipper B. H. Hirusha picked up five wickets to rattle Thurstan College helping them to secure a 41-run victory. Richmond College were in a bit of bother at one stage after their pre-quarter-final centurion Charith Asalanka was given lbw for five runs. But their late middle-order managed to take the team pass 200-run mark with Sudesh Vincent scoring an unbeaten 36 runs. Top-order batsman Randika Seneviratne top scored for them with 65, while Wanindu Hasaranga added 35.
In reply, Thurstan were bowled out for 180 as Hirusha picked up five wickets. Now, Richmond will meet Bandaranaike College, Gampaha in the semi-finals, to be played next January.
Scores:
Richmond 221 for 9 wkts in 50 overs (Randika Seneviratne 65, Wanindu Hasaranga 35, Sudesh Vincent 36 n.o., Dananjaya Lakshan 26; Thushan Wijewickrama 2/35, Oshan Kariyawasam 3/38, Charana Nanayakkara 2/46)
Thurstan 180 all out in 46.5 overs (Danuja Weerasinghe 62, Kavinda Fernando 26, Thushan Wijewickrama 19 n.o.; B.H. Hirusha 5/41)
Bandaranaike beat
Joes according to Parabola System
Bandaranaike College, Gampaha secured a 34-run victory over St. Joseph’s College, Darley Road according to the Parabola System in the Inter-school U-13 Div-I tournament quarter-final played at Shalika Ground, Colombo yesterday.
After conceding 42 extras, the Josephians found a target of 175 runs too difficult to chase as they lost six wickets for 107 runs when rain and bad light forced an early end to the match. By then, Bandaranaike were 34 runs ahead according to the Parabola System.
Scores:
Bandaranaike 174 for 9 wkts in 50 overs (Madawa de Silva 21, Yasitha Kudahetti 19, Minol Senanayake 16, Shan Denawaka 17 n.o., (Extras 42); Akila Perera 5/29)
St. Joseph’s 107 for 6 wkts in 33 overs (Sandaruwan Rodrigo 20, Shehan Seneviratne 25 n.o., Pasindu Perera 3/27, Sahan Jayathilaka 2/13)
Panadura Royal continue impressive run
Royal College, Panadura continued their impressive run in the tournament as their off-spinner Theja Shaluka picked up four wickets to restrict fancied Nalanda College to 134 runs and secure a 38-run victory in their quarter-final match played at Ananda College Ground yesterday.
Scores:
Royal, Panadura 172 for 8 wkts in 50 overs (Pathum Nirmal 23, Raveen Lakshan 26, Nuwan Danuka 27, Nilan Fernando 24; Kanishka Dahanayake 2/31)
Nalanda 134 all out in 40.2 overs (Sahan Dinura 43, Theja Shaluka 4/22, Sachin Tharuka 2/16).

description.hltext_display: Shoppers spending more, but only just
description.content:
Shoppers are expected to spend more money in Queensland leading up to Christmas than they did last year, but only just, the Australian Retailers Association (ARA) says.
The peak industry body has projected that for Queensland from the last two weeks of November through to Christmas Eve consumers will spend $8.2 billion of the $39.9 billion it expects to be spent across the country.
But that is not a big increase, up from $8.1 billion over the same period last year.
ARA executive director Russell Zimmerman said retailers were hoping that having five full weekdays of shopping before Christmas would give retailers a slight advantage.
"It is going to be a very ordinary Christmas with a techno twist," Mr Zimmerman told AAP.
He said goods like iPads and iPhones were selling well, but some of the normally popular items at Christmas like small electrical goods and packaged perfumes had already gone on sale because they were not selling well.
"Clothes are also doing poorly, mainly because of the weather, with people reluctant to buy when it has been wet and cooler than normal," Mr Zimmerman said.
He said the tourist areas of Queensland like the Gold Coast would also be hit hard because of the drop in the number of visitors spending their money.
Mr Zimmerman said there were a number of reasons for the sluggish pre-Christmas sales.
He said the wet and cooler than normal weather and the Melbourne Cup Day interest rate rise when banks almost doubled the Reserve Bank increase were two of the main ones.
"It was just like someone turned the tap off," Mr Zimmerman said.
He said figures released on Tuesday by Fitch Ratings showed in Queensland there had been a significant increase in the number of people in arrears on their mortgage payments and that also had to be a factor.
The aftermath of the global financial crisis and the big increases in electricity and water bills were also having an impact, Mr Zimmerman said.
However, despite hopingconsumers would keep on spending over the final two days before Christmas, Mr Zimmerman also adopted a cautious approach and urged people to "spend wisely".

description.hltext_display: Pirátska strana spustila českú verziu WikiLeaks - PirateLeaks
description.content:
Česká Pirátska strana nadviazala na WikiLeaks a spustila českú webovú stránku PirateLeaks.cz. Jej cieľom je otvoriť verejnej kontrole činnosť úradov vrátane ich financií.
Strana má v pláne poskytovať bezpečný a anonymný priestor pre publikovanie tajných dokumentov z celoštátnych, regionálnych i miestnych úradov, ako aj z vládnych ministerstiev, a chce tiež byť v priamom kontakte so spravodajskými médiami, pre ktoré by sa PiraLeaks mal stať vierohodným zdrojom informácií.
Strana na PirateLeaks uvádza, že chce začleniť tému otvorenosti do českého politického diskursu a ukázať politikom, že finančná otvorenosť a zverejňovanie informácií nie je utópia, ale ako zásadový a účinný postup, ako zlepšiť službu verejnosti. PirateLeaks však nebude zverejňovať súkromné podrobnosti o politikoch.
"Podarilo sa nám pripraviť riešenia, ktoré zabezpečia, že budú zverejňované dokumenty s podstatným dopadom na verejnosť, ktorých zverejnenie verejnosť nepoškodí. Práve naopak, spoločnosť by poškodilo, keby zverejnené neboli," napísal na webe koordinátor projektu Jakub Michálek.
Materiály pred zverejnením prejdú kontrolou editorov, ktorí ich overia. V prípadnom spore rozhodne rada. Všetko má byť v súlade s platnými zákonmi.
Krátko po spustení bola webová stránka PirateLeaks.cz ťažko prístupná, strana to pripísala veľkému záujmu o ňu. Večer už fungovala bez problémov.
Zdroj: Associated Press, www.zive.cz

description.hltext_display: Barcelona held by Athletic Bilbao in Copa clash (tribalfootball.com)
description.content:
Barcelona have been held to a goalless draw at home by Athletic Bilbao in the first leg of their Copa del Rey last-16 tie.
The match at the Nou Camp pitted the two most successful sides in Copa del Rey history against each other - Barca having 25 crowns to Athletic's 23 - and was a repeat of the 2009 final which the Catalan side won 4-1.
Barca went into the encounter averaging more than four goals a game in winning their last 10 successive fixtures, but they could not find even one breakthrough on this occasion despite playing most of their star names, with Xavi, Andres Iniesta and Pedro Rodriguez starting and David Villa and Lionel Messi appearing as second-half substitutes. Pep Guardiola's men dominated but Bojan Krkic and Iniesta were both denied by Athletic goalkeeper Gorka Iraizoz in the first half before Xavi volleyed a decent opening after the break and Villa had an effort ruled out.
Gerard Pique then had a great chance right at the end to earn his side a narrow advantage to take to San Mames when Messi picked out his run into the box, but the Spain international volleyed wide with his less-favoured left foot and Athletic were able to congratulate themselves on a job well done.

description.hltext_display: Two killed after inhaling gas at Dr Reddy`s Lab
description.content:
Hyderabad: Two workers of the drug firm Dr Reddy's Laboratories lost their lives and two others fell unconscious in an accidental gas leak on Wednesday morning at its manufacturing plant at Bollaram on the outskirts of Hyderabad.
"Only after examination by the medical experts, we can know the name of the chemical which leaked," police said adding further details were awaited.
In a statement, Dr Reddy's Laboratories said an employee of the company and a contract staff had died in the accident.
"The authorities are currently investigating the unfortunate deaths of an employee and a contract staff working at our manufacturing facility in Bollaram, Hyderabad," it said.
"No other persons were injured. We will advise on further details once the investigations are complete," the company's statement added.
The firm's Bollaram manufacturing facility produces active pharmaceutical ingredients (API).
Police said the victims at the company's facility that is located in Medak district of Andhra Pradesh were on night duty.
There was a chemical leakage from a unit at Bollaram village of Dr Reddy's Laboratories which resulted in two deaths and two falling ill, it said.
Reacting to the news, shares of Dr Reddy's tanked 4.13 per cent to a month-low of Rs 1,618 per piece on the Bombay Stock Exchange in early morning trade.
The scrip saw a similar fall on the National Stock Exchange, and quoted at Rs 1,616.10, down 4.18 per cent in the morning session.

event_or_fact.property: Two workers of the drug firm Dr Reddy's Laboratories lost their lives and two others fell

description.hltext_display: •女友媽媽給她找對象 下跪求她跟她結婚
description.content:
http://www.tianshannet.com 天山網 2010年12月22日 11:55:29 我來說兩句
更換背景顏色︰
更改文字大小︰
她媽媽一直非讓她跟那個男的，我們不理會。他竟然和她媽媽一起到了我們的學校，當著這麼多同事的面，給我的女朋友下了跪，求她嫁給他。
大學畢業後，我回到了我們這個小縣城，在一個中學里做了一名教書匠，同一批進來的有好幾個女孩子，也是剛剛畢業進來的，在一次校領導組織的歡迎會上，我認識了她，長長的頭發，圓圓的臉，清秀的面容，這也就是所謂的一見鐘情吧。
說實話，大學畢業至今沒有談一次戀愛，想工作了好好談一場，那晚我主動要了她的手機號，她很大方的給了我，直覺告訴我，她沒拒絕我的意思，雖然我們在同一個學校，但是見面的機會不多，每當夜晚來臨的時候我們就煲電話聊天，這樣的情況持續了一個月吧，我們之間也相互了解了一點。
一個周末的晚上，我約了她吃了個飯，在我們這個小縣城的廣場上，坐了一晚上，在我送她回宿舍的路上，我頭一次牽了一個女孩子的手，那時想初戀的感覺真好，在我們相處的日日夜夜里，陪伴我們的只有無盡的快樂和幸福。
在我們交往的2年時間里，我們彼此照顧，也發生了該發生的一切，在去見我爸媽的時候，家里也很同意，由于我們畢業也就不小了，自然提到了談婚論嫁。在去她家見她爸媽的時候。遇到了讓我一生難以忘懷的尷尬場面。
在去她家以前，我們通知她父母說，我們今天去，誰曾想，她家里還有一個男的，她媽說，這是給她找的對象，非讓她同意跟那個男的，我當時就蒙了，這是怎麼回事，我們戀愛她父母早就知道，為什麼還要給我來這個，我們沒說什麼就一起離開了。
在以後的日子里，她媽媽一直催促她回家，非讓她跟那個男的，我就不明白了，那個男的哪里好，我除了身高有點矮，但是也能拿出門啊，以後發生的一幕，讓我徹底對那個男的無語了，他竟然和她媽媽一起到了我們的學校，當著這麼多同事的面，給我的女朋友下了跪，求她嫁給他，我真是服了，他竟然這種事都能作的出來，我們的臉都丟盡了。
也許是我們都沒準備好，最終的結果是她回家跟那個男的結了婚，我也沒能挽回原本屬于我的幸福，在她結婚頭一晚，她來找我，就住在了我的宿舍，我還能說什麼，一顆已經不屬于我的心，我就算挽留還有什麼用，我恨自己的不爭氣，恨命運的捉弄，她說，她的心永遠屬于我，

description.hltext_display: MARTINEZ: UPDATE: SIX OF SEVEN DEFENDANTS IN RICHMOND HIGH GANG RAPE TO STAND TRIAL
天下头条：穆帅重返国米？切尔西3000万求1人
description.content:
北京时间12月22日，意媒炒作穆里尼奥明夏重返国米，魔力鸟发言人称一切皆有可能；巴萨10连胜终结，瓜帅宣布梅西休假；贝尼特斯下课在即，前AC米兰主帅莱昂纳多或入主；切尔西3000万英镑求购热刺核心莫德里奇。腾讯体育为您带来今日天下头条。
《阿斯报》：穆里尼奥重返国米？
意媒盛传贝尼特斯下课在即，莫拉蒂正积极寻找国米新帅，斯帕莱蒂是入主梅阿查的最大热门。但意媒体同时也在炒作穆里尼奥重返国米，莫拉蒂希望魔力鸟能够回到亚平宁，重新执掌蓝黑军团。听到这个传闻，穆里尼奥的发言人帕拉梅斯说：“目前双方并没有任何接触，传闻是毫无意义的，我们必须尊重合同。我认为穆里尼奥要重回国米是很困难的，因为他才刚刚从那里离开，这在他的执教生涯中，从来没有发生过。不过在足球界，一切皆有可能。”

description.hltext_display: 정운천 "국회 석패율제 도입하자"
description.content:
한나라당 정운천 최고위원이 21일 "지역주의 구도 극복과 상생의 정치 구현을 위해서는 국회의원 선거에서 한 정당이 지지기반이 취약한 지역에서 패배한 후보가 비례대표로 당선되게 허용하는 `석패율제'를 도입할 필요가 있다"고 주장했다.
정 최고위원은 이날 전북도의회 기자실에서 기자간담회를 하고 "지역에 따라 특정 정당이 국회 의원석을 독차지하는 현행 국회의원 선거제도는 문제가 많다"며 "영. 호남간 지역구도를 극복하고 정치발전을 위해 석패율제도를 도입하자"고 여·야에 요구했다.
그는 이어 LH(한국토지주택공사) 유치와 관련해 "서해안시대의 개막과 30년간 소외된 전북의 발전을 위해서도 LH가 전북으로 와야 한다"며 "LH가 전북으로 유치될 수 있도록 온 힘을 다하겠다"고 다짐했다.
정 최고위원은 또 "새만금사업이 원활히 추진되기 위해서는 현행처럼 사업추진 주체가 6개 중앙부처로 나뉘어서는 안 된다"며 '새만금 개발의 성공을 위해서도 통합된 집행기구인 새만금개발청이 하루빨리 신설돼야 한다"고 강조했다.
이와 함께 전북의 최대 현안인 국가식품클러스터와 한식세계화, 무주 태권도공원 등 국책사업이 차질없이 추진될 수 있도록 앞장서겠다고 다짐했다.
정 최고위원은 지난 3월부터 우리 음식의 세계화를 지원하는 민간단체인 한식재단의 이사장을 맡고 있으며, 6·2지방선거에서는 전북도지사 선거에 뛰어들어 한나라당 사상 호남지역 최다득표율인 18.2%를 기록했었다.

description.hltext_display: Rancocas Valley edges Willingboro with a buzzer-beater
description.author: Chris Melchiorre
description.content:
It should have been a storybook ending for Willingboro after a back-and-forth game with Rancocas Valley.
But RV had other plans.
In a shot that defined the term buzzer-beater, Brianna Logan found herself with an open look from 10 feet and took the shot.
The ball clanked off the inside of the rim and went in, sending Rancocas home with a stunning 53-52 victory Tuesday night at Willingboro. "I just tried to focus on my release and form, and the shot went in," Logan said. Logan said she and her teammates never wavered after Cezar's shot. The Red Devils called a time-out after the Willingboro basket, and Logan said the team was calm. "We just said we needed to stay focused," Logan said. "I just kept saying, 'We got this. We got this.' " On the final play, Rancocas Valley (2-0) moved the ball upcourt with three passes before Logan, a 5-foot-3 sophomore guard, took possession with just over a second left on the clock. "We wanted this win; we want to be known as the best team in Burlington County, and [Willingboro] almost took it from us," Rancocas Valley coach Anthony Corrado said. "We just hung tough and pulled it out. It was a great game on both sides." Rancocas went into halftime down, 28-23.
The Red Devils were hurt by turnovers and a dismal performance at the free-throw line in the first half, hitting only 2 of 13 foul shots.
Adding to Rancocas Valley's troubles was the strong play of several Chimeras.
Willingboro's Michaya Owens, who led all players with 24 points, scored her team's first seven points in the third quarter.
Center Gabrielle Bennett also had a strong game for Willingboro, scoring 14 points and pulling down 15 rebounds.
Willingboro (2-1) led by 35-29 before Rancocas Valley made a strong push toward the end of the third quarter.
The Red Devils ended the period on a 13-4 run and had a 42-39 lead. "We just never lost faith at any point during the game," said Red Devils freshman Lauren Moses, who contributed 15 points and 1boards. The two teams traded baskets for most of the final period, setting the stage for Logan's heroics. "The third quarter is really when we lost the game," Willingboro coach Guy Fowler said. The last play "was just a young mistake by a young team. But we'll be fine." Rancocas Valley 13 10 19 1� 53 Willingboro 12 16 113 � 52 RV: Lauren Gaskill 11, Arianna Williams 2, Brianna Logan 8, Natalya Lee 11, Lauren Moses 15, Jasmyne Lewis 4, Jordan Woods-DiPac

description.hltext_display: Hollywood newbie: Aussie is second highest-grossing star
description.content:
Canberra-born actress Mia Wasikowska is new to Hollywood and many have trouble spelling her name, but she has come within a whisker of bumping Leonardo DiCaprio off as the world's top box-office earner for 2010.
Forbes magazine unveiled its Hollywood box office kings and queens on Tuesday and 21-year-old Wasikowska tied for second place with Johnny Depp on the important list, leaving a who's who of Tinseltown A-listers in her wake including Robert Downey Jr, Daniel "Harry Potter" Radcliffe and the stars from the Twilight films.
Fellow Aussie Sam Worthington could only manage eighth spot.
The top earner at the global box office in 2010 was DiCaprio, thanks to his two hits Inception and Shutter Island which grossed a combined $US1.1 billion ($A1.11 billion).
Forbes described Wasikowska as the "big surprise on our list".
"Wasikowska was lucky enough to star as Alice in Tim Burton's Alice in Wonderland. And while there's no way she was the primary driver of ticket sales for the film (co-star Johnny Depp and director Tim Burton were much bigger draws), she did appear in almost every scene of the film, and can't be fairly dismissed," Forbes declared.
Alice in Wonderland was the second-highest grossing film of 2010 with $US1.03 billion ($A1.04 billion) in global box office takings, just behind Toy Story 3.
Wasikowska's Forbes ranking was also helped by her other big film of the year, the critical darling and likely Oscar winner, The Kids Are Alright.
Depp should have been alone in second place, but his much-hyped new movie with Angelina Jolie, The Tourist, has disappointed at the box office leaving him tied with the Aussie actress.
In fourth position was Downey Jr with $US808 million in takings for Iron Man 2 and Due Date while Radcliffe's Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 1, which only opened a month ago, but has collected $US780 million, is fifth.
Another young Brit, Robert Pattinson, came in sixth with $US749 million for his Twilight films and the $US56 million tear jerker Remember Me, which let him push Twilight co-star and rumoured real-life love, Kristen Stewart, into seventh with $US698 million.
While critics hated Worthington's 3-D Clash of the Titans re-make, audiences still paid up $US494 million in tickets to see the film, giving the Aussie eighth spot.
Usually Will Smith is on Forbes list, but this year he was absent.
Smith's 12-year-old son Jaden, however, took ninth position with $US359 million for The Karate Kid re-make. His veteran co-star in the film, Jackie Chan, playing the Mr Miyagi character, shared ninth spot with the youngster.
In compiling its list, Forbes did not include animated films, although Toy Story 3 and others were some of the top-earning of the year. Forbes concluded the stars are not really the big draw for the animated films.

description.hltext_display: WEATHER HAVOC: Inland area braces for latest storm
description.author: RICHARD K. DE ATLEYThe Press-Enterprise
description.content:
Video: Video: Photo Gallery: Tuesday's storm
After a day of high-water misery, another storm is expected to dump more rain on the Inland area today.
The storm, the coldest in a series that has drenched the area since late last week, also could bring snow to the mountains.
RELATED | Videos So
Soggy freeways and white-knuckled commutes are not expected to improve today as more rain falls on saturated ground. Sections of vital routes, including Interstate 215 in Riverside and San Bernardino, are expected to be closed or restricted as crews make emergency repairs.
Rain has been falling in the mountains, but snow levels are expected to drop to 5,500 feet this afternoon with snow throughout the day.
Flash flood watches and wind advisories are in effect for many areas through this afternoon. Thunderstorms are possible, along with fog in some areas.
Weather is forecast to clear Thursday through Saturday night, when a slight chance of showers returns.
Gov. Arnold Schwarzenegger on Tuesday declared a state of emergency for both Riverside and San Bernardino counties. Both counties opened emergency operations centers. The declaration makes it possible for state agencies and personnel to participate in emergency responses and assistance.
San Bernardino city officials warned residents that while today's rainfall may not be significantly higher than previous days, "since most areas have already become saturated with water, the city may experience a higher amount of runoff." As much as 3 inches of rain drenched the region Tuesday, stranding motorists in high water and sweeping away a group of homeless people in Riverside. Horses were led from high water in Norco, and electrical failures closed the Cal State San Bernardino campus.
San Bernardino police used helicopters to airlift out a dozen patrons of the Castaways Restaurant in San Bernardino at about 4 p.m. after mudslides closed the only road in and out of the neighborhood. The restaurant is in the 600 block of Kendall Drive.
Riverside County reported that between the pre-dawn hours Monday and 8 a.m. Tuesday, Riverside County and Cal Fire firefighters responded to almost 500 calls for service, including 63 traffic collisions, 24 residential flooding calls and eight water rescues that led to the rescue of 13 people. In , flooding closed several roads, including some in Lytle Creek and Mt. Baldy Village where heavy rain has caused extensive damage.
'Extreme peril' officials said the series of storms brought severe flooding, debris flows and mudslides "resulting in extreme peril to people and property within ." Vern Matthews, who has lived in Lytle Creek for about 23 years, said residents in that San Gabriel Mountains community are used to downpours. "It comes with the territory up here," said Matthews, a former firefighter who now teaches fire sciences. "Most people up here are more psychologically set for this. They kind of have a pioneer spirit. You sandbag like crazy and batten down the hatches. You're not going to stop the water." Matthews said he's experienced just a little flooding on his property. On the upside, his well is overflowing.
In Riverside, concrete in marble- and-fist-sized chunks fell Tuesday afternoon from the I-215 overpass atop Chicago just east of the 60/91/215 interchange.
Caltrans and CHP closed the Highway 91 ramp to the southbound I-215 and the I-215 ramp from San Bernardino, where the interstate merges with Highway 60.
The closure is indefinite, Caltrans officials said.
It was at the same location where crews performed emergency repairs for a similar problem of falling concrete in August.
On Tuesday, water poured through a hand-sized hole in the roadway to the street below, and the tires of passing cars could be seen through the divot.
In San Bernardino, crews planned to work throughout the night to reopen most lanes of I-215 around Third Street, which were covered in a mudslide Sunday night. Officials said they were hopeful all lanes would open by morning.
Mountain closures
Mountain and Pass roads throughout the area were closed, damaged or barely passable, and conditions were expected to worsen as the latest storm passes.
Five-day rainfall totals from the National Weather Service include more than 21 inches for the San Bernardino Mountain town of Twin Peaks and 19.8 inches for Lytle Creek.
The series of storms started in the Gulf of Alaska, but each gathered warm air from a tropical jet stream, said National Weather Service forecaster Noel Isla.
But that warmer air has moved on, and the system arriving today won't pick up any up, Isla said. "This will be different, a storm system with colder air and snow," he said. About 40 horses were evacuated from River Trails Riding Stables in Norco in the middle of the night when the adjacent Santa Ana River overflowed.
The water reached the horses' chests. "It came in my house and woke me up," said Matt Price, whose family owns the Hamner Avenue facility.
Firefighters, employees from Mike's Livestock Auction and others helped move out the horses about 2:30 a.m. Tuesday, Price said. One horse was swept away in the river.
The horses were moved to Moreno Arena at Ingalls Park, where they were examined by a veterinarian and fed. They were later moved out to make room for horses being evacuated from the Prado Dam area.
Staff writers Dug Begley, Richard Brooks, Gene Ghiotto, Imran Ghori, Brian Rokos, David Keck and Gail Wesson contributed to this report.
Reach Richard K. De Atley at 951-368-9573 or rdeatley@PE.com FIVE-DAY RAINFALL TOTALS

description.hltext_display: Pınar Karşıyaka Kafilesi Güney Kıbrıs'tan Ayrıldı
description.content: - PINAR KARŞIYAKA KAFİLESİ GÜNEY KIBRIS'TAN AYRILDI Basketbolda FIBA Erkekler EuroChallenge Kupası (G) Grubu'nda Güney Kıbrıs'ta oynanan APOEL- Pınar Karşıyaka maçının ardından olaylar çıktı. APOEL'in fanatik taraftarları, spor salonunu savaş alanına çevirdi. Nicosia Spor Salonu'nda oynanan ve APOEL'in 82-80 galibiyetiyle tamamlanan maç sonrası Pınar Karşıyakalı Oyuncular ve teknik heyet, Rum seyircilerin saldırısına uğradı. Pınar Karşıyaka takımı, Güney Kıbrıs Rum kesiminden bu sabah saat 08.30'da Larnaka Havaalanı'ndan Atina'ya gitti. Atina üzerinden Türkiye'ye geçecek takımın öğlen saatlerinde İzmir'de olması bekleniyor. (Doğan Haber Ajansı) 11 dakika önce.. [2430063]

description.hltext_display: ExchangeDefender Empowers IT Solution Providers with More Options for...
description.content:
ExchangeDefender is launching these new products and expanding its support teams to help address a wider range of MSP requirements beyond the world-class solution it has provided since 1997. “Managed Service Providers are finding more of their channel vendors directly competing with them in the marketplace, making for tighter margins and a painful transition to the cloud” says Vlad Mazek, CEO of Own Web Now. “The landscape is changing, and we believe that giving our partners a choice between a full service offering and a bare-bones low-cost offering can help them differentiate themselves, stay competitive, and help build a foundation for their cloud strategy.”
ExchangeDefender Managed Messaging
ExchangeDefender Managed Messaging is a full-service hosted Microsoft Exchange 2010 solution delivered under the MSP’s own brand. ExchangeDefender Managed Messaging covers everything from managing DNS records to software deployment to data migration, including billing, planning and ongoing support. Own Web Now will plan and remotely execute the migration and software deployment using the recently-released Shockey Monkey Remote solution. Partners can leverage ExchangeDefender Managed Messaging to remove the cost of deploying the solution, maintain their valuable relationships, and onboard more clients to the cloud without all the legwork.
ExchangeDefender Essentials
ExchangeDefender Essentials provides MSPs with an entry-level cloud based security suite and a departure from the all-you-can-eat SMTP solution for in-house email servers. ExchangeDefender Essentials includes all the core ExchangeDefender security features such as SPAM filtering, virus scanning, inbound and outbound business continuity, and is still offered as a white labeled, brand-able solution, but lacks the more advanced LiveArchive, encryption, web file sharing and compliance archiving components. Partners can leverage ExchangeDefender Essentials as a “foot in the door” security strategy, and later justify additional features.
CloudBlock
Under license from Own Web Now Corp, CloudBlock, Inc. offers a cost-effective hosted email solution based on Microsoft Exchange 2010 and ExchangeDefender. Starting at $2.99/month for Exchange 2010 hosting and $0.35 for security, CloudBlock is joining the low-cost infrastructure services market with our enterprise-class stack. CloudBlock offers VARs and MSPs an opportunity to deliver an effective “Just Mail” solution without a huge price tag. Partners can leverage CloudBlock’s self-managed solution with clients whose budgets are severely constrained, or with clients who don’t have a Managed Services-type support contract in place.

description.hltext_display: शुरूआती कारोबार में सेंसेक्स 77 अंक मजबूत खुला
description.content:
पीटीआई-भाषा संवाददाता 10:8 HRS IST
मुंबई, 22 दिसंबर :भाषा: संस्थागत निवेशकों की सतत लिवाली से बंबई शेयर बाजार का सूचकांक आज शुरूआती कारोबार में 77 अंक की मजबूती के साथ खुला।
तीस शेयरों पर आधारित बंबई शेयर बाजार का सूचकांक 77. 07 अंक या 0. 38 फीसद की तेजी के साथ 20,137. 39 अंक पर खुला। पिछले चार सत्रों में सेंसेक्स 410 अंक चढ़ चुका है।
इसी प्रकार, नेशनल स्टाक एक्सचेंज का निफ्टी भी 18. 40 अंक या 0. 31 फीसद की तेजी के साथ 6,019. 05 पर खुला।
विशेषज्ञों के अनुसार अमेरिकी बाजार में तेजी और एशियाई बाजार में मिले-जुले रूख के बीच संस्थागत निवेशकों की सतत लिवाली से बाजार में तेजी दर्ज की गयी है।
अपनी टिप्पणी पोस्ट करे ।
नाम
ईमेल आईडी
विषय
चेक, अगर आप इस साइट पर अपना नाम प्रदर्शित नहीं करना चाहते।
चेक, अगर आप इस तरह की और खबरे देखना चाहते हैं।
पीटीआई-भाषा किसी भी तरह की अमर्यादित टिप्पणी बर्दाश्त नहीं करती। इस फोरम की गरिमा और मर्यादा बनाये रखने में सहयोग करें।

description.hltext_display: वर्ष 2011 में उपभोक्ता टिकाउ उद्योग में 15 फीसद वृद्धि की उम्मीद
description.content:
पीटीआई-भाषा संवाददाता 10:48 HRS IST
मुंबई, 22 दिसंबर :भाषा: उपभोक्ता इलेक्ट्रानिक्स सामान और उपकरण बनाने वाली कंपनियों के संगठन सीईएमएमए ने कहा है कि वर्ष 2011 में उपभोक्ता टिकाउ उद्योग की वृद्धि 15 फीसद से अधिक रहने का अनुमान है। इस साल इस क्षेत्र की वृद्धि 13 फीसद थी।
कंज्युमर इलेक्ट्रानिक्स एंड अप्लाइअंस एसोसिएशन :सीईएमएमए: के अध्यक्ष डा. वाई वी वर्मा ने कल यहां संवाददाताओं से कहा, ‘‘35,000 करोड़ रुपये के उद्योग की वर्ष 2011 में वृद्धि 15 फीसद से अधिक रहने का अनुमान है। आने वाले साल में इस क्षेत्र में काफी वृद्धि की संभावना है।’’ उन्होंने कहा कि पिछले कुछ साल में लोगों की आय बढ़ने, जीवनशैली में बदलाव और आवास तथा रीयल एस्टेट जैसे क्षेत्रों के साथ वाणिज्यिक विज्ञापनों के कारण उद्योग में महत्वपूर्ण परिवर्तन देखे गये हैं।
बहरहाल, वर्मा ने कहा कि रेफ्रिजरेटर्स, वाशिंग मशीन, माइक्रोवेव और एयर-कंडीशनर्स जैसे उपकरणों का लोगों तक पहुंच अभी बेहद कम है। यह ऐसे आकषर्क बाजार को प्रतिबिंबित करता है जिसका दोहन अभी होना बाकी है।
उन्होंने कहा, ‘‘हमें उम्मीद है कि इलेक्ट्रानिक उपकरणों की अच्छी मांग से आने वाले वर्ष में उपभोक्ता टिकाउ वस्तुओं की बिक्री बढ़ेगी।’’
अपनी टिप्पणी पोस्ट करे ।
नाम
ईमेल आईडी
विषय
चेक, अगर आप इस साइट पर अपना नाम प्रदर्शित नहीं करना चाहते।
चेक, अगर आप इस तरह की और खबरे देखना चाहते हैं।
पीटीआई-भाषा किसी भी तरह की अमर्यादित टिप्पणी बर्दाश्त नहीं करती। इस फोरम की गरिमा और मर्यादा बनाये रखने में सहयोग करें।

description.hltext_display: भारतीय बैंकों के संपत्ति की गुणवत्ता पर खतरा नहीं: रंगराजन
description.content:
पीटीआई-भाषा संवाददाता 1:10 HRS IST
हैदराबाद, 21 दिसंबर :भाषा: प्रधानमंत्री की आर्थिक सलाहकार परिषद के अध्यक्ष सी रंगराजन ने कहा है कि आर्थिक तंगहाली से गुजर रहे माइक्रोफाइनेंस, नागर विमानन, जमीन जायदाद और दूरसंचार जैसे क्षेत्रों में भारी निवेश या कर्ज दिये जाने के के कारण भारतीय बैंकों के परिसंपत्तियों की गुणवत्ता को फिलहाल कोई खतरा नहीं है।
रंगराजन ने संवाददाताओं से कहा, ‘‘ वर्तमान में, बैंकों की परिसंपत्ति की गुणवत्ता रिजर्व बैंक ऑफ इंडिया के निर्देशों के दायरे में है। लेकिन, प्रत्येक क्षेत्र में कितना निवेश किया जाये, बैंकों को यह तय करने के लिए हर साल इस बात की समीक्षा करनी पड़ेगी कि खास क्षेत्र किस तरह से काम कर रहा है। ’’ विश्लेषकों ने हाल के दिनों में इन क्षेत्रों में बैंक द्वारा किये गये निवेश या कर्ज दिये जाने पर अपनी चिंताएं जाहिर की है। नागर विमानन क्षेत्र में देश की शीर्ष विमान कंपनियो में किंगफिशर एयरलाइन और एयर इंडिया पर करीब 10 अरब डॉलर का कर्ज है।
कुछ बैंकों ने भी मंदी और दूसरी अन्य वजह से अपने कर्ज की राशि का पुर्नगठन किया है।
अपनी टिप्पणी पोस्ट करे ।
नाम
ईमेल आईडी
विषय
चेक, अगर आप इस साइट पर अपना नाम प्रदर्शित नहीं करना चाहते।
चेक, अगर आप इस तरह की और खबरे देखना चाहते हैं।
पीटीआई-भाषा किसी भी तरह की अमर्यादित टिप्पणी बर्दाश्त नहीं करती। इस फोरम की गरिमा और मर्यादा बनाये रखने में सहयोग करें।
इस खण्ड में
